font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1905, Arur Singh, manager\nof the Golden Temple , on being goaded by the British ordered the removal of\nall Hindu idols from the precincts of the Golden Temple. Till then the Hindu Brahmins\nhad presided over different Sikh marriage ceremonies. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They expelled the Brahmins from the Har\nMandir, where the latter had worked as priests. &nbsp;They also threw out the idols of \u201cHindu\u201d Gods\nfrom this temple which were installed there. &nbsp;These were the same gods that Guru Nanak had worshipped\n&nbsp;and mentioned so lovingly in his memoirs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 1909 the British granted\nseparate electorates to Muslims for creating a political electorate based\npurely upon religious difference.&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christians and Sikhs were on the side of the British already. , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Ram Das the fourth\nGuru was the son-in-law of 3</span><sup style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">rd</sup><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> Guru Amar Das , and hence has NO\nblood connection with Guru Nanak.</span></span></b></i><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the Sikh Gurus were\nKhatris . The Bedi sub-caste of the Khatris derives its lineage from Kush, the\nson of Rama in the Hindu mythology. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodhi\nsub-caste claims descent from the Lav, the other son of Rama. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khatris are among\nthe very few non-Brahmin communities that have traditionally studied the Vedas.\n&nbsp;Guru Nanak was a Bedi, &nbsp;Guru Angad was a Trehan, Guru Amar Das was a\nBhalla, and the rest of the Gurus were Sodhis.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The sword, the nada\nshorts , and the long hair was always there .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WrfDqi8BS70/Ude-7ysSMfI/AAAAAAAAj2Q/bW-7YhWUqZs/s1600/06d8dc815e4cb84d77eac94732770349.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WrfDqi8BS70/Ude-7ysSMfI/AAAAAAAAj2Q/bW-7YhWUqZs/s1600/06d8dc815e4cb84d77eac94732770349.png\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khada was worn on their body\nor the head , basically a very sharp circular disc which can be thrown even to\nkill by unskilled people . The Kangi ( comb ) was an addition. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Nanak himself has\nseen and recorded the gruesome sack of Multan, where Babur\u2019s army raped dead\nHindu women . &nbsp;Guru Nanak was in jail for\nseveral days doeing chakki peesing. It was then reported to Babur by the prison\nguards that a holy Sufi saint was in jail by mistake.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Uho3mk1xj80/Ude89TzN0iI/AAAAAAAAj1g/bswKR_MsCnQ/s1600/Guru_Nanak_Meets_Babur_Multan.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Uho3mk1xj80/Ude89TzN0iI/AAAAAAAAj1g/bswKR_MsCnQ/s400/Guru_Nanak_Meets_Babur_Multan.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babur then met him and\nfreed him. This events is recorded &nbsp;in\nthe Guru Granth Sahib holy book , as Babur Vani. &nbsp;There is a Pakistani version I know, which is\nNOT worth being mentioned in this post.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>13.83 lakh Indian\nsoldiers were recruited by Rothschild\u2019s&nbsp;\nSouth African import Gandhi for the First World war.&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Vpm6KQE5PfY/UdfSOEdJ5RI/AAAAAAAAj3A/JVFevWeFPSI/s1600/Indian+forces+on+their+way+to+the+Front+in+Flanders+-+first+world+war.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"273\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Vpm6KQE5PfY/UdfSOEdJ5RI/AAAAAAAAj3A/JVFevWeFPSI/s400/Indian+forces+on+their+way+to+the+Front+in+Flanders+-+first+world+war.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild stooge Gandhi\ndid NOT have to recruit Sikhs, &nbsp;as Sikhs\nwere directly recruited by Rothschild in the British Army. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Out of\nthis 1.10 lakh Indian soldiers died in the First World war. </span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xmDeKVGjN0E/UdkahVrp-oI/AAAAAAAAj74/olzLjiJUxmo/s1600/images.jpgftfydvy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"367\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xmDeKVGjN0E/UdkahVrp-oI/AAAAAAAAj74/olzLjiJUxmo/s400/images.jpgftfydvy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian soldiers\nwere used as cannon fodder in the most dangerous sectors of battle. There is NO\nmemorial for the Indian soldier as they were counted among the donkeys and\nmules.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HT18KndZ8Bk/UdfSZOnTqQI/AAAAAAAAj3I/Qcn4fKYB_IQ/s1600/A+regiment+of+Indian+Lancers+preparing+to+charge+during+first+world+war.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"241\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HT18KndZ8Bk/UdfSZOnTqQI/AAAAAAAAj3I/Qcn4fKYB_IQ/s400/A+regiment+of+Indian+Lancers+preparing+to+charge+during+first+world+war.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Out of 25 lakh ( 2.5\nmillion ) Indian soldiers recruited with the active help of our non-violent Rothschild stooge Gandhi for the 2nd World War , to kill the Germans , ...</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">243000 ( 2.43 ) lakh\nIndian soldiers died.</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RRrZfH1bgjo/UdkaTMncokI/AAAAAAAAj7w/fslcqjZJTAg/s1600/article-1194352-0563f1cd000005dc-282_468x286.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RRrZfH1bgjo/UdkaTMncokI/AAAAAAAAj7w/fslcqjZJTAg/s400/article-1194352-0563f1cd000005dc-282_468x286.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The First and the\nSecond world wars had only one single purpose --to carve out the Jewish state\nof Israel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the first world war\nthere were pure Sikh Regiments&nbsp; under\nBritish commanders .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YN8D59ZAscs/UdkaKhrKHXI/AAAAAAAAj7o/2lIO0hTWLDM/s1600/18.+img438.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"353\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YN8D59ZAscs/UdkaKhrKHXI/AAAAAAAAj7o/2lIO0hTWLDM/s400/18.+img438.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brave Sikhs fought\nfor the white man and earned 28 battle honours.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--3TANcbSzqM/UdfSlgfNviI/AAAAAAAAj3Q/E5060Q7Fg14/s1600/1860-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"186\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--3TANcbSzqM/UdfSlgfNviI/AAAAAAAAj3Q/E5060Q7Fg14/s400/1860-2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both the First and\nthe Second World Wars 1.62 lakh &nbsp;turban-wearing Sikh soldiers were killed and 2.34\nlakh were wounded . &nbsp;This figure is only\nfor turban wearing Sikhs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Majestic looking Sikh soldiers.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q-zwhoM55JY/UdkZudTqGbI/AAAAAAAAj7Q/QCzXpMh4f30/s1600/300px-Sikh_soldiers_in_Paris_WW1_in_1916.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"411\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-q-zwhoM55JY/UdkZudTqGbI/AAAAAAAAj7Q/QCzXpMh4f30/s400/300px-Sikh_soldiers_in_Paris_WW1_in_1916.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">14 Victoria Crosses\nwere awarded to the Sikhs. &nbsp;As late as &nbsp;2002, the names of all Sikh VC and George\nCross winners were inscribed on the pavilion monument of the Memorial Gates on\nConstitution Hill next to Buckingham Palace, London.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fgNXA8d8VM0/UdfSuulKpOI/AAAAAAAAj3Y/LX3earDRo-0/s1600/32nd+Sikh+Pioneers+Bengal+Army.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fgNXA8d8VM0/UdfSuulKpOI/AAAAAAAAj3Y/LX3earDRo-0/s400/32nd+Sikh+Pioneers+Bengal+Army.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikhs had been\nchaddoed on the proverbial &nbsp;<i>channe ka jhaad</i> quite early. &nbsp;Low how mothers praise their children so that\nthey don\u2019t &nbsp;sneak out to play and study\nwell. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ABSkSkABegE/UdkZ1cetdyI/AAAAAAAAj7Y/rNJ9oHO5g0s/s1600/83465.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ABSkSkABegE/UdkZ1cetdyI/AAAAAAAAj7Y/rNJ9oHO5g0s/s400/83465.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were regularly praised for\ntheir bravery by the British and later they would smirk over it while having\ntheir brandy and cigars.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e9SoWw5-TUk/UdfS6eonnII/AAAAAAAAj3g/sFG1_WmN8r8/s1600/British+and+Native+Indian+Soldiers+-+1890's.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"292\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e9SoWw5-TUk/UdfS6eonnII/AAAAAAAAj3g/sFG1_WmN8r8/s400/British+and+Native+Indian+Soldiers+-+1890's.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikhs had a reputation to live up to, while\nfighting for their masters.&nbsp; The Sikh\nRegiment were awarded a one rank seniority over other Indian Sepoys and awarded\nthe authorisation to wear the coveted &nbsp;red turban (which is still worn by the\nregiment today) opposed to the standard blue head dress worn by British Indian\nArmy Units at the time. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CvWe4vH97xA/UdfTLLKXspI/AAAAAAAAj3o/8n4EYP-neDY/s1600/Indian+forces+unloading+baggage+at+Alexandra+Dock,+Bombay++during+first+world+war.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CvWe4vH97xA/UdfTLLKXspI/AAAAAAAAj3o/8n4EYP-neDY/s400/Indian+forces+unloading+baggage+at+Alexandra+Dock,+Bombay++during+first+world+war.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were\nconstantly reminded and praised about their brave fight with the Afridi\nLashkars who attacked Saragarhi on September 12, 1897. Their job was to do and\ndie like the \u201c charge of the light brigade\" poem .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>Theirs not to make\nreply,<o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Theirs not to reason\nwhy,<o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Theirs but to do and\ndie:</span><o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>Cannon to right of\nthem,<o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>Cannon to left of\nthem,<o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>Cannon in front of\nthem<o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>&nbsp;Volley'd and thunder'd;<o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>Storm'd at with shot\nand shell,<o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Boldly they rode and\nwell,<o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Into the jaws of\nDeath,<o:p></o:p></span></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Into the mouth of Hell</span><o:p></o:p></b></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i><b>&nbsp;Rode the six hundred.</b><o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b>-- <span style=\"color: blue;\">Lord Alfred\nTennyson</span><o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eW-7D-Hl3eg/UdkCrE6uNVI/AAAAAAAAj6U/_BpyXHpul8E/s1600/images.jpgewg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eW-7D-Hl3eg/UdkCrE6uNVI/AAAAAAAAj6U/_BpyXHpul8E/s400/images.jpgewg.jpg\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild would ensure that the liquor &nbsp;flowed &nbsp;free before a Sikh regiment assault..&nbsp; Then they would be taken to the make shift\nGurudwara &nbsp;to get spiritual strength.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JduOqFNehTw/UdkZclRHz_I/AAAAAAAAj7A/NjFCyukR1tM/s1600/images.jpgftydc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JduOqFNehTw/UdkZclRHz_I/AAAAAAAAj7A/NjFCyukR1tM/s320/images.jpgftydc.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nwas constantly drilled into their simple heads how the British Parliament\ninterrupted its proceedings and gave standing ovation to the brave Sikh\nsoldiers of Saragarhi. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D_LriRAWDrY/UdkZlTiiC8I/AAAAAAAAj7I/9t21EFf2qzc/s1600/images.jpgrcdr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"292\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-D_LriRAWDrY/UdkZlTiiC8I/AAAAAAAAj7I/9t21EFf2qzc/s400/images.jpgrcdr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How each Sikh hero\nwas awarded an Indian Order of Merit (IOM), the highest award given to an\nIndian soldier in British Indian Army for valour and sacrifice. ( 21 IOMs were\nawarded ).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zGFeGIn5uzA/UdkZ9svGx9I/AAAAAAAAj7g/8ku2LUJENMY/s1600/292310_474404625903439_1292437574_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"313\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zGFeGIn5uzA/UdkZ9svGx9I/AAAAAAAAj7g/8ku2LUJENMY/s400/292310_474404625903439_1292437574_n.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every September 12 is\ncelebrated as \"Saragarhi Day\" by all the battalions of the elite Sikh\nRegiment. &nbsp;Rothschild caused UNESCO to &nbsp;recognises this battle as one among eight\nbattles of the world known for collective bravery.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2l-2R_nu0P8/UdkariWwLuI/AAAAAAAAj8A/Sd8ofg-aRLw/s1600/images.jpggytru.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"313\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2l-2R_nu0P8/UdkariWwLuI/AAAAAAAAj8A/Sd8ofg-aRLw/s400/images.jpggytru.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild had created a\nsimilar hype for the Gorkhas , that once they unsheathed their Khukri, &nbsp;blood has to be coated on the sharp steel. If\nNOT then the Gurkha has to smear the blade with his own blood. These were all Rothschild's requirement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To find out how Rothschild\nplanted Gandhi &nbsp;on the driver\u2019s &nbsp;seat of the bus of Indian freedom fighting,\ntill Israel was carved out \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MAHATMA GANDHI\nRE-WRITING INDIAN HISTORY VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">and</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DIABOLICAL BRAIN WASHING PROCESS OF GANDHI VADAKAYIL</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi\u2019s ahimsa was\nonly against the rulers British. &nbsp;&nbsp;When it came to Germans he had temporary\namnesia about non-violence .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6bdY_kZoHig/UdkDkxiBA9I/AAAAAAAAj6g/qjQw2wXKTYU/s1600/Young+Mahatma+Gandhi+Portrait.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6bdY_kZoHig/UdkDkxiBA9I/AAAAAAAAj6g/qjQw2wXKTYU/s320/Young+Mahatma+Gandhi+Portrait.jpg\" width=\"252\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The war cry of the Sikh\nregiment was chosen by Rothschild the &nbsp;from Sikh scriptures : Jo Bole So Nihal, Sat\nSri Akal' (Victory belongs to those; Who recite the name of God with a true\nheart).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Dalhousie who\nannexed Punjab, and had told Rothschild about the extinction of Sikhism, with Muslim\ninvaders no more around. The British made sure the Sikh identity was kept\nintact and boosted every day. &nbsp;They made\nit very strict rule for every soldier of the Sikh regiment to observe the 5 Ks\nand baptisms by Amrit chakhna compulsory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every time the holy book Granth Sabib\nwas taken past the British soldiers were under strict orders to jump to attention\nand salute. Non compliance or disrespect to the holy book meant instant dismissal\nfor the white soldier. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QoVPRjWS59U/Udh5pyo3LeI/AAAAAAAAj5s/YRQL8Nvb0lk/s1600/Golden+Temple+of+Amritsar+Punjab+-+1880's.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"488\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QoVPRjWS59U/Udh5pyo3LeI/AAAAAAAAj5s/YRQL8Nvb0lk/s640/Golden+Temple+of+Amritsar+Punjab+-+1880's.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above : 132 year old picture of Golden Temple.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very recruitment\nwas a great sentimental melodrama calculated to give the gullible Sikh a ego\nmassage , sense of separateness and exclusiveness\u2014literally 3 in 1. &nbsp;Only such Sikhs were recruited who observed\nthe marks of the Khalsa. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were sent\nto receive baptism according to the rites prescribed by Guru Govind Singh. &nbsp;Each regiment had its own granthis. &nbsp;The greetings ex-changed between the British\nofficers and the Sikh soldiers were Wahguruji ka Khalsa ! Wahguruji ki Fateh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A secret C I.D. Memorandum\nfor \u201cdivide and rule\u201d , prepared by D. Patfie, Assistant Director, Criminal\nIntellegence, Government of India (1911), says that \"every endeavour has\nbeen made to preserve the Sikh soldier &nbsp;from the contagion of Hindus. &nbsp;The Sikhs must&nbsp;\nregard themselves as a totally distinct and separate nation.\" <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much later the British would\ncongratulate themselves &nbsp;\"preservation of Sikhism as a separate\nreligion was largely due to the obedient ego massage action of the British\nofficers,\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They would smirk how they deleted Hindu Banda Singh Bahadur\nfrom Sikh history using their own white historians , one of whom even became a\nSikh for show.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole venture of\nthe Rothschild in India stood at jeopardy without the Sikh regiments who were\nwilling to fight to the last breath , for their white masters. &nbsp;How India wishes that the common Sikh knew how\nRothschild took apart the might empire of Ranjit Singh in just a few years by sheer\ndeceit and also killed their favourite hero..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oB4_abDjWwE/UdfQPbPvfMI/AAAAAAAAj2o/VJuv0YThgHg/s1600/hufuib.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"173\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oB4_abDjWwE/UdfQPbPvfMI/AAAAAAAAj2o/VJuv0YThgHg/s320/hufuib.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Vellore mutiny\nin 10 July 1806, Rothschild stopped trusting his favourite soldiers from the\nSouth of India. &nbsp;The backbone of the\nBritish Indian Army, which were previously recruited from South Indian regions. Sikhs came as a welcome substitute . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6F0jz0Pytqw/UdfQFdvtkaI/AAAAAAAAj2g/ADpjxalwZOc/s1600/vel71.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"250\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6F0jz0Pytqw/UdfQFdvtkaI/AAAAAAAAj2g/ADpjxalwZOc/s400/vel71.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikh Regiment came\ninto existence on August 1, 1846, with the raising of Regiment of Ferozepore\nSikhs and Regiment of Ludhiana Sikhs by Captain G. Tebbs and Lieutenant Colonel\nP. Gordon respectively , and were used in great effect in crushing the 1857\nIndian War of Independence where Hindu and Muslim fought shoulder to shoulder,\nfor the British has robbed mother India blind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Just before the first\nwar of Independence&nbsp; in 1857 the British\nstarted doing&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">rigorous</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;propaganda of a FAKE&nbsp;&nbsp;prophesy among the followers of Guru Tegh\nBahadur that they would attack Delhi with the help of white man and completely\navenge the old insult. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XFr9Zpg1WYk/Udh3xDRxR5I/AAAAAAAAj5Q/D3mFXsBnKQw/s1600/19109_361487583950204_2052012395_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XFr9Zpg1WYk/Udh3xDRxR5I/AAAAAAAAj5Q/D3mFXsBnKQw/s400/19109_361487583950204_2052012395_n.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above : 1857 War of Independence- &nbsp;Sikhs assisting their white masters to hang their own countrymen -- their Hindu and Muslim brothers&nbsp;</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to dazzle the\nSikhs about the prophesy , Brevet Major William Stephen Raikes Hodson&nbsp; \u201cdeliberately\u201d murdered the two sons and a\ngrandson (Mirza Abu Bakr) of Mughal Emperor Bahadur Shah.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>&nbsp;Below: Slave minded Sikhs praising the messiah Hodson</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4eKOa4oMbSQ/Udh2dZRJcnI/AAAAAAAAj44/HYQ6GIV416Q/s1600/COLWILLIAMHODSONOFHODSONSHORSE1857.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4eKOa4oMbSQ/Udh2dZRJcnI/AAAAAAAAj44/HYQ6GIV416Q/s400/COLWILLIAMHODSONOFHODSONSHORSE1857.jpg\" width=\"335\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was after having promised them safe\nconduct. He then presented the heads of the two princes</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mirza\nMughal and Mirza Khizr Sultan, to their father Bahadur Shah on a golden platter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7L09hC_dNN0/Udh5A38YAXI/AAAAAAAAj5c/hakXTofvZZI/s1600/thesurrender.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"261\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7L09hC_dNN0/Udh5A38YAXI/AAAAAAAAj5c/hakXTofvZZI/s400/thesurrender.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hodson took the Mughal princes\non a bullock-cart to Delhi. &nbsp;At the<i>\nKhooni Darwaza</i> Hodson ordered the three princes to get off the cart and to\nstrip off their top garments. He stripping them of their signet rings,\nturquoise arm-bands and bejewelled swords and shot them dead .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Thereafter he\nordered their bodies to be taken to Delhi and displayed in public at the same\nplace where the head of Guru Tegh Bahadur had been exposed over a century and a\nhalf before. &nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"color: red; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Below : Khooni Darwaza&nbsp;</b></i></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GB0Sn6JJ4vY/Udh0jRSS7CI/AAAAAAAAj4o/elURBdt2IzA/s1600/5762270952_cb612b6e5f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GB0Sn6JJ4vY/Udh0jRSS7CI/AAAAAAAAj4o/elURBdt2IzA/s640/5762270952_cb612b6e5f.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">After three days, Hudson\nordered the corpses to be removed for \u201csanitary reasons\u201d. &nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">The prophesy had been&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">fulfilled</span></b></span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;- that is all the gullible Sikhs cared for.</b></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-weight: bold;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Rotshchild propaganda\nTopeewala Sikhs ( </b><i>hat wearing Sikhs, that is, the white skinned Christian Britisher</i><b> )\nwould come from the sea and avenge Guru Tegh Bahadur.</b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ninth Guru Tegh Bahadur\nSahib Ji &nbsp;was executed on 11 November\n1675 by Guru Tegh Bahadur was executed on the orders of Mughal Emperor\nAurangzeb in Delhi.&nbsp; He was kept in an\niron cage and taken to Delhi in November 1675.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3LzDP6mb-Z4/UdkAIuM8ExI/AAAAAAAAj58/txzRvNvVJfY/s1600/rstyc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3LzDP6mb-Z4/UdkAIuM8ExI/AAAAAAAAj58/txzRvNvVJfY/s320/rstyc.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Above: Guru Tegh Bahadur being beheaded on orders of Emperor Aurangazeb.</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was asked by Aurangazeb to perform some\nmiracles to prove his divinity. &nbsp;Refusing\nto do so, Tegh Bahadur was beheaded in public at Chandni Chowk.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After\nthe execution Guru's head and body were placed on the back of an elephant and\nparaded into the streets and bazars of Delhi. They were kept at the Kotwali in\nChandni Chauk for public to view.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the evening of 12\nMarch 1858, Hodsons's body was buried in the garden of La Martiniere Lucknow. His\ngrave is still located within the grounds of La Martiniere College. The\nmemorial bears theterse &nbsp;inscription\n\"<i>Here lies all that could die of\nWilliam Stephen Raikes Hodson</i>\".<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Nc9UXHUfLsE/Udh2xb8fBxI/AAAAAAAAj5A/3rwTJq2mhFo/s1600/images.jpgf3f3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Nc9UXHUfLsE/Udh2xb8fBxI/AAAAAAAAj5A/3rwTJq2mhFo/s400/images.jpgf3f3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her Majesty Queen\nVictoria honoured Major Hodson posthumously by granting his widow a Grace and\nfavour apartment at Hampton Court Palace \"in consideration of the\ndistinguished service of your late husband in India\". &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Below : &nbsp;Picture shoot- messiah avenger -- <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">the white Sikh Hodson .</span></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jy4qa_sWXOo/UdhzyiChQpI/AAAAAAAAj4Q/ySj4DzmV1yY/s1600/61405_339737709458525_243278700_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"476\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jy4qa_sWXOo/UdhzyiChQpI/AAAAAAAAj4Q/ySj4DzmV1yY/s640/61405_339737709458525_243278700_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess she was very pleased with him for snatching\naway the two priceless sword of Emperor Bahadur Shah &nbsp;and presenting it to her collection --one with\nthe name \u2018Nadir Shah\u2019 and the other with the seal of Jahangir engraved upon it,\nwhich Hodson intended to present to Queen Victoria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below : The last Mughal Emperor Bahadur Shah Zafar&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OAUZfpDlejA/Udh0GYdAT6I/AAAAAAAAj4Y/aq_cySWgFR0/s1600/300px-Bahadur_Shah_Zafar.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OAUZfpDlejA/Udh0GYdAT6I/AAAAAAAAj4Y/aq_cySWgFR0/s1600/300px-Bahadur_Shah_Zafar.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>In 1914 Bagha Jatin\nnearly drove away the British. &nbsp;The well\nplanned Ghadar movement was crushed with active Sikh help. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikh leaders wrote \u201c the rebels who should\nbe dealt with mercilessly\u201d. If this movement has succeeded Bagha Jatin would\nhave been the Father of the Nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Kirpal Singh was a spy\nand soldier of the British Indian Army who gave away the secret of the date &nbsp;of the Ghadar uprisal in Feb 1915. Kirpal Singh,&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">flushed</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;out information from his cousin serving in the 23rd Cavalry, was&nbsp;able to\ninfiltrate the leadership. &nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">As the date\nfor the mutiny approached, a desperate Rash Behari Bose brought forward the\nD-day to the evening of 19 February, which was discovered by Kirpal Singh on\nthe very day. &nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No attempts were made by\nthe Ghadarites to restrain him, and he rushed to inform his British masters of\nthe change of revolt plans. &nbsp;Ordered back\nto his station to signal when the revolutionaries had assembled, Kirpal Singh\nwas caught and detained by the would-be mutineers, but managed to make good his\nescape under the cover of answering the call of nature.&nbsp; Because of one desh drohi Sikh the whole plan\nwent PHUT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>BAGHA JATIN, THE FATHER\nOF OUR NATION, NOT TO BE VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>UNSUNG HEROES OF INA\nVADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p4gQNJRxddU/UdfRkA9bY1I/AAAAAAAAj24/1hqdGtzyCM4/s1600/Tomb+of+Ranjit+Singh+in+Lahore+-+c1880's.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"476\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p4gQNJRxddU/UdfRkA9bY1I/AAAAAAAAj24/1hqdGtzyCM4/s640/Tomb+of+Ranjit+Singh+in+Lahore+-+c1880's.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Above: Tomb of Ranjit Singh in Lahore-- 132 year old photo&nbsp;</b></span></i></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British created a\nfamine in 1769, STARVING TO DEATH more than 10 million Bengalis and Biharis . &nbsp;This was severe retribution for NOT allowing Rothschild\u2019s\nOpium to be planted instead of the regular food and cash crops. &nbsp;Seeds were confiscated.&nbsp; Warren Hastings was found guilty in 1770 and\nwas censured verbally, &nbsp;to proclaim\nBritish Justice to the world.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">The Sikhs\nknew very well how evil their British masters &nbsp;were.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>AMARTYA SEN GETS NOBEL\nPRIZE FOR WHITE WASHING HOLOCAUST VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are some gruesome\npictures in the post above \u2014don\u2019t miss it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bsV02O4Lqrw/UdkcibGpqAI/AAAAAAAAj8Q/aw6YpiAYTn4/s1600/sfghju.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"625\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bsV02O4Lqrw/UdkcibGpqAI/AAAAAAAAj8Q/aw6YpiAYTn4/s640/sfghju.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just like how the British\ninjected our Vedas with poison, using Sanskrit scholars, they did the same to\nthe Sikh manuscripts too. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They put words\ninto the Gurus mouth\u2014 words which have never been uttered by them. &nbsp;Passages like a day will come when the Sikhs will\nfight for the white man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Words like Guru Gobind\nsaying that after my death the holy book will be the next guru. &nbsp;This was to cut down the chance of Banda Singh\nBahadur, &nbsp;a Hindu from claiming the 11<sup>th</sup>\nguru status. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Sikhs and Hindus loved him for his grit\nand balls, for he made the Muslim invaders shiver . The Mughals always said\nthat there were 11 Sikh Gurus . &nbsp;This man\ndid NOT betray the trust reposed in him by Guru Gobind Singh.&nbsp; &nbsp;His\nmere presence was magic and some stated saying that he is a magician NOT a\ntantric. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the death of Guru\nGobind Singh at Nanded is hotly contested by certain sects , &nbsp;the most prominent being the Namdharis. &nbsp;They say that nobody saw him entering the\ncremation pyre. &nbsp;His bones were NOT\nvisible after the fire cooled. &nbsp;His horse\nand weapons were missing. &nbsp;There were\npeople who saw Guru Gobind Singh riding away and one of them even spoke to him.\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hnlHJ_OBBpo/UdlyIZyVdyI/AAAAAAAAj_Q/WdGu3GDYrnc/s1600/LLGuru2+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hnlHJ_OBBpo/UdlyIZyVdyI/AAAAAAAAj_Q/WdGu3GDYrnc/s1600/LLGuru2+(1).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Above: Nobody saw Guru Gobind Singh die--he arranged for a purdah around the pyre .</span></i><br />\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Like how Prophet\nMuhammad disappeared from dome of the rock Jerusalem with his horse, leaving\nbehind a holy book . &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cFn_pH_GSMo/Uo9QzVHEfxI/AAAAAAAAn0w/Adu4DtGwcRY/s1600/shedh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"522\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cFn_pH_GSMo/Uo9QzVHEfxI/AAAAAAAAn0w/Adu4DtGwcRY/s640/shedh.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Same way Rothschild\nmade Guru Gobind Singh disappear with along his horse, &nbsp;leaving behind a holy book .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-plRx3slFgwQ/Uo9Q4KouhaI/AAAAAAAAn04/Lnnb0DCjkWs/s1600/dohehtkjfwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-plRx3slFgwQ/Uo9Q4KouhaI/AAAAAAAAn04/Lnnb0DCjkWs/s640/dohehtkjfwnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me talk about the\ntantric Hindu -- Banda Singh Bahadur alias Lachman Dev or Madho Das.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emperor Aurangazeb was\npissed off with the &nbsp;Guru Har Rai and\nSikhs in general . &nbsp;Dara Shikoh the\neldest son of Emperor Shah Jehan was a very capable crown prince. His younger\nbrother Aurangazeb poisoned him using tiger\u2019s whiskers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jehan knew that\nGuru Har Rai was a herbal doctor, and he begged him to save his favorite son. Guru\nHar Rai administered a laxative and saved Dara Shikoh. &nbsp;So the Sikhs was on a good wicket with Emperor\nShah Jehan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then Aurangezeb killed\nDara Shikoh and presented his elder brother\u2019s head on a golden platter to his\nfather Shaj Jehan whom he put under arrest. &nbsp;Emperor Aurangezeb was dead against the Sikhs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two elder sons of\nGuru Gobind Singh, Ajit Singh and Jujhar Singh, died in the battle with the\nMughals.&nbsp; Guru Gobind\u2019s &nbsp;mother Mata Gujri and the his two younger sons\nwere captured by Wazir Khan, the governor of Sirhind appointed by Aurangazeb.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The boys were walled alive for refusing to convert to Islam.. His mother Gujri jumped from a height and killed herself.. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Gobind\u2019s two wives\nSundari &amp; Sahab Devi were jailed </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">by the\nMughals.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aurangzeb's son Bahadur\nShah I (Muazzam ) killed his brothers Muhammad Azam and Muhammad Kam Bhaksh to\ncapture the throne. &nbsp;On request Guru\nGobind Singh sent his army under the command of Bhai Dharam Singh, to help\nMuazzam.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Muazzam's\nforces defeated&nbsp; his brother Azam\u2019s\nforces in the Battle of Jajau on 12 June 1707. Both Muhammad A\u1e93am and his son\nBidar Bakht were killed in the battle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So Guru Gobind Singh\nwas on a very good wicket with Emperor Bahadur Shah or Muazzam who conferred\nthe title of Hind Ka Pir (the Saint of India). &nbsp;Guru Gobind singh was the Emperor royal guest in\nAgra for 4 months ,till November 1707. &nbsp;Then they rode together to kill the emperors\nbrother &nbsp;Kam Bakhsh. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But soon Guru Gobind\nSingh fell out with his good friend Emperor &nbsp;Bahadur Shah as he was friendly with Wazir\nKhan of Sirhind who killed his sons, and refused to punish him as a return for\nhis favours . &nbsp;&nbsp;He felt the threat to his life and moved far\naway to Nanded to meet an old friend Madho Das the Hindu tantric.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me digress a\nbit\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I recall a ship\u2019s party\nand the Electrical officer a sardarjee cracked a joke which still makes me have\na belly laugh. He told us that the incident is true and it happened in his hometown\n, but I am sure it is tongue in cheek, about a greater \u201ctrue\u201d &nbsp;incident.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>A traveller sardarjee\nfrom a far away village came to his town. He asked for directions and some youngsters\ndecided to make an ass out of him. They would direct him on the wrong path. Then\nthey would take a short cut and the same boys misdirected him twice more.&nbsp;</b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>On\nthe way this simple rustic traveller saw the town plumber using a big pipe wrench\nand turning a huge water valve without a hand wheel to release water .\nImmediately he pounced on him and started raining blows on his head crying\u201d\nSaala, rasta ghuma rahe ho , subah se main pareshan hum \u201c ( you are turning my\npath, when I am in distress since morning ) .<o:p></o:p></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This alludes to a\nlegend where Guru Nanak went to Mecca with&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Baba Mardana Jee.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\nwas tired at the outskirts of Mecca and was resting when a Muslim mullah came and shouted at him for\nsleeping with his legs towards holy Mecca. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
