His bold policy was <i><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">seedha ghar mein ghuske maro.</span></b><o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda personally\ncut&nbsp; Ali Hasan into several pieces.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PjZ4LBy1qc0/UdlkJFkJvTI/AAAAAAAAj9Y/hBoQcgoKMNc/s1600/images.jpg2d3f3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"271\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PjZ4LBy1qc0/UdlkJFkJvTI/AAAAAAAAj9Y/hBoQcgoKMNc/s400/images.jpg2d3f3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">News of Banda\u2019s &nbsp;astonishing&nbsp;ferocity spread like wild fire and\nordinary Hindus and Sikhs came running from Punjab, Haryana and Rajasthan to\njoin him. &nbsp;It was rumored that he\npossessed divine powers .&nbsp; Hindus\nwhispered in awe , they whispered that this tantric could be the very incarnation\nof Lord Parashurama <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_MQbrCTRwG4/UdlhnnfauBI/AAAAAAAAj9A/iphvOh7-XBE/s1600/3120137755_b445b7855f_o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_MQbrCTRwG4/UdlhnnfauBI/AAAAAAAAj9A/iphvOh7-XBE/s400/3120137755_b445b7855f_o.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More and more Sikhs guerillas\nof Guru Gonind Singh who were hiding in deep jungles joined him their\nimagination aroused . Next Banda massacred Muslim invaders &nbsp;in Ambala, &nbsp;Sifabad, Jhambaru, Dhamal, Kaithal, Kunjpura,\nSanduara , Balod etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Balod Banda Bahadur was\nupset with the complaints of brahmins against a Muslim bully Manne Khan, whose\ngroup used to kidnap Hindu girls.. Banda Singh had him roasted in fire. These\nwere all gruesome Muslim invader tactics of Ghori and Babur , now being given back with simple --nay-- compound interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda now became a full\nfledged King dividing his army led by generals both Hindu and Sikhs. He turned\na blind eye when his generals looted .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nawab of Sirhind knew\nthat Banda was heading towards them soon. &nbsp;So they tried to pre-empt his impending attack\nby sending 6000 of the best horsemen to Ropad city where Banda camped with his\narmy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda did not have any\nfirepower while the Muslim Sirhind troops had &nbsp;heavy armory. &nbsp;Banda himself hid on trees and killed the\nMuslim specialist gunners&nbsp; from far range\nusing his archery skills. &nbsp;Seeing their\ncommanders getting picked off despite being in heavy armour , the muslim troops\ngot unnerved and fled in fear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon Banda challenged\nWazir Khan telling him \u201c I am Rajput you are Pathan\u2014&nbsp; if you have drunk the milk of your\nmother,&nbsp; let us fight a single combat and\ndecide \u201c. (<i> typical Rajput dialogue you see in Bollywood movies now</i> ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wazir Khan who bricked\nup Guru Gobind\u2019s sons , ignored this challenge . He tried to escape but\ncaptured and roasted in a fire supervised by Banda Singh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Sirhind more and\nmore enthusiastic Hindus and Sikhs joined Banda\u2019s army, that it was getting\ndifficult to sustain fast riding and river crossing logistics. &nbsp;Soon Banda rode to Doaba. Pamal Maler Kotl and\nPhagwara. &nbsp;Every Muslim either ran or was\nput to the sword.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He never asked any\nMuslim to convert back to Hindusim.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Phagwara Jaladhar ,\nthe Nawab even wanted to join his army.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda crossed the </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beas River he reached Manjha (Amritsar) where\nthe Hindu majority danced and celebrated.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seeing the confident\nfestivities&nbsp; and that the Hindus and\nSikhs were getting cocky, many Mughal camps gathered at Hoshiarpur and dared\nBanda to attack.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JLyYS37qMqs/Udllch2g-JI/AAAAAAAAj9o/XFfNpiguufg/s1600/Battle+of+Rahon.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"350\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JLyYS37qMqs/Udllch2g-JI/AAAAAAAAj9o/XFfNpiguufg/s400/Battle+of+Rahon.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They clashed at Baijwada\n&nbsp;. This was NO hit and run guerilla\ntactic. &nbsp;The army of Banda pounced upon\nthe Muslims ferociously with Banda leading from the front in front, &nbsp;that at dusk &nbsp;Muslims ran helter skelter. &nbsp;The commander of the Muslim army was chased by\nBanda &nbsp;and killed .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire ground tract\nbetween Yamuna &nbsp;and Sutlej came under the\nBanda command .&nbsp; He asked &nbsp;Baba Vinod Singh to rule that area using the\nSaffron flag .&nbsp; Finally Ranjit Singh\nunited 12 such misls and founded the glorious Sikh Empire..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Ranjit Singh's father\nMaha Singh was the Commander of the Sukerchakia misl of West Punjab based around\nhis headquarters at Gujranwala.&nbsp; In 1799,\nRanjit Singh captured Lahore from the Bhangi Misl and later made it his\ncapital. &nbsp;Soon he brought the whole of\nthe central Punjab from the Sutlej to the Jhelum under his sway.&nbsp; After several campaigns, he conquered the\nother misls and created the mighty Sikh Empire.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a few months&nbsp; Banda Singh overran with amazing ease Kahlur,\nSonepat, Karnal-Panipat Hissar, Hansi, Tarawadi, Kaithal, Jind, Sirsa, Firozpur, Chuniya, Kasur,\nSaharanpur, Behar, Ambheta, Nanauta, Najamabad, Lohagarh, Gurdaspur, Sialkot , Pathankot\n, Kangda --&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">--- all the regions were now under the Saffron flag replacing the green\nIslamic flag. &nbsp;I guess this is what happens when the leader is NOT afraid of death.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FS5bJUqgQcQ/UdlmxJnEoHI/AAAAAAAAj94/myg7Ae-gefw/s1600/banda-c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FS5bJUqgQcQ/UdlmxJnEoHI/AAAAAAAAj94/myg7Ae-gefw/s400/banda-c.jpg\" width=\"247\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslim Nawabs ran with\ntheir valuables as soon as they heard Banda was coming\u2014for Banda allowed his\nsoldiers to loot \u2014 NOT rape.. &nbsp;In\nhindsight this could be the reason why the army swelled so fast. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Revenge plus retrieval of stolen goodies were\nsurely a great incentive.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Muslims called\nBanda tantric Jinn (ghost) whom they can never win by force. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was invincible till date.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda now headed from\nthe plains towards the hills. The Muslim ruler of Nalagarh Nahan offered to\nserve Banda. &nbsp;You must know Ranjit Singh\nhas Muslim commanders in his army.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda now ruled from\nYamuna to Ravi. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He asked the Hindu ruler\nof Jejo Kailore, &nbsp;Ajmer Chand to unite\nfor greater and stringer nation. &nbsp;The\nking declined but also insulted him. &nbsp;Ajmer\nChand knew he had provoked Banda Singh. So he got 22 ally kings to rally at\nKailore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as Banda killed\nAjmer chand all the remaining kings accepted the blanket governance of Banda . Banda\nwas also respected as a saint not just a warrior. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZSLDKum4kQU/Udlny3t7HHI/AAAAAAAAj-I/1fiJVSRzvUE/s1600/download.jpgngdfn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZSLDKum4kQU/Udlny3t7HHI/AAAAAAAAj-I/1fiJVSRzvUE/s320/download.jpgngdfn.jpg\" width=\"239\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Soon Mughal Emperor&nbsp;Aurangzeb died of old age in 1707 AD. &nbsp;The fake Sikh historians even&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">claim</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;credit for this .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His successor &nbsp;Bahadur Shah who was once a great friend of\nGuru Gobind Singh ( later fell apart) &nbsp;was wary of Banda Bahadur. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many bloody battles\nfollowed between Banda and the veteran generals of &nbsp;Bahadur Shah-- Asgar Khan, Samand Khan, Samand\nKhan, Abdulla Khan &amp; Noor Khan. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mughal Emperor &nbsp;left Delhi for Lahore where he died in 1712. &nbsp;For two three years Mughal rule was unstable\nbecause of as usual fight for throne among Mughals for throne. Bahadur Shah\u2019s successor\nJahandar Shah was killed on the orders of the Sayyid Brothers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bahadur Shah's death\nfollowed a war of succession among his four sons, Jahandar Shah, Azim-us-Shah,\nJahan Shah and Rafi-is-Shah.&nbsp; Jalandar\nshah killed his 3 brothers to ascend the throne .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda took advantage of\nMughal throne divergence. The &nbsp;Jaladhar\nruler Faizali Khan &amp; Saifulla Khan accepted Banda's Governance. &nbsp;Then he captured&nbsp; Haridwar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Farukhusear became\nruler of Mughals throne after Bahadur Shah. He was a cunning man, and he knew\nthat Banda is invincible by armed forces. He used the theory of divide and\nrule. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He wrote a letter and\nconveyed it by a Hindu Ram Dayal to the wife of Guru Govind Singh Mata Sundari\nDevi that he want peace and that Banda is blood thirsty of Mughals and also disrespecting\nthe teachings of the holy book .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He assured that &nbsp;Punjab &amp; Mughals will live peacefully from\nhencforth. Sundari accepted his proposal and wrote a letter to Banda to accept\nthis proposal. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda knew very well\nthe aim of Guru Govind Singh was to establish Khalsa. &nbsp;So, when Banda read her letter he was\nsurprised and wrote back saying that &nbsp;this is just a trick to bide for time and to\nstrengthen the Mughal army and also to divide us. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He asked here if she forgot that that they\nbluffed Guru Govind Singh and brutally murdered his sons. &nbsp;He wrote back said that couldn't forget the\nsacrifice of Guru Teg Bahadur &nbsp;and Guru\nArjun Dev.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sikhs and Hindus had suffered so much under cruel hands of that it\u2019s\nnot wise to forgive the Muslim invaders. &nbsp;He wrote back that he will continue following Guru\nGovind Singh orders . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This reply made make\nSundari very upset with Banda . She called Banda arrogant and that he does&nbsp; not follow the 11th Guru --meaning the holy\nbook .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was upset that the coins minted\nby Banda has NO reference to the revered Sikh Guru lineage - instead the coin described\nLohgarh (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Mukhlisgarh )</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;, the make shift capital of Banda : </span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Struck in the City of Peace,\nillustrating the beauty of civic life, and the ornament of the blessed\nthrone.\"</i></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you look at the\nsituation dispassionately Banda was under orders from Guru Gobind Singh to\nestablish Khaksa which he took upon himself at great risk to his life . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was living peacefully as a retired saint at\nNanded and he did NOT have to take this type of interference from a petty minded woman, and\nthat too after he had achieved so much .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Like how Sonia Gandhi thinks that she is Rajiv Gandhi multiplied by 100 .\n&nbsp;This&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">unsavory</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;portion of history\ninvolving Guru Gobind Singh\u2019s wife has been deleted .<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sundari living in Delhi\nissued a hukam-nama ( Islamic type fatwa ) declared Banda &nbsp;is a Hindu and&nbsp;\nthose who will support Banda will be considered out of Sikhism.&nbsp; By now Hindu Banda was being considred as the\n11<sup>th</sup> Guru by Hindus, Sikhs and Muslims - and Sundari did NOT\nappreciate this..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>On Baisakhi of 1717\nA.D, &nbsp;when Banda sat on the throne of the\nassembly, &nbsp;stooges of Sundari - Baba Kahan\nSingh and Vinod Singh asked him to stand up shocking everybody. &nbsp;&nbsp;There\nwas commotion everywhere . <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The whole assembly was split\ninto two groups Bandai Khalsa ( Hindus and loyal Sikhs ) and Tat Khalsa ( only Sikhs ) in a most shocking manner .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Banda\nwas accused by Mata Sundari that his battles were NOT &nbsp;in consonance with the high principles of\nSikhism - and that he is now excommunicated .&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She quoted that when her &nbsp;adopted son Ajit singh went against Sikh code\nshe had disowned him too. Second wife &nbsp;Sundari\nwas barren and had only this adopted son.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It dawned on Banda that\neverything was now held in the light of the Guru lineage and Guru Khatri blood.\n&nbsp;Guru Gobind Singh\u2019s second wife ( with\nthe first wife still living ) Sundari was a Hindu , the &nbsp;daughter of Hindu Khatri Bhai Ram Saran of\nBivjara, near Hoshiarpur. &nbsp;She &nbsp;married Guru Gobind Singh at Anandpur on 4\nApril 1684.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She and her father was\nconverted to Sikhism few days before marriage. The Khalistanis have tried to\nhide this part of history, with some even claiming that Guru Gobind Singh had\nonly one wife&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On April 14th during\nthe Vaisakhi spring festival of 1699. Guru Gobind Rai took the name of Singh\nand created the Panj Pyare, a council of five to administer the immortalizing\nAmrit to Khalsa initiates. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He did this after his\nfirst wife Mata Jito Ji gave birth to her third son Fateh Singh ( February 25,\n1699 A.D.) &nbsp;Guru Gobind Singh married Mata\nJeeto Ji &nbsp;in July, 1677. &nbsp;Sundri outlived Guru Gobind Singh by 40 years \u2013the\nproof being hukkumnama letters in her own hand, where she used her powers as\nthe wife of the last Guru..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why should Khalistani historians\nsubvert history converting two women into one ? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For Guru Hargobind had\nthree wives Damodri Devi ,- Nanki Devi , Maha Devi . &nbsp;Guru Hari Rai had several wives &nbsp;. Prem Kaur , Chand Kaur , Anokhi Devi , Ram\nKaur , Laddli , Krishan Kaur and Kalyani . &nbsp;( <i>Mata\nNanaki, Mata Mahadevi, and Mata Damodari &nbsp;as per British sources </i>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharaja Ranjit Singh\nhad several&nbsp; wives\u2014some Hindu, &nbsp;some Muslim..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sundaris accusations\nand antics crushed the lion like spirit of Banda. &nbsp;Here was a petty minded woman splitting hairs, &nbsp;and ruining a movement gathering steam -- to drive away the invader Muslims from the motherland.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was like a meteor\ntill then, now extinguished by a jealous woman, who thought that he was trying\nto be the 11<sup>th</sup> Guru. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She accused him of\nignoring the guidance of the Panj Piaras. &nbsp;Banda Singh could have replied that 3 of the\nPanj Piaras dies in the the battle on the banks of Sarsa--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hOYakC1yjxk/UdlrTOJjj_I/AAAAAAAAj-Y/CJjv6HyDon8/s1600/images.jpgtvbfy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hOYakC1yjxk/UdlrTOJjj_I/AAAAAAAAj-Y/CJjv6HyDon8/s400/images.jpgtvbfy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- and &nbsp;that Bhai Daya Singh and Bhai Dharam Singh who\nwere the first and second to offer their heads on the call of the Guru Gobind\nSingh , had come to Nanded along with &nbsp;&nbsp;Guru Gobind Singh . Both of them died in\nNanded -- as they did NOT accompany Banda to Punjab.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mata Sundri was NOT\nhappy to know that Banda Singh introduced a new calendar dating from his\ncapture of Sirhind and struck coins as a mark of creating a new Hindu Kingdom . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Mata Sundri had NO power over Banda Bahadur as he was a Hindu-- but she had \"self conferred \" power over his Sikh soldiers.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She accused Banda of adopting&nbsp; \u201cfateh darshan\u201d&nbsp; in place of&nbsp;\n\u201cWaheguru ji ki fateh\u201f&nbsp; given by\nGuru Gobind Singhi.&nbsp; She even accused his\nSikh soldiers of having a longer kacha which extended below the knees-- i guess it takes a petty minded woman to point such things out..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tat Khalsa Sikhs went\nunder Mughal flag as desired by Sundari. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, only few loyal Sikhs were left with Banda\nholding the Saffron flag.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To increase his army strength\nBanda started recruiting untrained Vaishyas and Brahmans in his army from Hindu\nsociety. &nbsp;Vaishyas &nbsp;left their businesses and&nbsp; Brahmans left the temples and Vedic books. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All picked up the sword to regain Bharat Mata\nfrom the Muslim invaders. &nbsp;Some desh\nbhakt converted Indian Muslims also joined Banda . &nbsp;He tried his best to train his &nbsp;army but his army was not so strong as\nearlier.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The combined Hindu army\nwith few loyal Sikhs of Banda fought with Mughals at Nanokot. &nbsp;It was a fight to finish crusade for both the\narmies. &nbsp;It was very confusing when the\nsame passionate cries emanated from both armies.&nbsp; <i>Jai\nDharma, Jai Bharat, Jai Shri Ram, Jai Maa Kali, Har Har Mahadev&nbsp;, Allaha hu Akbar Nara e tadbir. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda Bahadur fought\ncontinually three days by sitting on the back of horse trying to raise the\nmorale of his amry. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally Banda won and\nsome Sikhs left Sundari and joined Banda. He took them back graciously. What he\ndid NOT know was that Sikh spies had now infiltrated, he knew that but could\nnot do much so as NOT to crush the morale of his forces..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda now wanted to\nconsolidate and march towards Lahore from Gurdaspur Fort. &nbsp;His &nbsp;army soon reached Batala. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\ncombined forces of Lahore and Delhi coalition forces amassed to stop Banda\u2019s\nonlasught.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda won again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda now marched\ntowards &nbsp;Gurdaspur enlisted more Hindus\nand Sikhs and reached Bagvanpure of Lahore city. &nbsp;Aslam Khan Governor of Lahore was waiting in\nambush with&nbsp; 12,000 Muslim and Pathan\nsoldiers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda fought bravely,\nleading from front . Suddenly something happened which&nbsp; broke his heart.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deceit most foul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A band of 6000 Sikhs of\nTat Khalsa ( Sundri group ) leaded by Meer Singh Khalsa in the Harwal brigade of Mughals pounced\non him flying the &nbsp;Islamic green flag. &nbsp;Brothers were killing brothers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>With the name of Guru Gobind Singh on his lips and his promise to him of the\nKhalsa , &nbsp;Banda retreated in battle for\nthe first time since he left Nanded.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">What a disgrace !!!!.&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the sole reason\nwhy Maharaja Ranjit Singh never trusted Sikhs alone in his army .&nbsp; He had Hindus and Muslims and even white\nGenerals with him.&nbsp; He had may wives and\nhe did NOT care too much for holy principles. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda then wrote letter\nto the Tat Khalsa head and to Sundri , that Hindus must remember that they took\nup arms and became Sikhs only to protect Bharatmata from the foreign Mughal\nrulers. He pleaded for sanity. He even quoted from the Mahabharata &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda letter was read aloud\nin the Tat Khalsa community. Some had a change of heart and &nbsp;supported him but final verdict was against\nhim . A young Sikh shouted that &nbsp;Mughals\nare not betraying us its Banda who is doing so. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyway, Banda won this battle\ntoo and the Tat Khalsa soldiers who were once in his army were put to the\nsword.,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then marched towards\nKalanaur. &nbsp;The Nawab Fatedeen\nsurrendered. &nbsp;Then, Sialkot was taken\nwithout any bloodshed because the Nawab ran away. &nbsp;Banda then took Wajirabad and captured large tracts\nof Gujarat .. He then captured Pothothar (now Islamabad).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, the entire\nImperial force was organized to defeat and kill Banda Singh. It was do or die\nfor the Mughals . &nbsp;In March 1715, Banda\nSingh Bahadur was in the village of Gurdas Nangal, Gurdaspur, Punjab, when the\narmy under charge of the Governor of Lahore &nbsp;Abdus Samad Khan, the Moghul king of Delhi\nlaid siege . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda and his army defended\nthe small Gurdas Nangal fort for eight months. Then food and water ( poisoned )\nsoon ran out. &nbsp;There was NO option.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 7, 1715 Banda\nSingh Bahadur was captured and put in an iron cage. &nbsp;The nemesis of Muslim invaders for so 9 years &nbsp;, was now a caged animal. The 780 starving and\ndehydrated survivors out of the original 12000 in his army was captured,\nchained.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qn5oPLvy8Iw/UdlwNCTC_9I/AAAAAAAAj_A/Y81i5db_S1A/s1600/Massacr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qn5oPLvy8Iw/UdlwNCTC_9I/AAAAAAAAj_A/Y81i5db_S1A/s400/Massacr.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above : Convert to Islam or die.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2,000 Sikh and Hindu heads\nhung on Muslim spears, and 700 cartloads of heads of slaughtered Sikhs used to\nterrorize the population. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the way to\nDelhi Muslims threw rotten vegetables on Banda , danced and distributed sweets.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Guru Gobind made an\nimportant concession for Banda. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda\nwas a vegetarian being a Hindu Bairagi saint while the Sikhs ate Jhatka meat. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keeping in view the susceptibilities of\nBairagi followers of Banda Singh, Guru Gobind Singh ordained that henceforth only\nvegetarian food can be served in the Guru ka Langar would cater to the people\nof all faiths. Guru Gobind appointed Banda Singh on Kartik Sudi 3, BK. 1765\n(October 5, 1708.).</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus and Sikhs wept inside their &nbsp;houses. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emperor Farukhusear ordered his Qazi to start\nthe sharia Islamic court. Qazi put his condition that Banda\u2019s life can be\nspared if he accepted Islam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On their firm refusal\nall of them were ordered to be executed. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every day, 100 Sikhs\nwere brought out of the fort and murdered in public. This went on for a week. &nbsp;On June 9, 1716, Banda Singh\u2019s eyes were\ngouged, his limbs were severed, his skin removed, and then he was killed. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims thronged to see\nif his tantric powers &nbsp;existed . Red hot\npliers were inserted inside the body of Banda. Small chunks of his flesh was\ntaken away in slow torture. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hWkcYl-xdPk/Udlv5vSapbI/AAAAAAAAj-4/3Drr2tf7PA4/s1600/images.jpgf432.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"295\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hWkcYl-xdPk/Udlv5vSapbI/AAAAAAAAj-4/3Drr2tf7PA4/s400/images.jpgf432.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda Singh never cried\nout in pain even when he was scalped ( hair with scalp shorn off leaving a\nbloody skull ) &nbsp;.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gg1UklBW6Wg/UdlvvJHCMFI/AAAAAAAAj-w/-IAr-UJRz-c/s1600/images.jpgyufvu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gg1UklBW6Wg/UdlvvJHCMFI/AAAAAAAAj-w/-IAr-UJRz-c/s400/images.jpgyufvu.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Banda had kept his\npromise of Khalsa to his friend Guru Gobind Singh and was on his path to Moksha. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sundri had accused\nBanda of drifting away from &nbsp;Guru\u2019s\nteachings and Khalsa tradition by forming a new maryada. &nbsp;&nbsp;She had\nfalsely accused him of adopting \u201c Fateh Darshan\u201d instead of the &nbsp;traditional \u201cWaheguru ji ka Khalsa\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why not? &nbsp;&nbsp;Banda though\nhelping Guru Gobind\u2019s cause after coming out of sanyas of several years on\nrequest &nbsp;, was NOT a baptized Sikh\u2014and he\nwas NOT at the mercy of this woman..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was obvious to all\nthat Mata Sundari ji, &nbsp;was goaded by Emperor\nFarukhsyar, &nbsp;to send a letter to Banda to\nstop his attacks on Mughals in lieu of some concessions and sops. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FDx36onzHR8/UdpoAgnv0rI/AAAAAAAAkBo/r74GQKBl0ZM/s1600/dwq.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FDx36onzHR8/UdpoAgnv0rI/AAAAAAAAkBo/r74GQKBl0ZM/s400/dwq.jpg\" width=\"313\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Above: &nbsp;If this woman , the second wife of Guru Gobind Singh had NOT divided Banda's army-- &nbsp;after the Mughals were driven away, the British would have been driven away too -- and India would have been free of all invaders 220 years before.</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She did NOT have the\ncommonsense to understand that on one hand, Moguls were promising grant and\nsafe passage to Sikhs\u2014while on the other hand, they were offering a fixed price\nfor every Sikh head taken to their Muslim governors.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Khalistanis have\ntried to discredit Banda Bahadur . They write false stories of how Banda \u2018s\nwife ( he never married ) a girl from Chamba , was captured by the Mughals and\nshe willingly became a Muslim and entered the \u2018harem\u2019 of a Muslim noble. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I do NOT want to say\nhere what my Pakistani officers told about the status of Mata Sundri under the\npatronage of the Muslim invaders &nbsp;\u2014this will\ncause a heart ache to the desh Bhakt Sikhs. &nbsp;&nbsp;Let it\nbe.&nbsp; Mughals also kept records NOT just\nguerilla Sikhs .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till today nobody has\nseen the Hukamnama written by Mata Sundriji &nbsp;addressed to Banda . &nbsp;What happened to it? &nbsp;I have been trying to locate this letter for several\nyears now. &nbsp;The first available Hukamnama\nof Mata Sundriji is dated 1717 about a year after the death of Banda Singh\nBahadur.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It must be known that\nmany Sikhs in those days were in the pay of Moghuls and worked against the\nSikhs fighting Moghul tyranny. Just like how Muslims were in the pay of\nMaharaja Ranjit Singh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hukamnama is a Islamic\nword , meaning same as Fatwa. All Mata Sundri\u2019s hukamnama\u2019s started with the\nwords- SRI MATA JI DI AGYA HAI <i>(&nbsp; the holy mother thus commands</i> ) . &nbsp;Her fatwa included one which reminds Sikhs\nthat the Guru had&nbsp; bestowed Patshahi\n(Rule or Sovereignty) on the Panth and not on any individual , like Banda.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>The British invader tried his best to make A FAKE HINDU POPE write such fatwas . Till Independence it worked from FAKE mutt - Kanchi .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Not any more.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Punch into Google search-</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>KANCHI MUTT , A CREATION OF THE WHITE INVADER FOR DIVIDE AND\nRULE VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">After the martyrdom of\nBanda Bahadur, a Hindu Baba Amar Chand Nibber had assumed the supreme\nleadership of the Bandai Khalsa faction. &nbsp;Just like Banda Bahadur this man was a natural leader. He was&nbsp; extremely ferocious with a&nbsp; athletic physique and was a majestic 6 feet 7\ninches in height. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was so\nstrong that he could continuously wield a 22 kilo sword from morning till\nevening \u2014 while a normal soldier could NOT go more than 30 minutes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me talk about white skinned historians imported to drive a wedge between Hindus and Sikhs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>A common British fear was\nthat a warrior class Sikhism was by Hindus by donating the eldest male child , &nbsp;created solely to fight Islamic invaders was bound to turn\nagainst Christian invaders sooner than later &nbsp;\u2013 &nbsp;which has to be stopped at all costs. </b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">In the bargain if they\ncould turn these gullible, \u201cnot so bright\u201d rustic Sikhs against the mother religion Hindusim\nby \u201cdivide and rule \u201c , &nbsp;by giving them a holy book like Koran/ Bible it would be the best thing to happen.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
