WHAT COULD BE WORSE ?<br /><br />TO CONQUER A NATION, FIRST YOU HAVE TO MAKE IT IMPLODE FROM WITHIN.. FIRST LOWER THE MORALE OF THE PEOPLE .. MAKE PEOPLE SELF LOATHING..<br /><br />IT IS EASY FOR SINGLE MESSIAH/ SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS TO BRAINWASH PEOPLE BY MAKING THEM FANATICS..<br /><br />THIS IS A TRUE INCIDENT--<br /><br />A RUSTIC SARDARJEE FROM SOME REMOTE TARN TARAN TYPE VILLAGE WENT TO CHANDIGARH TO BUY SOMETHING .. HE GOT OFF THE BUS..<br /><br />INSIDE THE CITY , HE WAS FOOT SLOGGING AS HE DID NOT HAVE MONEY FOR A TAXI ..<br /><br />HE ASKED A BUNCH OF NAUGHTY SCHOOL CHILDREN THE WAY TO THE SHOP HE WANTED TO GO TO..<br /><br />THEY GAVE HIM WRONG DIRECTIONS ..<br /><br />THE SAME CHILDREN THEN RAN AND SAT AT THE NEW DESTINATION AWAITING THE SARDARJEE .<br /><br />THE RUSTIC GULLIBLE SARDARJEE ASKED THE SAME CHILDREN THE SAME QUESTION<br /><br />THE NAUGHTY CHILDREN DID THE SAME -- GAVE HIM NEW FALSE INSTRUCTIONS..<br /><br />IT HAPPENED AGAIN AND AGAIN AND FINALLY THE NAIVE SARDARJEE ARRIVED AT THE SAME PLACE WHERE HE FIRST MET THE PRANKSTER CHILDREN ..<br /><br />THEY HID BEHIND A WALL AND WERE WATCHING HIM MERRILY \u2026<br /><br />POOR SARDARJEE REALISED THAT HE WAS BACK AT SQUARE ONE .<br /><br />HE WAS TIRED AND FRUSTRATED AND HE WAS A BIT FRIGHTENED AS IT WAS GETTING DARK..<br /><br />AT THAT TIME , A MUNCIPALITY WORKER ARRIVED WITH A LARGE SPANNER, TO RELEASE WATER BY OPENING A WHEELLESS VALVE ( WATER RATIONING ) ..<br /><br />AS HE WAS TURNING IT THE SARDARJEE GOT TERRIBLY ANGRY, RAN TO HIM AND STARTED BEATING HIM UP .. CRYING<br />\" MAIN SUBEH SEH PRESHAAANN HOON, SAALA MERE KOH TU CHOOTIYA BANAH RAHE HOH, TU RASTA GHUMAAH RAHE HOH ? \"<br /><br />THIS IS THE EFFECT OF TOO MUCH BLIND FAITH..<br /><br />WHEN GURU NANAK WENT TO MECCA-- HE WAS SLEEPING BEFORE HE WENT TO THE KAABA..<br /><br />ONE RUFFIAN ISLAMIC MULLAH GANG WITH SWORDS ACCUSED HIM OF SLEEPING WITH LEGS TOWARDS THE KAABA AND DISRESPECTING ALLAH ..<br /><br />SO GURU NANAK TOLD THEM-- PLEASE HOLD MY FEET AND TURN IT IN ANY DIRECTION WHERE KAABA DOES NOT EXIST.<br /><br />SO THE MUSLIM GANG KEEP GHUMAAOING GURU NANAKS BODY -- BUT THE WHOLE OF MECCA ROTATED ALONG WITH GURU NANAKs BODY..<br /><br />YOU GO TO ANY VILLAGE IN PUNJAB --ASK ANY RUSTIC SARDARJEE --HE WILL TELL YOU THE SAME STORY WITH GREAT RELIGIOUS FERVOUR.. HE IS PROUD OF GURU NANAH AND WAHEGURU..<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD USED THIS SIKH PRIDE TO CALL THE HOLY BOOK GURU GRANTH SABIH AS THE ELEVENTH GURU.. THIS HOLY BOOK WAS CREATED BY A WHITE JEW WEARING TURBAN NAMED MAX ARTHUR MACAULIFFE , A ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD THEN MADE DOZENS OF COPIES OF THIS HOLY BOOK AND TOOK IT TO EVERY WAR ZONE OF WW2 WHERE SIKHS FOUGHT..<br /><br />IF A WHITE SOLDIER DID NOT STAND UP AND SALUTE WHEN THIS VENERABLE BOOK WENT PAST, HE WOULD BE WHIPPED BY A SIKH..<br /><br />A CRYPTO JEW SIKH WEARING TURBAN WOULD BE IN CHARGE OF THIS BOOK , AND TREATED THE BOOK AS A LIVING ORACLE..<br />SIKHS WERE USED AS CANNON FODDER-- AS THEY BELIEVED THE ORACLE \"IF YOU FIGHT WITH THE NAME OF WAHEGURU ON YOUR LIPS , YOU SHALL WIN THIS BATTLE \"..<br /><br />SAB KO CHOOTIYA BANAAAYA... GANDHI WAS IN CAHOOTS..<br /><br />Gandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .<br /><br />Gandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.<br /><br /><br />TILL CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL EXHUMED THE NUMBER OF INDIAN SOLDIERS KILLED -NOBODY EVEN KNEW .. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen the scriptural studies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received blessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha (householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children and wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's stage.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1 - 3.IX.31 5000 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT IS THE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN HINDUISM \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN GRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS WAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE CAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS DHARMA .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe 7000 year old Vedas lay down that dharma performed by a man alone without his wife is no dharma and will yield no fruit whatsoever. Such is the paramount nature of Grihasta ashrama.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Vedas hold marriage to be one of the important sacraments sanctifying the body. That is why; marriage is given great importance by the Hindus.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is said, \u201cThat man who does not win a wife is really half, and he is not the full man as long as he does not beget an offspring.\u201d A wife is also hailed as\u201d the very source of the Purusharthas, not Only of Dharma, Artha and Kama but even of Moksha.\u2019</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindu god had his wife almost as a part of him, not as a shadow.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nShiva is powerless without Shakti.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarriage in Sanatana Dharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindus man is compulsorily expected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never mind what FREEMASON and Jew Rothschild\u2019s UNMARRIED Vivekananda said .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Vedas ordain that dharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma, marriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>Manu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken will have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during the grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. During Sanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe early shastras permit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of choosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait for three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for their marriage, but no more.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma marriages are made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) and examining if the wife can indeed give him a good blow job whenever he wants it\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n--or vice versa--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nif the husband can use his tongue power on her fungi affected , smelling like putrid fish part whenever she wishes .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy own marriage was arranged.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy elder son\u2019s marriage was arranged</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN OUR FAMILY THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN CAESARIAN BIRTHS \u2013THOUGH INDIA WAS THE FIRST TO DO THIS SURGICAL PROCEDURE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS ROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND HISTORIANS WHO GAVE UNWARRANTED PROPAGANDA FOR UNMARRIED HINDU GURUS ( I AM SURE YOU KNOW WHO THEY ARE ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA LOT OF THESE UNMARRIED FAKE GURUS WERE CRYPTO JEW HOMOSEXUALS - -- OR JUST FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS OF THE WHITE INVADER - THEY ARE HEROES IN YOUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is the white invader who wrote lies that Hindus ill treat women and suppress them. IT COULD HAPPEN ONLY BECAUSE THESE VERSES HAD DIVINE MATH\nEMBEDDED.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES ,\nPASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL,\nPRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY WE HINDUS INSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED\nFROM AKASHA.. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED\nIN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM\nSCREEN.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT\nWHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION (\nPRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR\nWILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSFORMER ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS\nWAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS\nNAME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY\nSHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY VISHNU HAS MORTAL AVATARS --SHIVA AND BRAHMA CANNOT\nHAVE MORTAL AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL\nHAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA\n.. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES--\nHE DID IT AND HOW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX\nWITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5\nPANDAVAS TOO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY\nKRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nSTAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH\n--THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE\nDECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST\nASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS\n\"PURGATORY\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE\nRIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS\nWHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN\nHAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:47 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE OTHER FAKE GURU AND RASCAL SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TOLD ON\nNDTV THAT SANATANA DHARMA ALOWS HOMOSEXUALITY . HAVE YOU HEARD THE VOICE OF\nTHIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; The white invader converted Bharata into a MUNI ( sage ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE ANCESTOR OF PANDAVAS AND KAURAVAS WAS BHARATA ( 8165 BC ) SON OF RISHABHA (8190 BC ) AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</b></span></div>\n<br />\nThe story of Shakuntala has been added as an appendage in the Mahabharata ( Adiparva chapter ) by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO JEW Raja Ravi Varma who painted the non-existent Radha ( mistress of Lord Krishna ) does the honours for Shakuntala too.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is considered as the first Thirthankara. Mahavira was the 24th Thirthankara..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PUT MONKEY HANUMAN ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT.. THE REAL FLAG WAS KRISHNAs FLAG EMBLAZONED WITH VISHNUs CARRIER GARUDA..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE TEMPLE FOR HANUMAN , THE GOD OF THE DEVADASIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nEINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. />\n\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0936\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u093e\u0924\u0947 />\nh\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u012bke\u015bha\u1e41 tad\u0101 v\u0101kyam idam \u0101ha mah\u012b-pate<br />\n<br />\natha\u2014thereupon; vyavasthit\u0101n\u2014arrayed; d\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u1e6dv\u0101\u2014seeing; dh\u0101rtar\u0101\u1e63h\u1e6dr\u0101n\u2014Dhritarashtra\u2019s sons; kapih-dwaja\u1e25\u2014the Monkey Bannered (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) ; prav\u1e5bitte\u2014about to commence; \u015bhastra-samp\u0101te\u2014to use the weapons; dhanu\u1e25\u2014bow; udyamya\u2014taking up; p\u0101\u1e47\u1e0dava\u1e25\u2014Arjun, the son of Pandu; h\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u012bke\u015bham\u2014to Shree Krishna; tad\u0101\u2014at that time; v\u0101kyam\u2014words; idam\u2014these; \u0101ha\u2014said; mah\u012b-pate\u2014King<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 1.20: At that time, the son of Pandu, Arjun, who had the insignia of Hanuman (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) on the flag of his chariot, took up his bow. Seeing your sons arrayed against him, O King, Arjun then spoke the following words to Shree Krishna.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH DWAJAH IS NOT MONKEY FLAG</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH MEANS VISHNU\u2014</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cKAPIH DWAJAH\u201d MEANS VISHNUs BANNER \u2013 GARUDA</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">KAPIH&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( sun ) is one of the 1008 names of Vishnu in Vishnu Sahasranamah</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KAPI MEANS BROWN.<br />IN MALAYALAM WE CALL IT COFFEE COLOUR.<br />KAPI DOES NOT MEAN MONKEY IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT</span></b><br />\n<br />\n###################3<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO TELL ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHCHILD NEVER EXPECTED A BLOGGER CAPTAIN IN TOWN !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; KALIDASA WHO CREATED SHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED...<br />\n<br />\nKALIDASA WAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD .. TO HIJACK ANCIENT INDIAN HISTORY.. TO SHOW THAT BIG BAND OF BIBLE IN 4004 BC IS RELEVANT..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE TRUTH?<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA WAS SON OF EMPEROR RISHABHA WAS WAS BORN IN 8190 BC.. RISHABHA WAS THE SON OF NABHI RAJA..GRANDSON OF AGNIDHARA , GREAT GRANDSON OF PRIYA VARTA ( 8255 BC )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA + RISHABHA ( BHARATARSHABHA ) RULED THE WHOLE PLANET...<br />\n<br />\nRISHABHA NAMED HIS SON BHARATA AFTER THE LAND OF BHARATA<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA THE LAND MASS IS DERIVED FROM THE SHABDHA BRAHMAN TERM ( BHAVA + RAGA + TALA ) BHA + RA + TA !!<br />\n<br />\nIN BHAGAWAD GITA KRISHNA CALLS ARJUNA BHARATARSHABHA --AND THIS HAS BEEN TRANSLATELY WRONLY BY EVER BODY AS -- O BULL AMONG BHARATAS..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nBHARATARSHABHA MEANS FIRST NAME BHARAT + SURNAME RISHABHA ..<br />\n<br />\nPOOR JAINS DONT EVEN KNOW THEIR OWN HISTORY..<br />\n<br />\nIF I DONT REVEAL THIS--IT WILL NEVER BE REVEALED TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA..<br />\n<br />\nAND I HAVE HALF A MIND NOT TO REVEAL IT AS JAINS HAVE BEEN TRAITORS TO BHARATAMATA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RICHEST JAINS ARE CRYPTO JEWS WHO RUN THE DIAMOND MAFIA IN ANTWERP AND DUBAI-- WHO HAVE BUILD AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES FOR GHANSHYAM PANDE..<br />\n<br />\nBUDDHISM DIED IN INDIA BUT IT FLOURISHED ABROAD..<br />\n<br />\nJAINISM NEVER WENT ABROAD..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VARDHAMANA MAHAVIRA IS JUST THE 24TH THIRTHANKARA<br /><br />THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA IS ACTUALLY BAHUBALI SON OF RISHBHA , SON OF SUNANDA, BROTHER OF SUNDARI-- AND HALF BROTHER OF BHARATA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nHOW WAS JAINISM BORN?</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">The white historian has put Mahavira as a contemporary of Buddha at 599 BC. This is wrong . First of all Mahavira was just a reformer. He was the 24th Thirtankara . And he was born in 4500 BC.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">IN REALITY BAHUBALI IS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA..</span><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.23 %..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BUT BAHUBALI BECAME A MONK AND HIS USELESS SON SOMAKRITI HAD NO CHILDREN\u2026<br /><br />THIS WHY JAINS CHOSE HIS FATHER THE GREAT EMPEROR RISHABHA AS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA ( OPPORTUNISM AT ITS BEST )<br /><br />THERE WAS A SCHISM IN THE ROYAL BLOODLINE\u2014AS MAHUBALI AND HIS HALF BROTHER HAD A FIGHT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Bharata was chosen by Emperor Rishabha to be his successor as he was loved by all and was level headed. Bahubali was an expert in Ayurveda and spent most of his time in Kerala learning Kalari ..</span></div>\n<br />\nAfter conquering the whole Bharata sent a communication to his brothers to accept his order. After an initial hesitation 98 brothers accepted Bharata\u2019s order.. .<br />\n<br />\nNow Bahubali ( son of Sunanda ) was left. When the messenger came to him with message he said \u2013 \u201cO messenger! Go and tell your emperor Bharat that Bahubali isn\u2019t like his brothers who became Sadhus leaving the kingdom.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_142BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536514399857#c4474020595891003887\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 9, 2018 at 11:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_141MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nFinally emperor Bharat attacked on Takshshila kingdom of Bahubali. Army of both sides fought hard. Sometimes army of Bharat dominated army of Bahubali and sometimes vice versa.<br />\n<br />\nSeeing mass destruction in war it was decided that there should be a single combat between Bharat and Bahubali . One who wins will be the only Chakravarti or \"Emperor of Emperors\".<br />\n<br />\nIn all the stages of battle Bharat had to face terrible defeat at the hands of his younger brother Bahubali in all these fights.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a point came that Bahubali must give a lethal strike on his elder half brother Bharata, he raised his hand . He felt that his own sister Sundari and step sister Brahmi ( of script Brahmi Lipi fame ) were on the side of Bharata.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of giving the final fatal blow, he suddenly uprooted a large tuft of hair from his own head instead, thus declaring himself as a monk, stunning all .<br />\n<br />\nAfter ruling for several years Bharata also became a wandering saint, like his father and brother..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Bahubali spent many years in meditation and severe penance. He was unable to become a Jivan Mukt as his enemity with Bharata scorched his soul..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\nBut one fine day Bharata came to him ,( standing naked and doing tapasya totally entangled in creepers )and worshipped him\u2014and his ego left him and he attained instant moksha ..</span><br />\nBAHUBALIs STATUE IS AT SHRAVANABELAGOLA KARNATAKA .\u2014IT IS A PLACE OF PILGRIMAGE FOR JAINS<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jim7QdrYmyg<br />\n<br />\nSPREAD THIS TRUTH AMONG JAINS\u2026<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0927\u093e \u092d\u091c\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u092e\u093e\u0902 \u091c\u0928\u093e: \u0938\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u093f\u0928\u094b\u093d\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928 |<br />\n\u0906\u0930\u094d\u0924\u094b \u091c\u093f\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0938\u0941\u0930\u0930\u094d\u0925\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925\u0940 \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u0940 \u091a&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; Most of\nthese peptides are converted in to amino acids to be absorbed by the blood\nstream. But all peptides do not get broken down in to amino acids to get\nabsorbed.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some are excreted in our stools and some manage to get through the leaks\nin gut wall in to the blood stream while still in peptide form. A1 milk\nreleases in human body the peptide called BCM7 (Betacasomorphine 7). This is an\nopium family substance, and has been associated with a very large number of serious\ndiseases. One liter A1 Milk contains24-32gms of casein of which 9 to12 grams is\nBCM7 ( about two tea spoons).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The humped Indian cows\nhave a pleasant smell , while the humpless cows give a repulsive odour. &nbsp;&nbsp;Indian\ncows have a shiny appearance and not a furry texture &nbsp;like the humpless cows \u2013 Cows skin should have\nshort glossy hair with greasy appearance which acts as an insect repellent. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you rub your hands on the Indian cow, a\nslight oily sheen created by the cow\u2019s sebum glands stick to your hands. This\nprevents any dirt clinging on to the body. The western cow\u2019s ass is always\nsmudged with sh#t.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hooves of Indian cows are small in size\nand the rear hooves split should be very close to each other. &nbsp;It should not be wide open. &nbsp;Indian cattle have developed strong hooves to\nwalk on uneven and rocky terrain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Since 99% of magnesium resides inside living cells,\nblood serum levels are not a good indicator of magnesium deficiency.&nbsp; Ionized magnesium testing is the only\neffective way of diagnosing accurate magnesium levels in the body. Gastrointestinal proteolytic digestion of A1 variant of \u03b2-casein\n(raw/processed milk) leads to generation of bioactive peptide, beta casomorphin\n7 (BCM7 ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gene encoding\nbeta-casein was changed such that the 67th amino acid in the 209 amino acid\nchain that is the beta-casein protein was switched from proline to histidine. &nbsp;This new kind of beta-casein that was created\nis known as A1 beta-casein, and is generally more common in many of the big\nblack-and-white cow breeds of European descent such as the Holstein and\nFriesian. Indian humped cows have uniform colour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beta casein protein is\na long chain of amino acids, 209 to be precise. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c848436323467207348\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255695582#c848436323467207348\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:31 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://twitter.com/mkatju/status/1012424805239349249</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS MORON IS BACK ON SOCIAL MEDIA AFTER A HIATUS..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5 HUMPED COWS IN ONE ACRE OF LAND CAUSED INDIAs TOP SOIL TO BECOME SIX FEET DEEP AND HOLY --PRODUCING FOOD WITH GOLDEN MEAN ( 1.618 ) INHERENT..</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WITH GREEN REVLUTION OF DESH DROHI MS SWAMINATHAN AND RAMPANT USES OF ARTIFICIAL FERTLISERS --NOW OUR TOP SOIL IS JUST A FEW INCHES THICK--IT IS THIRST FOR WATER AND PRODUCED FOOD WHICH CAUSES DISEASES.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">90% OF HUMAN DISEASES ORIGINATE IN THE HUMAN GUT AS PER 6200 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA TEXT CHARAKA SAMHITA..</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026\u2026</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus\u2026\u2026.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COMPOST IS NOT HUMUS\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi)\u2026\u2026..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Toxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026 Priceless snake grove soil was the BANK FOR AYURVEDIC HERBS ..</span></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026 Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Better soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026 Humus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..Humus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition\u2026.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_66T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"></span></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TD\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_66TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_66TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span id=\"bc_0_68b+seedVbGD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1413190284692248433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_28.html?showComment=1530255759317#c1413190284692248433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 29, 2018 at 12:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. .<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRECENTLY OUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ( WHICH PRODUCES BIOCHAR ) BECAUSE OF DELHI SMOG\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF THIS IS THE CASE SHIFT THE CAPITAL OF INDIA TO A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPERATURE INVERSION\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ..<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding.... Biochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared due to artificial nitro fertIliser overuse. ..<br />\n<br />\nALL ABOVE HAS BEEN SENT TO MODI AND HIS MINISTERS MORE THAN 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES ?..<br />\n<br />\nMODI GIVES US MORE AND MORE JAANKARI ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEKDAR ..<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY MODI WAS RECITING SOME KABIRDAS SHLOKA (&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>HOY KOY SHIT</b></span>&nbsp;) ..<br />\n<br />\nKABIRDAS NEVER EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil ..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_66MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_66BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; THE ONLY WAY TODAY TO RETARD BRAIN DEGRADATION IS TO CONSUME HALF A TEASPOON OF FRESH GOMUTRA ..<br /><br />THE DUNG OF HUMPED COW HAS BEEN USED FOR MILLENNIUMS TO KEEP AWAY NEGATIVE ENERGIES AND HAS BEEN USED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR HOLY GANGES WATER WHICH CONTAIN NANO SILVER COLLOIDS AND BACTERIOPHAGES .. ONLY GANGES WATER HAS NANO SILVER COLLOIDS AND BACTERIOPHAGES ..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br /><br />NANO COLLOIDS OF GOLD ( HUMPED COW URINE ) AND SILVER ( GANGA WATER ) CAN BREACH THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER. THIS IS NO SUPERSTITION..<br /><br />THE WEST NOW CRAVE TO EAT INDIAN HUMPED COW BEEF AS THE MEAT IS NOT TOXIC FOR THE BRAIN..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/gomutra-drinking-cows-urine-as-elexir.html</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/12/shocking-legacy-of-mad-cow-disease-capt.html</span><br /><br />HUMPLESS JERSEY/ HOLSTEN COW TOXIC A1 MILK IS THE REASON WHY KOSHER EVIL PHARMA DOCTORS AND HOSPITALS THRIVE IN INDIA..<br /><br />MODI MUST KNOW THAT VISIBLE SMOKE IS HARMLESS .. INVISIBLE NANO CARBON LADEN SMOKE INVADES THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER AND CAUSES SERIOUS DISEASES WHICH MAKES KOSHER EVIL PHARMA AND KOSHER INSURANCE COMPANIES SING ALL THE WAY TO THE BANK..<br /><br
