, serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">KANCHIPURAM MATH A FAKE\n&nbsp;CREATION BY BRITISH EAST INDIA COMPANY</span> ,\n&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND HIS FOUR MUTTS</span>, &nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">SRINGERI\n&nbsp;MUTT SHAKHA RELOCATED FROM KUMBAKONAM TO\nKANCHI WITH BRITISH CONNIVANCE</span> &nbsp;, &nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">FALSE FLAG ROTHSCHILD ATTACK ON SRINGERI MUTT\nIN 1791 TO STEAL BOOKS&nbsp;</span></b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2013 &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N-lWwbyoFOk/UcdNrCgNOBI/AAAAAAAAjco/dsZHv51__p8/s1600/220px-Vidyasankara.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N-lWwbyoFOk/UcdNrCgNOBI/AAAAAAAAjco/dsZHv51__p8/s400/220px-Vidyasankara.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><i>Above : Sarada Mutt Sringeri .</i></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We just had the\nKedarnath floods where the Samadhi of Adi Shankaracharya behind the Kedarnath\nTemple was washed away. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-djRI5Eid8s8/UcdUSDseDLI/AAAAAAAAjdA/eD6bafxzVcE/s1600/800px-JyothirMutt.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-djRI5Eid8s8/UcdUSDseDLI/AAAAAAAAjdA/eD6bafxzVcE/s400/800px-JyothirMutt.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><b>Above: Jothir Mutt Badrinath.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vSmxln5drnA/UcdUlhVpq6I/AAAAAAAAjdI/LlGZ3EVcqFM/s1600/Goverdhana_matha.jpgpuri.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vSmxln5drnA/UcdUlhVpq6I/AAAAAAAAjdI/LlGZ3EVcqFM/s400/Goverdhana_matha.jpgpuri.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><b>Above: Goverdhan Mutt Puri</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bpKRAYP0DZg/UcdUzvpwFrI/AAAAAAAAjdQ/jlsGwuwzybo/s1600/3501729592_adi-sankaracharya-108-13.jpgDWARKA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"243\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bpKRAYP0DZg/UcdUzvpwFrI/AAAAAAAAjdQ/jlsGwuwzybo/s400/3501729592_adi-sankaracharya-108-13.jpgDWARKA.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><b>Above: Kalika Mutt Dwaraka</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each mutt was assigned\none Veda. The mutts are Jyothir Mutt at Badrinath in northern India with\nAtharva Veda; Sarada Mutt at Sringeri in southern India with Yajur Veda;\nGovardhan Mutt at Jaganath Puri in eastern India with Rig Veda and Kalika Mutt\nat Dwarka in western India with Sama Veda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It will well known that\nAdi Shankaracharya attained Moksha at Kedarnath temple 4000 years ago at the\nage of 32. Before Adi Shankaracharya died, he established four Mutts to\npropagate Vedanta and the Advaita form of Hindusim at Sringeri, Dwarka, Puri\nand Badrinath.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But I can see several\nposts on the Internet , which lies that Adi Shankaracharya died at Kanchi Mutt.\nThere are no record anywhere in India of a Kanchi Mutt or a Kanchi shakha of\nSringeri Mutt .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1839 AD, the head of\nthe Kumbhakonam shakha of the Sringeri mutt was told by Rothschild to apply for\npermission to the English Collector to perform the kumbhabhishekam of the\nKamakshi temple in Kanchipuram.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole idea was to divide and rule. The\nTamil Iyers were given plum administrative posts in the British government for\nbeing traitors to India and to Hinduism. &nbsp;Tamil Iyers who were just 2% of the population\nthose days , discriminated against the rest 98%. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nwas the main reason a lot of dalits became atheists ( like EVR Periyar ) and\nconverted to Christianity and Islam. All this broke Hindu unity and thus it was\neasier for the British to control the area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sringeri Mutt , the\nsouthernmost Mutt where Adi Shankaracharya spent 12 years of his adult life\nlater on had a minor shakha or branch at Kumbakonam. &nbsp;&nbsp;Such\nshakhas are very common for there are 5 Adi Sankaracharya mutts around Sringeri\nitself at Kudali, Avani, Pushpagiri, Virupksha and Sankeshwar.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zXD_-nAQ-9I/UcdYwFKhQ6I/AAAAAAAAjd8/Wshk5QQ7IP4/s1600/sringeri-8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zXD_-nAQ-9I/UcdYwFKhQ6I/AAAAAAAAjd8/Wshk5QQ7IP4/s400/sringeri-8.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Above : Sringeri Mutt</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their endeavor to do\nDIVIDE AND RULE , the owners of British East India Company who ruled India , German\nJew Rothschild conducted a false flag attack on Sringeri Mutt in 1791 using\ntheir mercenary Laman regiment. Laman is son of Lehi for the Jews . &nbsp;Lehi is the \u201cwarrior for Jerusalem\u201d. The\ntreasures in Sringeri Mutt was looted . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was immoral\npolitical treachery to divide and rule and to drive a wedge between the\nordinary Hindu Kannada citizens and the Hindu Marathas , with added benefit of\nthe Hindu Marathas suspecting Muslim Tipu Sultan . &nbsp;Tipu Sultan also denied that\nhe attacked Sringeri Mutt. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>All the rare\nSanskrit manuscripts in Math , Science, Astronomy and original copies of\nUpanishads were stolen from Sringeri Mutt.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The Muslim would burn it, he wont\nsteal. &nbsp;Hindus would neither steal nor burn.</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these manuscripts were used in\nEurope later to steal knowledge and patent it in the names of the white\nChristians and Jews. These precious books were kept in the Sringeri library as\nthe monastery is devoted to Goddess Saraswati, the goddess of learning.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shocked Pathwardhans\npromptly denied this attack on Sringeri Mutt . &nbsp;It was like cutting their own feet, it made no\nsense. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you, Maratha Pathwardhan\nclan were once stooges of the British rulers . &nbsp;A person no less than Arthur Wellesley called\nthe Patwardhans \"the most ancient friends that the British Government have\nin the Maratha Empire\u201d . The British signed the &nbsp;Treaty of Salbai on May 17, 1782, with the\nMarathas, as an ally against Tipu Sultan.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were two Maratha\nkingdoms nearby. The Peshwa Pathwardhan clan and the Bhonsle clan ruling\nTanjore , currently part of Tamil Nadu..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6u2cvLrpmtg/UcdZ3gQvDyI/AAAAAAAAjec/TCXSv4w67T8/s1600/Tanjore_Maratha_Kingdom.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6u2cvLrpmtg/UcdZ3gQvDyI/AAAAAAAAjec/TCXSv4w67T8/s1600/Tanjore_Maratha_Kingdom.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the time of this\nattack Rothschild was trying to oust the Maratha king Amar Singh (Ramaswami\nAmarasimha Bhonsle) from Tanjore kingdom, in order to install their puppet king\nSerfoji Bhonsle&nbsp; who was under the care\nof German Jew Freidrich Schwartzenberg.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rtpuCLW1Pzo/UcdY682PkNI/AAAAAAAAjeE/a1PSfAAEN5M/s1600/sringeri-14.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"221\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rtpuCLW1Pzo/UcdY682PkNI/AAAAAAAAjeE/a1PSfAAEN5M/s400/sringeri-14.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above: Sringeri Mutt</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally they got him on the throne of\nTanjore on June 29, 1798.&nbsp; In return for\ntheir assistance, Serfoji was forced to cede the administration of the Kingdom\nto the British and, in return, was granted an annual pension of 100,000 star\npagodas and one-fifth of the state's land revenue.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serfoji's sovereignty was\nrestricted to the Fort of Thanjavur and its surrounding areas and he goes down\nin history as the last sovereign ruler of Thanjavur (Tanjore ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has always been the endeavor\nof the British historian assisted by BR Ambedkar to prove that Buddha was born\nbefore Adi Shankaracharya. And that Adi Shankaracharya stole most of his ideas\nfrom Buddhism, including concepts like Moksha , Advaita concept etc.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian\ndated Buddha at 563 BC, while actually Buddha was born in 1900 BC to the Ikshvaku\nlineage and was alive when King Ajatashatru was crowned.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian\ndated Adi Shankaracharya at 788 AD, while actually Adi Shankaracharya was born\nin 2000 BC.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the Tamil Iyer\nstooges of the British claimed that Adi Shankaracharya was a Tamilian, while\nactually he was born in Kaladi Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the British invader\nplaced Chandrasekharendra Saraswati, as the head of the non-existant Kanchi\nmutt , they also made it superior to the other 4 mutts. &nbsp;If Adi Shankaracharya indeed died at Kanchi\nMutt, why the hell did they establish a \u201cso called\u201d Kumbakonam Mutt?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Tamil , Sanskrit or\nMalayalam literature before 19th century speaks of Kanchi Mutt . Adi\nShankaracharya had ordained the Kerala Namboodriris should be the heads of all\nfour Mutts.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fake Kanchi Mutt was heavily sponsored by the British. They\nwrote a fake history and cooked up texts with the help of Tamilian Iyers to make\nthings authentic. The white historian wrote in their encyclopedias that Adi\nShankaracharya at Kanchipuram Mutt.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kanchi Mutt Chronicles cooked up a samadhi\nor sarvagna-pitha at the Kamakshi temple premises and named it `Shankaracharya\nsamadhi'.&nbsp; But what these Christian\ninvader historians could NOT understand is that you can never have a samadhi\ninside a Devi temple.&nbsp; So now this\nmandapam is renamed&nbsp; as `Shankaracharya\nsannidhi', a sanctum,&nbsp; not a dargah or\ntomb. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Sri Chandrasekharendra\nSaraswati and his successor Sri Jayendra Saraswati also were actively involved\nin this fake and immoral propaganda. They created a &nbsp;a FAKE lineage of 68 Kanchi Mutt acharyas or\npontiffs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma set up by Adi Shankaracharya does NOT allow a lineage\nof pontiffs like the Pope.. Sanatana Dharma never had an organized structure\ncomparable to the Roman Catholic Church.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>To add insult to injury this FAKE Kanchi Mutt\nsuddenly claimed superiority to the other four original Mutts set up by Adi\nShankaracharya.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last two acharyas Sri Chandrasekharendra Saraswati and his\nsuccessor Sri Jayendra Saraswati behaved like ancient maharishis, with Tamilians\nIyers bowing and touching their feet as if they were gods..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Alm3sZtKm2I/UcdZWVti5kI/AAAAAAAAjeM/DQRyTA_Bv0g/s1600/images.jpgklh+o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"198\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Alm3sZtKm2I/UcdZWVti5kI/AAAAAAAAjeM/DQRyTA_Bv0g/s320/images.jpgklh+o.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<i><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Chandrasekharendra Saraswati&nbsp;</span></span></b></i><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is however on record that the Kumbhakonam shakha\nof Sringeri Mutt was established in 1821 AD by the &nbsp;Maratha monarch of Tanjore, Pratap Singh\nTuljaji Bhonsle. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This structure of the\nshakha ( branch ) at Kumbhakonam has Kannada inscriptions. &nbsp;The Maratha Bhonsle dynasty, were the rulers\nof Thanjavur principality of Tamil Nadu between the 17th to the 19th century AD..\nTheir native language was Marathi and used Tamil as a working language -- NOT\nKannada .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kanchi SUB-shakha dates\nfrom only from 1842 AD. &nbsp;The headquarters\nof the continued to be at Kumbhakonam but the acharya head would periodically\nvisit Kanchipuram to assert his rights over the Kamakshi temple. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In return the Kanchi\nMutt helped propagate a strict caste system, which suffocated the balance 98%\nof the Tamilians. The lower castes were NOT allowed to enter temples .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have no idea to\nwhat extent Rothschild could go to cook up fake history. They even did the\npropaganda that Tipu Sultan helped to rebuild Sringeri Mutt after the false\nflag attack .&nbsp; 29 letters between the\nSringeri Acharya and Tipu Sultan were cooked up from the period of 8 years\nafter the attack. Tipu Sultan was finally killed in 1799.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">TIPU SULTAN UNMASKED\nVADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Below: The place where Tipu Sultan's dead body was found ( old photo 160 years ago )</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-B0mfno7EyoI/UcgmWKybdzI/AAAAAAAAjes/RYiTURyHVDA/s1600/body+of+tipu+sultan+was+found+here.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Below : Modern spot of &nbsp;Tipu Sultan's dead body.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b><br /></b></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4CQPUTpkNYk/UcgmlJbDtWI/AAAAAAAAje0/QMdjznBwxS8/s1600/gfgjfg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4CQPUTpkNYk/UcgmlJbDtWI/AAAAAAAAje0/QMdjznBwxS8/s400/gfgjfg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All four original Mutts\nshared good relations with each other except this FAKE Kanchi Mutt.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h_2e3AVeFs8/UcdYFD-EpCI/AAAAAAAAjdw/d36QbpZpoo4/s1600/Sringeri+Mutt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"220\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h_2e3AVeFs8/UcdYFD-EpCI/AAAAAAAAjdw/d36QbpZpoo4/s400/Sringeri+Mutt.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Above : Sringeri Mutt.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya\nchose the Sringeri Mutt site at the banks of the river Tunga. &nbsp;He and his four disciples, travelled to Sringeri\n(Chikmagalur district ) on a very hot afternoon.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they proceeded to the\nriver Tunga for their ablutions, they saw a frog struggling in the blazing sun\nto be delivered of its spawn. A cobra, a natural enemy of frogs, had raised its\nhood to provide the frog with shelter and protection from the ravages of the\ntropical sun.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G2G5pG15Ess/UcdX6tNcfqI/AAAAAAAAjdo/o4aQQhKcdAw/s1600/manduka-shankara.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"187\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G2G5pG15Ess/UcdX6tNcfqI/AAAAAAAAjdo/o4aQQhKcdAw/s400/manduka-shankara.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankara was greatly moved by the sanctity of this place and this\ninspired him to mark the spot of the Southern Mutt, after some calculations. There\nis a shrine on the banks of the Holy Tunga river in memory to the divine sight\nwitnessed by Adi Shankaracharya.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kanchi Pontiff Jayendra\nSaraswathi almost converted his MUTT to be a political kingmaker\u2019s office .\nAIDMK chief Jayalalithaa took his blessings before releasing the list of party candidates\nfor the 1996 elections to the State Assembly. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His predecessor Chandrasekharendra Saraswati\nwas a &nbsp;staunch advocate of secularism as\nstate policy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jayendra Saraswathi &nbsp;tried\nto poke his head into the affairs ( like a POPE ) into the system of rituals followed\nat the Sri Venkateswara temple at Tirumala. The Vaishnavite seers and mutt\nheads, just told him to FO and lay off from issues relating to Tirumala because\nhe \"does not belong to Srivaishnavism and hence need not interfere with\nthe Vaishnava traditions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They did NOT dare to take this stance when India was\nunder British rule, the official sponsors of Kanchi Mutt.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later Jayendra fell\nout with Jayalalitha and found himself in jail .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Rsr1I-c9ohg/UcdXr32q19I/AAAAAAAAjdg/-1d6JleYezw/s1600/GIB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN INDIA WE NEVER HAD\nBRAHMINS TROUBLING THE SHUDRAS TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA AND CREATED\nTHOUSAND OF FAKE MUTTS. As per tradition, the first\nthree alwars, Poigai Azhwar, Bhoothath Azhwar and Pey Azhwar were born\nmiraculously. Thirumalisai Alvar was the son of a sage, Thondaradippodi Alvar,\nMadhurakavi Alvar, Periyalvar and Andal were from brahmin community,\nKulashekhara Alwar a kshatriya, Nammalwar a vaishya, Thiruppaan Alvar a paanar\nand Thirumangai Alvar a kallar. T<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">VISHNU HAS ONLY 5\nMORTAL AVATARS-- VAMANA/ PARASHURAMA/ RAMA/ KRISHNA/ AYYAPPA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO FROM 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All ALWARS were\nincarnations of some form of Vishnu. Poigai is considered an incarnation of\nPanchajanya (Krishna's conch), Bhoothath of Kaumodakee (Vishnu's Mace/Club),\nPey of Nandaka (Vishnu's sword), Thirumalisai of Sudarshanam (Vishnu's discus),\nNamm of Vishvaksena (Vishnu's commander), Madhurakavi of Vainatheya (Vishnu's\neagle, Garuda), Kulasekhara of Kaustubha (Vishnu's necklace), Periya of Garuda\n(Vishnu's eagle), Andal of Bhoodevi (Vishnu's wife, Lakshmi, in her form as\nBhudevi), Thondaradippodi of Vanamaalai (Vishnu's garland), Thiruppaan of\nSrivatsa (An auspicious mark on Vishnu's chest) and Thirumangai of Sharanga,\nRama's bow. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAP RE -- WHAT ABOUT\nVISHNUs PET CAT OR TOOTH PICK ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">USKA AVATAR KITHEE --\nENGE THAMBEEE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE ALL KNOW ABOUT\nROTHSCHILD FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATED NATHAMUNI AND HIS FAKE GRANDSON\nYAMUNACHARYA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramanuja visted\nYamnunacharya\u2014but ALAAAS he died just before he arrived. font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kannappa Nayanar or Kannappa,one of the 63 Nayanmars or holy Saivite saints (a reincarnation of Arjun) is tomtommed to have had worshipped Lord Shiva (shiva lingam) with&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">BEEF&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">since he was a hunter.</span></span><br />\nI have seen Tamil TV channels showing this BEEF on Shiva Lingam<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kannappa_Nayanar</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD AND HIS FAKE MUTTS DID NOT KNOW THAT SHIVA IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY, NOT A MORTAL.<br />\n<br />\nSHIVA LINGAM IS A BLACK METEORITE STONE WHICH GAVE DNA AND LIFE TO THIS PLANET-- AND IS RIGHTLY KNOWN AS THE DIVINE PHALLUS--THE STONE WHICH GAVE THE SEED .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">The Periyapuranam is considered as a veritable fifth Veda in Tamil</span><br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nALL 63 NAYANARS GOT MOKSHA BY THEIR UTTER DEVOTION TO SHIVA-- SORRY AGAMA PRIDE TAMILS-- THIS IS NOT SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL / AGAMA PRIDE MUST STICK TO THEIR BULLSHIT BELIEFS AND PRAY TO EVR PERIYAR TOO FOR GOOD MEASURE-- WE HINDUS DONT CARE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.dlshq.org/download/nayanar.pdf</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Agamas, considered to be the words of Shiva himself, form the canon of Shaivism<br />\n<br />\nAIYOOOOOOOOOOOO --EPPIDI NAAN PAKKAVAI ILLAI !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br />\n<br />\nThere are many who go with matted locks, many who have clean<br />\nshaven heads, many whose hairs have been plucked out; some are<br />\nclothed in orange, yet others in various colours --- all just for<br />\na livelihood.<br />\n<br />\nHow can a saint himself deride saints like this? Even if there are black sheep,\nwill he write a verse deriding all sadhus?<br />\n<br />\nAgain in Hanuman Chalisa - even when reading it aloud, I could not get myself\nto say these lines -<br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; HOPING TO GET A HUGE COLOUR CHANGING DIAMOND AT THE THIRD EYE<br />\n<br />\nAT THE MIDDLE OF THE FOREHEAD OF BRAHMA ON TOP OF QUTAB MINAR WAS A COLOUR CHANGING DIAMOND SET IN IRIDIUM INFUSED ARANMULA CONCAVE MIRROR<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/my-visit-to-bhagyalaxmi-nagar-or-modern.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS DIAMOND APPEARED HUGE DUE TO \"HOLOGRAM EFFECT\" -- GLOWED BRILLIANT BLUE IN DAYTIME AND PHOSPHORESCENT RED AT NIGHT<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BRILLIANT RED LUSTRE COULD BE SEEN FOR HUNDREDS OF MILES AROUND<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS THEY BROKE DOWN THE STATUE AND GOT THIS DIAMOND--IT BECAME OPAQUE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ISLAMIC INVADER WAS HOPING TO GET A DIAMOND AS LARGE AS A TENNIS BALL --IT TURNED OUT TO BE AS SMALL AS A GRAPE<br />\n<br />\nEVERY BRAHMA IDOL IN INDIA--BEFORE THE ISLAMIC / WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA HAD A DIAMOND SET AT THE MIDDLE EYE<br />\n<br />\nTHE ISLAMIC INVADER STOPPED GOUGING OUT THESE DIAMONDS -- WHEN THEY FOUND IT BROUGHT INSTANT BAD LUCK ..<br />\n<br />\nAND A BRILLIANT DIAMOND BECOMING OPAQUE SUDDENLY WAS TOO MUCH FOR THEM ( BEING PRISED OFF A SUPERHARD IRRIDUM BASE )<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER STILL STOLE THE DIAMONDS-- AND GOT IT RECUT<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6NqaDxi2KY<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gO8wt5xbvLk</span><br />\n<br />\nBRAHMA PAVILION ON TOP OF QUTAB MINAR WAS UNSTABLE-- SHOWCASING PRECESSION OF THE PLANET<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v5R-m62exes</span><br />\n<br />\nEVERY ANCIENT TEMPLE SPIRE IN INDIA HAS IRRIDIUM INFUSED. ALL THESE SPIRES WERE STOLEN BY THE WHITE INVADER LEAVING BEHIND COPPER ONES<br />\n<br />\nParashurama \"consecrated\" 108 idols in kerala-- incuding one at Sabarimala for a future Vishnu avatar ( Ayyappa )<br />\n<br />\nTHREE POINTS ARE VERY IMPORTANT -- THE POSITION AND HEIGHT OF THE THIRD EYE OF THE BLACK IDOL, THE POSITION AND HEIGHT OF THE STAMBHA ( METAL CASED POLE ) AND THE POSITION OF THE PRASADAM HOLY WATER TABERNACLE.<br />\n<br />\nOn top of the sthamba is the vahana of the diety .<br />\n<br />\nDHWAJA means TWO ( triangles ) in sanskrit and malayalam .<br />\n<br />\nThe flag staff is installed in FRONT of the deity's eyebrows -- and from far away a devotee knows what is what.<br />\n<br />\nA line making an angle of 23.4 degrees with the normal sight line of the idol should cut exactly the top of the Dhwaja. This 23.4 degree and 108 is linked to Vishnu's vamana avatar ( boar ).<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_108BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; A hole is made in the roof of the Mandapa where the line of the above angle touches the roof.<br />\n<br />\nThe middle point between the eyebrows of the idol, the hole in the roof and the top of the Dhwaja is in the same line.<br />\n<br />\nThe above angle line when extended should reach the top of the Kalasa the Gali-Gopuram. The Gali-Gopuram should be constructed at thr right distance.<br />\n<br />\nAs the earth axis is tilted to an angle of 23.4 degrees the small hole, the top of the Dhwaja and the top of the Gali-Gopuram should be in a line making an angle of 23.4 degrees with the normal sight line of the idol for the optimum powerful radiation of the directional power.<br />\n<br />\nA TEMPLE STUMBHA IS A QUARTER LAMBDA ANTENNA --NOT FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES BUT FOR SCALAR WAVES --HOWEVER IT FULLFILLS CONDITIONS FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC SPECTRUM.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY STAMBHA IN ANCIENT TIMES HAS IRRIDIUM AND RHODIUM INHERENT IN THE VAHANA FIGURE OF THE DEITY RIGHT ON TOP. VAHANA MEANS CARRIER ( WAVE ).<br />\n<br />\nToday any incoming missile is shot down in seconds using circular arrays are composed of thousands of crossed dipole antennas.<br />\n<br />\nThe impedance of a 1/4 lambda Marconi antenna is 36.6 ohms.A \u00bd lambda dipole has an impedance of about 70 ohms . Remember scalar energy cannot be measured today--probably they will do it 500 years from today.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FLAG MAST OF A TEMPLE IS PRECISION GEOMETRY.<br />\n<br />\nARANMULA AIRPORT AUTHORITIES ( CHRISTIAN ) WANTED THE FLAG POLE TO BE CROPPED AND REMOVE ARANMULA MIRROR PRODUCTION<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/aranmula-airport-kerala-mindless-rape.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDESPITE TELLING PM MODI AT LEAST 60 TIMES-- EVEN LAST YEAR THE TAMIL DALITS / CHRISTIAN NGOs SANG \" DEVI ( SHIVAs WIFE ) NEEDS A PRICK AS LARGE AS THE KODIMARAM TO BE SEXUALLY SATISFIED\"<br />\n<br />\nTHEY DONT KNOW THAT SHIVA AND HIS WIFE ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES .. You see Chaitanya baby revealed to Goswami baby that he is an avatar of Krishna ( BALLS !)<br />\n<br />\nGoswami baby created the Radha Raman Temple--which was actually an old Vishnu temple retro installed -- with a shaligram deity of Krishna alongside Radharani.<br />\n<br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO SPREAD THE TRUTH<br />\n<br />\nHARE RAMA OF THE CHANT BY ISKON -- HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SRI RAM.<br />\n<br />\nCHANTING THIS BULLSHIT MANTRA OF HARE RAMA ( RADHA ) HARE KRISHA DOES YOU NO GOOD<br />\n<br />\nRadha-vallabha is another fake sect--where Krishna is called the consort of Radha. Here Radha is the deity-- Krishna is just a side-kick<br />\n<br />\nShri Radhavallabhlal temple at Vrindavan was a Vishnu temple converted to Radha and Krishna idol - a 2 in 1 .<br />\n<br />\nIN SANKHYA JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS USED HIS AGENTS LIKE PRABHUPADA TO SUBSTITUTE SHIVA / SHAKTI -------WITH KRISHNA ( A MERE AVATAR OF VISHNU ) AND A FAKE MISTRESS RADHA .<br />\n<br />\nPOISON INJECTED VERSES BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nradha purna-sakti, krsna purna-saktiman<br />\ndui vastu bheda nai, sastra-paramana<br />\nmrgamada, tara gandha yaiche aviccheda<br />\nagni, jvalate yaiche kabhu nahi bheda<br />\nradha-krsna aiche sada eka-i svarupa<br />\nlila-rasa asvadite dhare dui-rupa<br />\n<br />\nSri Radha is the full energy, and Lord Krsna is the possessor of full power.<br />\n<br />\nThe two are not different, as evidenced by the revealed scriptures. They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. Adi 1.79,80)<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- All this bull about Radha being a mistress of Lord Krishna and all his thousands of Gopikas whom he flirted with , are all poisons injected into Hinduism by the white Christian invader. Kalidas who invented Radha never existed. Krishna did NOT have 16000 virgin gopikas in vrindavan rather 16000 are dhatus of shasrara chakra . SAHASRARA CHAKRA is a 1000 petalled lotus -- each with 16 kalas or aspects --this works out to 16000 .<br />\n<br />\nthis is NOT some girl who has sex with Lord Krishna --taking turns to HUMP.<br />\n<br />\nNarakasura kidnapped 16000 damsels --and Lord Krishna saved these damsels in distress. this is just an allegory.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_56MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_56BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_56B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_57B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5759304704119782162\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_57M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. mention Krishna , but NEVER EVER a woman named Radha.<br />\n<br />\nDuring British Rule all Krishna temples idols were roved to insert Radha as a jodi.<br />\n<br />\nThe FAKE Geeta-Govinda was full text-decoration-line: none;\">April 3, 2018 at 5:44 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_100MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/govt-to-sc-roll-back-dilution-of-sc/st-act/articleshow/63587396.cms</span><br />\nEVERY BENAMI MEDIA TV STATION WAS GUILTY OF INCITING DALITS YESTERDAY\u2026BY&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">LOADED MESSAGES</span></b>&nbsp;\u2026<br />\n<br />\n\u201c<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">YES WE AGREE THAT DALITS WERE SUPRESSED BY HIGH CASTE HINDUS FOR MILLINIUMS \u2013BUT THAT DOES NOT MEAN THAT YOU CAN TAKE LAW INTO YOUR OWN HANDS</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c---BLAH BLAH..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A TERRIFIC LIE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THERE WAS NO CASTE SYSTEM TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA\u2026WE HAD ONLY A VARNA SYSTEM..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nON THE SHIP EVERYBODY CANNOT BE CAPTAIN ..IF YOU HAVE TO BECOME CAPTAIN YOU HAVE TO PASS AN EXAM AND HAVE REQUISITE EXPERIENCE AND FAVOURABLE SERVICE REPORTS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE HINDU MUTTS ONLY TO DIVIDE AND RULE\u2026 TO DO PROPAGANDA THAT THERE WAS UNTOUCHABILITY SYSTEM WHICH OPPRESSED THE DALITS..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY---<br />\n<br />\nUNTOUCHABILITY EXISTED ONLY IN KERALA\u2026 AND THAT TOO IT WAS STARTED 6000 YEARS AGO BY VISHNU AVATAR PARASHURAMA FOR A VERY SPECIFIC REASON..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER CONVEYING VEDAS ORALLY FOR 330 CENTURIES IT WAS DECIDED TO PEN DOWN THE VEDAS 70 CENTURIES AGO..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HUMAN DNA WAS DEGRADING AND IT WAS NOT POSSIBLE FOR PEOPLE WITH NON-FRACTAL MINDS TO MEMORISE SUCH HUMONGOUS AMOUNTS OF SANSKRIT VERSES..<br />\n<br />\nFROM 5000 BC TO 4000 BC , IT WAS KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WHO CONVEYED VEDAS ORALLY \u2013 AS THEY COULD STILL DO IT..&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WRITTEN VEDAS WERE IN THE CUSTODY ON KERALA NAMBOODIRIS AT THE BANKS OF THE RIVER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nNOW LISTEN\u2014THIS IS THE MOST CRITICAL PART OF THIS COMMENT\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIN 4000 BC ,RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP DUE TO A TECTONIC SHIFT AT THE GLACIAL MOUTH IN THE HIMALAYAS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE BROTHER OF KRISHNA BALARAMA TOOK HIS GIGANTIC PLOW ( FOR LEVERAGE ) AND SHIFTED THE SARSWATI WATERS TO GANGA AND YAMUNA \u2013LEAVING ONLY THE UNDERGROUND SARASWATI RIVER FLOWING..<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA WOULD WITNESS THE FINAL BATTLE BETWEEN DURYODHANA AND BHIMA IN A STAGNANT POOL OF SARSWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BEFORE THE KURUKSHETRA WAS COULD START , VISHNU TOOK AN AVATAR AS PARASHURAMA TO KEEP THE 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS SAFE\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA LEAD THE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS BACK HOME FROM SARSWATI RIVER BANKS WITH THE VEDAS AND UPANISHADS .. THESE NAMBOODIRIS KNEW THE VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE TOO\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A STRICT LAW FOR SAFETY OF THESE VALUABLE NAMBOODIRIS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nEVEN THE THIYYA KERALA KING OF CALICUT PUNT/ MALABAR/ SHEBA/ OPHIR ) COULD NOT COME WITHIN 6 FEET ( ONE MAN LENGTH ) OF THE NAMBOODIRIS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE LOWEST CEREBRAL GRADE OF TRIBAL ADIVASIS COULD NOT COME WITHIN 72 FEET ( 12 MAN LENGTHS ) \u2026 THE IDEA WAS NOT TO SUPRRESS LESSER HUMANS BUT TO ENSURE THAT VEDAS ORAL ROUTE KNOWING NAMBOODIRIS REMAINED SAFE \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOSE DAYS THERE WERE NO BRAHMINS BY CASTE \u2026 NAMBOODIRIS BY VARNA WERE MERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WHO SPOKE MALAYALAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_100MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_98TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px; text-align: left;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_98B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c533883434781593434\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_98M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/down-syndrome-trisomy-21-caused-by-ivf.html?showComment=1522714517699#c533883434781593434\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 3, 2018 at 5:45 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_98MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nTHIYYAS WERE THE ORIGINAL ROYALS OF KERALA\u2014 LATER JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED A CRYPTO JEW VARMA CLAN WHO BECAME KERALA ROYALS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WERE NO VARMAS BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA\u2026 THIYYAS, WERE DEMOTED TO \u201c COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPERS\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nSAME WAY MAHARS ( BR AMBEDKARs CLAN ) WERE NOT DALITS\u2026 MAHARS WERE RULING CASTE OF MAHARASHTRA \u2026 MAHARASTRA IS THE RASHTRA OF MAHARS\u2026. LATER CHITPAVAN JEWS BECAME RULING CLASS. ..<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA CREATED A SYSTEM WHERE ONLY THE ELDEST NAMBOODIRI BROTHER COULD OWN FERTILE LAND IN KERALA \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS TO PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND WHICH IS INDIAs BIGGEST PROBLEM TODAY AND REASON FOR FARMERS SUICIDES..<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER ( SOCIAL STATUS, KNOWLEDGE , LAND AND WEALTH ) AND BECAME DECADENT IN THE PERIOD FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC..<br />\n<br />\nDANAVAS OF KERALA HAS BEEN THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF KNOWLEDGE FOR THIS PLANET.. I AM A DANAVA ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A KERALA NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA , CUT THE STRENGTH FROM UNDER THE FEET OF HIS OWN CLAN AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA.. .. HE FELT NAMBOODIRIS WERE SEXUALLY DECADENT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE GOES THE FALSE THEORY THAT THERE WAS NO CONCEPT OF BHARAT IN THE ANCIENT DAYS..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONDITION SET BY PARASHURAMA \u2013THAT THESE 4 ORIGINAL HINDU MUTTS COULD BE HEADED ONLY BY A VEDA ( ORAL ROUTE ) KNOWING KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFF\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LONG TRADITION WAS BROKEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA\u2026 EVEN THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS HAS CRYPTO JEW PONTIFFS WITH PALE EYES WHO TROUBLED DALITS.. ALONG WITH MORE THAN A THOUSAND FAKE MUTT PONTIFFS WHO WERE THE BRIBED AGENTS OF THE WHITE INVADER\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</span><br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS RACING TO BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN ANOTHER 15 YEARS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN WILL NEVER ALLOW A BROWN MAN TO LORD OVER HIM\u2026 ALL BR AMBEDKAR/ EVR PERIYAR STUDENTS UNION LEADERS ARE FUNDED AND CONTROLLED BY WHITE JEWS \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBOTH BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR PERIYAR WERE AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD AND DID NOT WANT THE WHITE INVADER TO LEAVE INDIA\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nYES THE COOK ON A SHIP CAN ASPIRE TO BE CAPTAIN.. BUT FIRST HE MUST PASS AN EXAM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE CANT HAVE QUOTA FOR DALITS IN ISRO OR A QUOTA FOR DONKEYS ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT TEACH A DONKEY TO SING \u2014 WISDOM\u2026<br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS THERE IS QUOTA SYSTEM , THERE WILL BE BRAIN DRAIN FROM INDIA \u2026. NO HORSE WILL AGREE TO BE LORDED OVER BY A DONKEY ON A RACE COURSE..<br />\n<br />\nBY ALL MEANS GIVE FREE EDUCATION TO DALITS\u2014BUT IT MUST STOP THERE \u2026 GIVING JOB RESERVATIONS AND EVEN PROMOTIONS WILL NOT HELP BHARATMATA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">OUR CONSTIITUTION DEMANDS THAT ALL CITIZENS BE TREATED THE SAME..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDALIT LEADERS LIKE KANCHA ILAIAH AND JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS MUST NOT LONGER LIE THAT DALITS WERE SUPRESSED FOR MILLIUNIUMS ..<br />\n<br />\nIT HAPPENED ONLY IN KERALA , NOT THE REST OF INDIA\u2026<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">UNTOUCHABILITY IN KERALA WAS TO PRESERVE , NOT SUPRESS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_98MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_98BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_98B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_99B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2889325542601838581\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_99M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. TO BE&nbsp; THE GURU OF FAKE KABIRDAS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY HAVE INCLUDED RAMANANDA NONSENSE INTO THE SIKH HOLY BOOK ADI GRANTH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAMANDA IS SUPPOSED TO BE THE DISCIPLE OF TAMILIAN RAMANUJA. Rothschild created and backdated BASAVA. This sect now buries their dead bodies and are NOT Hindus anymore.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THERE CAN BE NO LITERARY FEST WITHOUT EXTENSIVE DISCUSSIONS OF THE FAKE RADHA, FAKE KUV KUSH , AND THE FAKE BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES.</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_15.html?showComment=1523888707577#c64275713178922780\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 16, 2018 at 7:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_147MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED \"BRAHMACHARYA \" (CELIBACY ) AND WE HAVE HIS AGENT FREEMASON ROGUES LIKE VIVEKANANDA MAKING A VIRTUE OUT OF IT..<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya has nothing to do with withholding semen. The celibate transforms the energy of reproduction into spiritual energy (ojas), bringing in lustre.<br />\n<br />\nThe word \u2018virya\u2019 mentioned means power of knowledge or action, vigor in body\u2019s organs and the mind, spiritual power or the attainment of siddhis.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is about allocation: using your resources effectively to achieve your aspiration.Brahmacharya means not misusing sex. Brahmacharya means \u2018to respect the creative power of sex and not abuse it by manipulating others sexually.<br />\n<br />\nThe sex you have with your wife is LOVE. The sex you have with a whore is LUST.<br />\n<br />\nLike the other yamas, brahmacharya has to do with balance, and how we choose to use or \u201cinvest\u201d our resources. Each and every act and thought is an outflow of energy.<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is about harnessing the energy or power of our senses and directing that instead to greater personal understanding- not withholding semen.<br />\n<br />\nWE ARE DONE WITH HOMOSEXUALITY SPREADING GURUS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED GANDHI TO SPEAD HIS BRAHMACHARI NONSENSE-- ALL THE WHILE GANDHI WAS SLEEPING NAKED WITH UNDERAGE GIRLS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/01/mahatma-gandhi-and-his-endless.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK or DICK or LODA alone.</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married..</span></div>\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior).<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE AND WE THE PEOPLE HAVE 100% SYMPATHY FOR TRENSGENDERS ( HIJRAS )\u2026BUT WE HAVE NO SYMPATHY FOR GAYS AND LESBIANS WHO ARE 99% PEDOPHILES..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IT IS A CRIME TO CLUB TRANSGENDERS WITH GAY AND LESBIAN PERVERTS \u2026</span></b><br />\nOnce a train ticket inspector tried to harass one of my wife\u2019s relatives who was travelling alone at night\u2026 She had the ticket but was in the wrong railway line\u2026 ( this had happened to me and I know ) Three hijras piled on to him so badly that the fellow had to run away at the next station.. These hijras then escorted the woman till her home front door..and they expected nothing in return..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_148b+seedaHXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_148b+seedaHXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_180TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_179B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2208078803596117404\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_179M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/asaram-bapu-conviction-we-people-are.html?showComment=1524762771211#c2208078803596117404\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 26, 2018 at 10:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_179MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pOq46Y7o_UY</span><br />\n<br />\nABOVE VIDEO IS ALL BULLSHIT<br />\n<br />\nFIRST SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV GAVE BULL THAT SHIVA (ADI YOGI ) IS A MORTAL BORN 15000 YEARS AGO.. SORRY, SHIVA IS A COMIC ALLEGORY<br />\n<br />\nNOW HE GIVES HAJJAR BULL ABOUT HEAVEN, HELL AND CHITRAGUPTA..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY --THERE IS NO HEAVEN AND HELL IN HINDUISM.. WE NEVER HEARD OF CHITRAGUPTA ( AND MISSING LINK KAYASTHAS ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA HEAVEN IS THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( BRAHMAN THE FIELD ) WHO SHEARED OFF A SMALL BIT OF HIS BODY AND SEND YOU AS A SOUL ( BALL OF ENERGY ) AT ITS LOWEST FREQUENCY TO GAIN LIFE EXPERIENCE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU ( YOUR SOUL EVOLVED ) FROM BACTERIA, TO BIRD, TO ANIMAL TO HUMAN WITH LOW FREQUENCY SOULD TO MOKSHA SOUL OF HIGHEST FREQUENCY , SAME AS BRAHMAN --AFTER WHICH YOUR SOUL MERGED BACK WITH MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN TO SHARE LIFE EXPERIENCES WITH ITS MOTHER ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE FEED BACK STOPS IN THIS CLOSED LOOP --PRALAYA ( DISSOLUTION ) HAPPENS ..<br />\n<br />\nFIRST ASTRAL LATER IS MEANT FOR ALL SPECIES OF LIVES --EXCEPT HUMAN .. THE SOULS OF CRIMINALS/ HOMOSEXUALS WHO HAVE NO CONSCIENCE ARE IN THE LAYER..<br />\n<br />\nSECOND TO SIXTH LAYERS ARE MEANT ONLY FOR CONSCIOUS HUMANS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST FREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING SPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<br />\n<br />\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<br />\n<br />\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<br />\n<br />\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER IS THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN ( VAIKUNTA ).. HERE ONLY MOKSHA SOULS -- NIL EGO, NIL KRAMIC BAGGAGE AND HIGHEST SOULD FREQUENCY ( SAME AS MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ) CAN ENTER --TO BE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN ( GOD )..<br />\n<br />\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE PHYSICAL BODY ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RASCAL SADUGU JAGGI VASUDEV LIES ABOUT PLENTY FOOD TO EAT AND APSARAS FOR SEX IN SEVENTH LAYER .. BALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB MOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS<br />\n<br />\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMA USHERS IN --<br />\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS THAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<br />\n<br />\nAT THE SEVENT ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN ) YUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS LIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<br />\n<br />\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 ) DECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL HAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA .. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES-- HE DID IT AND HOW..<br />\n<br />\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX WITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5 PANDAVAS TOO..<br />\n<br />\nBeautiful and intelligent Queen Kunti was the mother of Karna and the first three Pandava brothers Yudhishthira, Bhima, Arjuna. .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_179BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Sanskrit has no script till date. It depends upon the script of other languages. Tamil has the script very long back . It has been proved by the excavations conducted in various places including Egypt and Thailand. Jaffna site is one among those in which Tamil script was found used during BC 1500 Years. The word Thirazh muri which means an agenda approved in a meeting. Such a valid proof is available for Tamil Language.No other language has such a valid proof as Tamil has. Except Asokas script in India all other scripts are found during Guptas period only. In Asoka's script was not used to write Sanskrit. So all the Sanskrit literatures were written around A.D. 4 th century. But Thirukural was written during BC 2 nd century . As such how this gentleman Nagasamy does claim that Thirukural is the copy of Artha Sastra. Same philosophy may reflect in different literatures. Only timeline will decide which one is copied from which one. Is is not humour a language which has not script at all can be taken as the pioneer for all other literatures of other language Tamil Which has the script discovered before 3500 years. More over Sanskrit means \"corrected one\". By its name itself certainly Sanskrit may be derived language. So all the Sanskrit literatures might have been copied from other indian languages like Tamil. Mr. Nagasamy's voice may be from his haterdness on Tamils. This Rajive Malhotra has tried to destabilise the Tamil forum reasonably formed in Basten University.\" BY \u0ba4.\u0b95. \u0ba8\u0bbf\u0ba4\u0bbf<br />\n<br />\nI JUST DON'T UNDERSTAND Y T HELL THEY HAVE SO MUCH HATRED FOR SANSKRIT??
