Some of the padres were professional printers and linguists in religious garb. To convert they need the Bible in local language.<br />\n<br />\nThe Italian priest Robert de Nobili (1577-1656). d called himself a \u2018Roman Brahmin\u2019.Let me list out a few 3 in 1 missionaries\u2014padre/ printer/ proselytisers. Italian missionary, Constantine Joseph Beschi (1680-1746), who called himself Veeramaamunivar (Veer-Maha-Munivar), German missionary Barthalomaus Ziegenbalg (1683-1719) who called himself Ziegenbalg Iyer, Englishman G.U. Pope (1820-1907) who called himself \u201cPope Iyer.\u201d, Scotsman Robert Caldwell (1814-1891) who along with his wife Elissa Mault did massive conversions by offering sops, Portuguese missionary John De Britto etc etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe Madras Catholic Diocese, has been on a amazing campaign that, \u201cThiruvalluvar was a disciple of St. Thomas and that Thirukkural have been lifted from the teachings of St. Thomas\u2014nonsense.<br />\n<br />\nTHOMAS THE DISCIPLE OF JESUS -- BOTH NEVER EXISTED.<br />\n<br />\nBishop Robert Caldwell (1814\u20131891) was an Christian Evangelist missionary and linguist, who came to India to poison Hindusim, by translating and printing books in Tamil. He got into a deal with Tamilian Iyers for plum administrative posts in the British Raj.<br />\n<br />\nFor poisoning the Hindu texts , in return he established Tamil as the oldest language\u2014which gave an ego massage to Tamils.<br />\n<br />\nBishop Robert Caldwell academically established the Dravidian family of languages in a false immoral manner . He served as Assistant Bishop of Tirunelveli from 1877. Poisoning Hinduism made atheists and British stooges like EVR Periyar happy.<br />\n<br />\nThe Government of Tamil Nadu honoured his 'historic contribution to Tamil' with a memorial and issued a stamp in his name. On the Madras Marina, a statue of Caldwell was erected .<br />\n<br />\nEvery patriotic Indian must know what this white Christain man did to divide Hindus. For 50 long years Caldwell worked tirelessly to give stimulus to the radicalisation of the Non-Brahmin movement .<br />\n<br />\nIN SCHOOL SOCIAL STUDIES EXAM WE HAD A COMPULSORY QUESTION ON TIRUKKURAL --ALWAYS ..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS BETTER THAT I DONT EXPOSE THE NAKED TRUTH ABOUT TIRUKKURAL..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">I CAN WRITE A BOOK ON HOW ROTHSCHILDs AGENT LEO TOLSTOY SANG THE PRAISES OF THIRUVALLUVAR ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF 22 CENTURY OLD TIRUKKURAL ( AND ASHTAVAKRA GITA ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nLET TAMIL PRIDE PARTY HAVE SOMETHING TO HANG ON TO..<br />\n<br />\nON THE OTHER HAND PART 3 ( CHAPTERS 109 TO 133 ) OF TIRUKKURAL DEALT WITH KAMA ..<br />\n<br />\nKAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SEX.. KAMASUTRA IS A FAKE BOOK.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">ROTHSCHILD MEDIA DID ENORMOUS PROPAGANDA THAT DUE TO THE INFLUENCE OF LEO TOLSTOY GANDHI READ TIRUKKURAL IN JAIL..TO DERIVE THE SPARK OF AHIMSA..</span></div>\n<br />\nOn 16th Jan 2015, Prime Minister Narendra Modi released a Gujarati translation of Thirukkural.<br />\n<br />\nVOTE MAANGTH HAI NAH ?<br />\n<br />\nMODI ALSO TOLD THAT TAMIL IS THE OLDEST LANGUAGE ON PLANET EARTH.. TEE HEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nIt is comprised of 1330 pairs each with exactly 7 words.<br />\n<br />\nThere are 133 chapters and 3 parts. The 3 main parts are:<br />\nAram (Dharma / Justice)<br />\nPorul (Artha / Wealth &amp; Power)<br />\nInbam (Kamam / Love &amp; Sex).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe book on A\u1e5fam (virtue) contains 380 verses, that of Poru\u1e37 (wealth) has 700 and that of Inbam ( kama sex) has 250.<br />\nThere are two parts of Thirukkural's Kama<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_164MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_164BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_164B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_165B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8235661969138140139\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_165M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/henry-ford-victim-of-jewish-retribution_6.html?showComment=1525741329647#c8235661969138140139\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 6:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_165MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nKalaviyal - This goes into a secret love (or pre-marital love or affair). There are plenty of tips on how to recognize the signs of love and how to impress the lover. It also goes into what it likes to miss a lover and how to embrace the right way.<br />\nInteresting quotes:<br />\nIt is difficult to understand<br />\nThe essence of the knight is the shoulder<br />\nThis girl has the elixir in her shoulders. Whenever I hug her, I get reborn.<br />\n<br />\nMedication for dysfunction<br />\nThe medicine itself is for self<br />\nThere is medicine for every illness. But for the one who is missing his lover, there can not be better than meeting his love.<br />\n<br />\nI do not know how to look<br />\nYambatta Thambata River<br />\nIf you are laughing at someone else's love and pulling his legs, it is because you never never in love.<br />\n<br />\n2. Karpiyal - This goes into the marital love. These 18 chapters come at the end of the book and deals with separation, anger, memories, complaining and feigned anger.<br />\n<br />\nYerunangan lover of love<br />\nNo one is anyone<br />\nWhen I say to her that she is dear to me than everybody, she still asks me whom I compare her with.<br />\n<br />\nOthers do not care<br />\nEye to eye<br />\nThe person who stole my heart does not seem to be interested in hugging me. I can not even find him. This is breaking my heart.<br />\n<br />\nChapter entitled \"Prostitutes\": For gold, not love their tongue cajoles men are ruined by bangled belles (911)<br />\nThe false embrance of whores is like that of a damned corpse in the dark {913)<br />\n(allusion to necrophilia,a rare sexual deviation)<br />\nThiruvalluvar considers sexuality broadly under two headings \"Courting in secrecy\" and \"Chaste married life\"<br />\nOn this banglod beauty dwell the joys of sight sound touch taste smell (1101)<br />\nJoy is the fast embrace that doth not admit even air between both (1108)<br />\nIn the fore - play the beauty of the woman is extolled in many places:--<br />\n\"Beauty extolled\"<br />\nThe bamboo shouldered has pearl like smiles Fragrant breath and lance like eyes (1J13)<br />\nThe soft flower and the swan's down are like nettles to the feet of the fair.. (1120)<br />\nA sensuous kiss between the lovers is alluded to here:--<br />\nLike milk and honey the dew is sweet from her white teeth whose word is soft (1121)<br />\nLove between me and this lady is like bond between soul and body (1122)<br />\nLife with my jewel is existence Death is is severance (1124)<br />\nAs knowledge reveals past ignorance So is the belle on love gets close ..(1110)<br />\nHe comes; no sleep; he goes; no sleep; This is the fate of eyes that weep .(II79)<br />\nNights' mercy lulls all souls to sleep keeping but me for companionship (1168)<br />\nCrueller than that cruel he are midnight hours gliding slowly (1169)<br />\nOne day seems as sever to those who yearn return of distant spouse (J269)<br />\nIn wakeful hours who sees me not I meet in dreams and linger yet... {1213)<br />\nIn dreams I enjoy his love \u2013 bliss Who in wakeful hours I miss (12 J 4)<br />\nDear life ebbs away by thought of him who said we are one heart {1209)<br />\nThink of, O heart, some remedy To cure this chronic malady {1241)<br />\nFrets to gain and fears loss in gain O my heart suffers ceaseless pain.. {1295)<br />\nThese arms that swelled on nuptial day Now shrunk proclaim \"He is away\"{1233)<br />\nBereft of bracelets and old beauty Arms tell the cruel's cruelty {1235)<br />\n<br />\nMy eyes causing lust more than sea Suffer that tortune slecplessly (1175)<br />\nHe seized my beauty and modesty Leaving pangs and pallor to me ... {1183)<br />\nLover away, comes even tide like slayer to field of homicide {1224)<br />\nSulking is the salt of love : but too much of it spoils the taste {1302)<br />\nSulking is lover's delight Its delight grows when they write {1330)<br />\n<br />\n\"Shall I draw back, or yield myself, or shall both mingled be,<br />\nWhen he returns, my spouse, dear as these eyes to me.\" (Kural 1267)[26]<br />\n\"Withdraw, it burns; approach, it soothes the pain;<br />\nWhence did the maid this wondrous fire obtain?\" (Kural 1104)[27]<br />\n\"A double witchery have glances of her liquid eyes;<br />\nOne glance is glance that brings me pain; the other heals again.\" (Kural 1091)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_165MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_165BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">TAMIL VEDAS ?</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A DHARMIC LIFE MANUAL CALLED KAMASUTRA WAS CONVERTED TO A PERVERTED SEX MANUAL BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The four purusharthas or goals of human life are 1. Dharma (righteousness, duty and moral order) 2. Artha (wealth and prosperity) 3.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama (desirable action )</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;4. Moksha (liberation) . This is exactly what is condenses into Tirukkural.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KAMA PURUSHARTHA IS NOT LUST BUT DESIRABLE ACTION.<br /><br />KAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH LUST OR SEX AS IS WRITTEN BY THE WHITE INVADER</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purushartha means those actions which are proper and correct</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama is a broad subject which encompasses arts, emotions, poetry . relationships and other sciences</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The aim of life of an individual is determined by the doctrine of Purushartha. It also decides the course of life of man and lays down norms and values for the behaviour patterns.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purushartha means \u201cPurusharthate Purushartha\u201d, which are the efforts made by the individual to achieve the aims, goals and ultimate values of life.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ultimate end of Hindu culture is to attain \u2018Moksha\u2019 or salvation and hence, man should behave in such a manner that this aim may be achieved- and this does NOT mean wanton , debauched sex..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By Purushartha we mean the pursuance of those actions which lead to the fulfillment of socially approved values and goal.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama refers to all the desires in man for the enjoyment and satisfaction and sensual gratification of the five human senses.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KAMA could be music or being creative or team spirit in sport or travelling to places of natural beauty or sitting with family at the beach or riding a fast horse or participating in a arrow shooting contest - anything which brings delight to human life and spirit .</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Kama has absolutely nothing to do with LUST and sexual orgasm.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kama would refer to the totality of the innate desires and drives of man- motivations of man.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama refers to the instinctive and emotional life of man, and provides for the satisfaction of his aesthetic urges.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sanatana Dharma wants man and woman to be happy as this is the chief purpose of life and of course the final goal of Moksha.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; IT IS ORGANIC ( NOT INORGANIC LKE SIDDHA MEDICINES )\u2014VANASPATI/ VANSPATYA/ AUSHADI/ VIRUDHA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">IN CHARAKA SAMHITA PENNED 6200 YEARS AGO , DRAVYA MUST BE POORNAM ( MOIETY )..OR ELSE THERE WILL BE SIDE EFFECTS ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDravyaguna (pharmacology) deals comprehensively about rasa , guna , virya, vipaka and prabhava (pharmacokinetics and pharmcodynamics) of herbs\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThere are five concepts of the substance, namely:--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nrasa (taste),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ngu\u1e47a (properties),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nv\u012brya (potency),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nvip\u0101ka (rasa after digestion and metabolism)</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nand prabh\u0101va (specific pharmacological effect),</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014which determine and explain the pharmacological behavior of a substance.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529848590537#c884639508971628010\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 7:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_54MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA major portion of DHARMA is carried out in the Grihasta stage -- where you are creative and do your DUTY for good of society and nation ( age 25 to age 50 ). This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen the scriptural studies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received blessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha (householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children and wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's stage.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1 - 3.IX.31 5000 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT IS THE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN HINDUISM \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN GRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS WAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE CAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS DHARMA .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe 7000 year old Vedas lay down that dharma performed by a man alone without his wife is no dharma and will yield no fruit whatsoever. Such is the paramount nature of Grihasta ashrama.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Vedas hold marriage to be one of the important sacraments sanctifying the body. That is why; marriage is given great importance by the Hindus.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is said, \u201cThat man who does not win a wife is really half, and he is not the full man as long as he does not beget an offspring.\u201d A wife is also hailed as\u201d the very source of the Purusharthas, not Only of Dharma, Artha and Kama but even of Moksha.\u2019</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindu god had his wife almost as a part of him, not as a shadow.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nShiva is powerless without Shakti.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarriage in Sanatana Dharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery Hindus man is compulsorily expected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never mind what FREEMASON and Jew Rothschild\u2019s UNMARRIED Vivekananda said .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Vedas ordain that dharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma, marriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>Manu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken will have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during the grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. During Sanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe early shastras permit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of choosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait for three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for their marriage, but no more.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn Sanatana Dharma marriages are made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) and examining if the wife can indeed give him a good blow job whenever he wants it\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n--or vice versa--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nif the husband can use his tongue power on her fungi affected , smelling like putrid fish part whenever she wishes .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy own marriage was arranged.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMy elder son\u2019s marriage was arranged</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN OUR FAMILY THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN CAESARIAN BIRTHS \u2013THOUGH INDIA WAS THE FIRST TO DO THIS SURGICAL PROCEDURE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS ROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND HISTORIANS WHO GAVE UNWARRANTED PROPAGANDA FOR UNMARRIED HINDU GURUS ( I AM SURE YOU KNOW WHO THEY ARE ) .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA LOT OF THESE UNMARRIED FAKE GURUS WERE CRYPTO JEW HOMOSEXUALS - -- OR JUST FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS OF THE WHITE INVADER - THEY ARE HEROES IN YOUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt is the white invader who wrote lies that Hindus ill treat women and suppress them. No yajna (vedic ritual) can be carried out without the presence of wife.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAn Indian wife can never be KAMA patni like in the west.\u2014where as soon as lust subsides , both husband and wife are screwing behind each others back.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTODAY , DUE TO THE POISON INJECTED BY THE WHITE INVADER USING HIS FAKE MUTTS \u2013 HOMOSEXUALS WEAR SAFFRON ROBES AND CALL THEMSELVES \u201cSEERS \u201c.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nyou see SWAMI AGNIVESH is a SEER as per our commie media..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSANATANA DHARMA HAS MADE IT VERY CLEAR, THAT UNMARRIED MEN CANNOT DO A YAJNA ( HOMAM ) AND THIS NAILS THE LIE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGRIHASTA is the greatest of all other \u0101shramas because the other 3 ashramas depend on gr\u0325ihastas for food. Today the BENAMI media has taken over this LYING role.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIndophiles have cooked up fake stories how ancient Hindus trampled on their wives and all this is discusses in every literary fest.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEvery literary fest is an occasion to read cooked up anti-Hindu stories and give it a cloak of legitimacy.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJNU commie professors have invented a lot of these fake stories, claiming that their got it from Malaysia, Bali, Vietnam, Thailand etc .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSorry, there is NO Hindu purana story, that we in Kerala do NOT know about. I challenge anybody to show me proof.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Hindu women did NOT dare to consume poison or hang themselves before being capture by the Islamic invader because they would rape dead bodies even if the corpse was cold and stiff. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN\nBE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT\nWHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION (\nPRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR\nWILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTRANSFORMER ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT\nVISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS\nWAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS\nNAME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY\nSHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL\nAVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY VISHNU HAS MORTAL AVATARS --SHIVA AND BRAHMA CANNOT\nHAVE MORTAL AVATARS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU\nARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE\n( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH\nACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET\nEARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH\nMAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE.\nWHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN\nCHAKRAS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE ,\nFEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE\nELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS\nAND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW\nVIBGYOR COLORS ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:45 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHATEVER IS INVENTED/ DISCOVERED BY MAN TILL TODAY AND WILL\nBE INVENTED / DISCOVERED IN FUTURE WAS ALREADY INVENTED BEFORE THE LAST\nPRALAYA. MAN IS JUST A CHANNEL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE AIM OF A HINDU IS LIBERATION FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS-- SO\nTHAT HIS SOUL CAN GO HOME AND MERGE WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY WHEN THE SOUL FREQUENCY AND FREQUENCY\nOF THE MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ( MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \u2013SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER ) IS THE SAME.. WHEN THIS HAPPENS NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO AND THE\nHUMAN EGO IS ZERO.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE ARE JIVAN MUKTS ( ALIVE ON PLANET EARTH ) WHOSE EGO IS\nZERO AND WHOSE SOULS HAVE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHOSE FIELD EXTENDS TILL EARTH..\nTHESE ARE THE COMPASSIONATE SAGES WE REFER TO IN OUR PURANAS . A JIVAN MUKT HAS\nHIS KUNDALINI RAISED TO SAHASRARA CHAKRA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nROGUES GO TO HIMALAYAS PRETEND TO HAVE SEEN ROTHSCHIDs\nCREATION BABAJI AND CLAIM TO HAVE INSTANT KUNDALINI RAISE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANT LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE BY PRAYING TO GOD.. A\nHINDU CULTIVATES SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK\nRELIGIONS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IS A POSTIVE ENERGY EMANATING FROM WITHIN WHICH\nFACTORS IN HUMAN CONSCIENCE.. THERE CANNOT BE SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA CANNOT BE BLIND FAITH, IT IS ENLIGHTENED FAITH\u2014\nSELF VERIFICATION IS INVOLVED IN EVERY INCH OF YOUR SPRIRITUAL PROGRESS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA IMPIES SELF RELIANCE , AN INDEPENDENT SENSE OF\nRIGHT OR WRONG , RELIANCE ON OWN CONSCIENCE AND COURGAGE OF ONEs SOUL\nCONVICTIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS CAN NEVER RUSH OUT OF TEMPLES ENMASSE\nAFTER FRIDAY NOON PRAYERS AND START KILLING PEOPLE OF OTHER RELIGIONS ENMASSE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SANATANA DHARMA AFFORDS THIS UNBRIDLED FREEDOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA HINDU DOES NOT NEED TO BE SAVES BY ANY MESSIAH.. HE NEEDS\nNO ENTRY PERMISSION AT THE PEARLY GATES \u2013THERE IS NO HOUR OF JUDGEMENT . HIS\nSOUL IS SUBJECTED TO THE UNINERSAL LAWS OF QUANTUM PHYSICS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLIBERATION IS ONLY THOUGH KNOWLEDGE ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSANATANA DHARMA ASKS YOU TO WAKE UP, OTHER RELIGIONS ASK YOU\nTO REPENT..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHRADDHA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND\nSANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. BHAGWAD GITA WAS INJECTED WITH\nPOISON REPLACING SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU CANNOT GET INSTANT MOKSHA BY DIPPING IN GANGES . NO GURU\nCAN GIVE YOU DEEKSHA FOR MOKSHA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN A SON DOES SHRADDH FOR HIS DEAD FATHER , HE HELPS HIS\nFATHERs SOUL RISE BY ONE ASTRAL LAYER.. THIS IS A ONE TIME AFFAIR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA\u2014AND ONLY TO\nMEN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWOMEN ( CANNOT BE DEVOID OF EGO ) WHOSE SOULS ARE PARKED IN\nTHE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER HAVE TO TAKE RE-BIRTH AS MAN TO GET MOKSHA.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMIC BAGGAGE CAN BE LESSENED ONLY BY GOOD DEEDS AND BEING\nCREATIVE --SO THAT YOU PROVE THAT YOU MADE A DIFFERENCE TO THIS PLANET FOR THE\nBETTER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"SOUL\" GIVES PERPETUAL MOTION TO YOUR HEART . YOUR\nSOUL WAS ONCE PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD .. IT YEARNS TO MERGE BACK --IT YEARNS\nFOR MOKSHA ( HOME COMING )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN YOU GET MOKSHA YOUR SOUL HAS MERGED WITH BRAHMAN (\nMOTHER FIELD ) AND YOU ARE NOW FREE FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOUR SOUL GIVES FEEDBACK TO BRAHMAN OF YOUR LIFEs\nEXPERIENCES-- BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS SOUL EVOLUTION.. THERE IS NOTHING LIKE DARWINs\nEVOLUTION FROM MONEKY TO MAN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS MIND IS TOO SHALLOW -- ONLY A MAD\nMAN CAN SAY THAT THE GIRAFFEs NECK BECAME LONGER BECAUSE LEAVES WENT HIGHER ON\nTREE BRANCHES.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIN THIS DNA AGE, OUR NCERT BOOKS EACH OUR KIDS IN SCHOOL\nABOUT DARWINs MISSING LINK..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBURN ALL SCHOOL AND COLLEGE TEXT BOOKS IN INDIA WHICH TEACH\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs EVOLUTION IN THIS DNA AGE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE DEMAND THAT THIS BE SUBSTITUTED BY INTELLIGENT DESIGN BY\nBRAHMAN\u2014THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE SOUL WHICH EVOLVES ( from lowest frequency of\nunicelled fungus to highest moksha human Jivan Mukt frequency ) ACCORDING TO\n400 CENTURY OLD VEDANTA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nKARMA CONTROLS MOKSHA --WHICH MEANS YOUR SOUL GOES TO THE\n7TH ASTRAL LAYER -- AND YOU ARE NOW GOD YOURSELF AS YOU ( SOUL ) MATCHES THE\nMOTHER FIELDS HIGHEST FREQUENCY -NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN BACK ON PLANET\nEARTH<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. AWAITING RE-INDUCTION .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONCE YOU BECOME A HUMAN AND YOUR SOUL IS PARKED IN ASTRAL\nLAYERS TWO TO SIX\u2014YOU WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AS A LOWER FORM OF LIFE LIKE\nANIMAL.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST\nFREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING\nSPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE\nPHYSICAL BODY ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB\nMOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN\nASTRAL LAYERS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMA USHERS IN --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS\nTHAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE DOG REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF\nDHARMA \u201c..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN )\nYUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS\nLIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 )\nDECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL\nHAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA\n.. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES--\nHE DID IT AND HOW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX\nWITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5\nPANDAVAS TOO..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY\nKRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW\nSTAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH\n--THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE\nDECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST\nASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS\n\"PURGATORY\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR\nANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF\n\"GRATITUDE\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE\nRIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS\nWHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT\nNEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN\nHAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. HAVE YOU HEARD THE VOICE OF\nTHIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR\nJUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI\nSRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON\nWERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME\n. THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED\nBACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE\nDESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE\nSTARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON\nWAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN\nWITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC\nCONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5\nSENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD )\nPROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE\nCOSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are\nconscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites\nTamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos\nis change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is\nvibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic\nspiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant .\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They\nconsume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the\nmediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is\nwhy Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal\navatars.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it\nreally does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug\ninto the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each\nother , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas\nalways results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously\ndevour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without\nvibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 5-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is\nNOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE-\nprakriti.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as\nbeing created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are\npermanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal\naspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their\nconsorts.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the\nsame body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a\nmindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the\nchangeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active\naspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his\nspirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS\nhere- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the\nsentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.\nPragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The\nrelationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and\nShakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well\nas in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also\nthe agent of all change<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is\nwithdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy\nare interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the\nways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU\nJAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO\nSMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nREAD ALL 102 PARTS OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_81TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/soil-liquefaction-during-earth-quakes.html?showComment=1539526660089#c2620535673872385066\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 14, 2018 at 7:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_80MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.narendramodi.in/132nd-rath-yatra-of-lord-jagannath-begins-3349<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WERE NO RATH YATRAS.. THIS IS NOT PART OF SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED THESE RATHA YATRAS USING HIS FAKE MUTTS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE MUTTS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD SPONSORED THE CASTE SYSTEM AND SUPPRESSION OF DALITS<br />\n<br />\nON THE RATHA YATRA DAY DALITS WERE ALLOWED TO SEE THE DEITY<br />\n<br />\nAND THEY WERE ALLOWED TO COOK PRASAD<br />\n<br />\nTHE SAME ONCE IN A YEAR THINGY WAS DONE AT KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE--WHERE THE WHITE INVADER IMPORTED DALIT TAMILS TO DESECRATE THE TEMPLE-- SHIT/ SEMEN/ BLOOD WAS THROWN ON THE DEITY WHILE SINGING XXX SEX SONGS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nPURI RATH YATRA --<br />\n<br />\nlet me quote wikipedia-<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Rasa Lila<br />\nDakshina Moda, marks the beginning of the three-day Rasa Lila of Jagannath.[12] Rasa lila is described in Hindu texts like the Bhagavata Purana and Gita Govinda as a night in Vrindavan when Krishna danced with his gopi-consort Radha and other gopis. The image of Jagannath is taken to the Rasa mandapa (a temple hall) of the Gundicha Temple where hymns from the Gita Govinda are sung for the last 3 days of his stay in the temple. During the Rasa Lila, the interaction between Jagannath-Krishna and the gopis is enacted through the Gita Govinda verses. In the olden days, Devadasis sang the verses, which are now sung by the temple servitors. Vaishnavas thus consider Gundicha Temple as Vrindavan during Jagannath's stay there.[13] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nDEVADASIS, RADHA, JAYADEVA ARE ALL FAKE AND BACK DATED CREATIONS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: when Jagannath (identified with the god Krishna) goes to stay for seven days in the Gundicha Temple, he intentionally leaves behind his consort Lakshmi locked up in a store room in the main Jagannath temple. While in the Gundicha temple, he is exclusively taken care by his gopis (cow-herding girls) led by his gopi-lover Radha like Krishna in Vrindavan. The gopis are symbolized by the temple devadasis on this occasion. When Jagannatha returns to his main temple after his amorous dalliance, Lakshmi meets him at the main temple gate and sprinkles some magical powder on him, which makes him forget about his escapade in the Gundicha Temple, and she is immediately reunited with her husband in blissful love.[18] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Lakshmi requests him to return home and Jagannath gives his consent by offering her agyan mala (a garland of consent), which the goddess accepts and takes with her while return to the main temple in the evening. Before returning to the temple, to vent her anger at being left out of the vacation, Lakshmi orders one of her attendants to damage a part of Jagannath's chariot, the Nandighosha. This ritual is known as the Ratha Bhanga (the breaking of the chariot).[10][11] This is followed by her hiding behind a tamarind tree outside the Gundicha Temple. After some time, she escapes to her home temple in secrecy, through a separate path way known as Hera Gohri Lane, as she fears the repercussions of her angry act.[10][11]UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br />\n<br />\nLAKSHMI IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gundicha_Temple<br />\n<br />\nAT EVERY LITERARY FEST THE DROHI BASTARDS COOK UP MORE AND MORE IMMORAL STORIES-- HOW A HINDU GOD WILL LEAVE HIS WIFE TO GO FOR OUTSIDE SEX . SOME OF THESE FOUL STORIES ARE COOKED UP BY JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_80BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/soil-liquefaction-during-earth-quakes.html?showComment=1539527673742#c3818086798541581105\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 14, 2018 at 8:04 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_79MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI HAVE SEEN THE FAKE UDIPI MUTT RATH YATRA..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE INTERVIEWED PAST PARTICIPANTS OF PARYAYA..<br />\n<br />\nMADHAVACHARYA IS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD.. UDIPI SRI KRISHNA TEMPLE ( ATTACHED TO THE FAKE UDIPI MUTT ) WAS A AYYAPPA TEMPLE BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html<br />\n<br />\nFAKE Madhwacharya gave sanyasa deeksha to 8 \u201cbala yatis\u201d\u200a\u2014\u200achild ascetics\u200a\u2014\u200aand made them in charge of the worship. Each yati was supposed to take turns and worship the murthy for two months. Thus, once every 16 months, the opportunity to worship would return.<br />\n<br />\nSATELLITE FAKE MUTT GALORE..<br />\n<br />\nThe names of the founders of the mathas and their matha name is as below<br />\n<br />\nSri Hrishikesha Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aPalimaru Matha<br />\nSri Narasimha Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aAdamaru Matha<br />\nSri Janardana Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aKrishnapura Matha<br />\nSri Upendra Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aPutthige Matha<br />\nSri Vamana Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aShirooru Matha<br />\nSri Vishnu Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aSode Matha<br />\nSri Rama Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aKaniyooru Matha<br />\nSri Adhokshaja Tirtha\u200a\u2014\u200aPejawara Matha<br />\n<br />\nThe transfer of responsibility, and indeed the whole duration of worship, came to be popularly known as \u201cparyaya\u201d. For e.g. if the yati of Pejawara Matha was handling the worship, it would be known as the \u201cPejawara paryaya\u201d and so on.<br />\n<br />\nOn the day of makara sankramana, a grand festival is arranged at Udupi. On the next day, the churnotsava (jaatre) is conducted. Two days later, the outgoing Swamiji conducts a brahma-rathothsava and offers special pujas to Krishna and arranges a grand feast for all devotees.<br />\n<br />\nALL THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SANATANA DHARMA.. NO POWER CAN BE GRABBED BY ANY MUTT HEAD..<br />\n<br />\nThe Swamijis of the FAKE UDUPI Dvaita tradition all wear silk on the paryaya day .<br />\n<br />\nThe culmination of the grand PARYAYA procession occurs with the Swamiji reaching the center of Udupi, specifically the ratha-beedi ( chariot) where the Udupi Sri Krishna temple exists.<br />\n<br />\nOn any given day, the paryaya Swamiji has to perform 14 different pujas to Krishna starting at brahmi muhurtha and ending late night. However, on the paryaya day, the outgoing Swamiji performs only the first of these pujas. The subsequent ones are to be performed by the incoming Swamiji.<br />\n<br />\nAn arathi is performed to Krishna and then to the Hanuman murthi just outside. Krishna has nothing to do with monkey Hanuman of Ramayana..<br />\n<br />\nThe final part of the paryaya ceremony is the glittering public ceremony at the nearby \u201craajangana\u201d. This is a public hall where the 8 Swamijis arrive together. Huge number of dignitaries\u200a\u2014\u200apolitical, social and religious\u200a\u2014\u200awould have gathered there by then.<br />\n<br />\nLater in the afternoon, nearly a lakh of devotees are fed a sumptous meal<br />\n<br />\nLET SIKHS STOP LANGAR IN GURUDWARAS -- LET THEM CHECK OUT HOW MANY DEVOTEES COME TO THE GURUDWARAS AFTER A YEAR..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_80b+seedBe5gD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7239643680561658008\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/02971375323473786342\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Subhash Rao</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1534681891531#c7239643680561658008\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 19, 2018 at 6:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\n<br />\nPlease clear a doubt of mine...in the verse \"yada yada hi dharmasya, glanirbhavati Bha-ra-ta\"<br />\n...is Bha-ra-ta a reference to the land of India or Arjuna? Because the true meaning changes the entire context of the verse. THE WHITE INVADER INJECTED POISON AND REPLACED LAND BHARAT WITH BHARATA ( SON OF SHAKUNTALA WHO NEVER EXISTED )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA ( ARJUNAs ANCESTOR ) IS NAMED AFTER BHARATA ( LAND)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BHA / BHAVA- EMOTION<br />RA / RAGA- MELODY<br />TA / TALA- RHYTHM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Natya Shastra like Vedas have NO author as it is a SRUTI . The white invader converted Bharata into a MUNI ( sage ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE ANCESTOR OF PANDAVAS AND KAURAVAS WAS BHARATA ( 8165 BC ) SON OF RISHABHA (8190 BC ) AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</b></span></div>\n<br />\nThe story of Shakuntala has been added as an appendage in the Mahabharata ( Adiparva chapter ) by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO JEW Raja Ravi Varma who painted the non-existent Radha ( mistress of Lord Krishna ) does the honours for Shakuntala too.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is considered as the first Thirthankara. Mahavira was the 24th Thirthankara..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PUT MONKEY HANUMAN ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT.. THE REAL FLAG WAS KRISHNAs FLAG EMBLAZONED WITH VISHNUs CARRIER GARUDA..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE TEMPLE FOR HANUMAN , THE GOD OF THE DEVADASIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nEINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. THAT IS WHY HE IS THE NO 1 WRITER ON THE PLANET WITH PROFILE VIEW OF 739 MILLION...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE ALSO COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE THE WHITE MAN AND COMMIES WHO ARE INVITED FOR DROHI LITERARY FESTS RIDICULED THAT BRAHMA DID INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU GOOGLE \u201c&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAHMA INCEST</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c YOU WILL GET 4.8 LAKH POSTS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) IS THE MIGHTY QUASAR WHICH IS SEVERAL TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANT THAN THE SUN....</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE VEDAS WHICH WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO REFERS TO SARASWATI..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHIVA WIFE PARVATI ( DEVI/ BHAGAWATI/ DURGA / KALI ) IS A MIGHTY COSMIC ALLEGORY.. IN HER DESTRUCTIVE FORM SHE IS THE BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLONG AGO WHEN MEAND MY WIFE CLIMBED UP KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN, MANY READERS ASKED ME WHY I DID THAT..<br />\n<br />\nWELL MY WIFE DID ORGONE ENERGY MAPPING..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST ABOVE I WROTE ABOUT DEVI FOLLOWING ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND TELLING HIM NOT TO LOOK BACK.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) ; prav\u1e5bitte\u2014about to commence; \u015bhastra-samp\u0101te\u2014to use the weapons; dhanu\u1e25\u2014bow; udyamya\u2014taking up; p\u0101\u1e47\u1e0dava\u1e25\u2014Arjun, the son of Pandu; h\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u012bke\u015bham\u2014to Shree Krishna; tad\u0101\u2014at that time; v\u0101kyam\u2014words; idam\u2014these; \u0101ha\u2014said; mah\u012b-pate\u2014King<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 1.20: At that time, the son of Pandu, Arjun, who had the insignia of Hanuman (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) on the flag of his chariot, took up his bow. Seeing your sons arrayed against him, O King, Arjun then spoke the following words to Shree Krishna.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH DWAJAH IS NOT MONKEY FLAG</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH MEANS VISHNU\u2014</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cKAPIH DWAJAH\u201d MEANS VISHNUs BANNER \u2013 GARUDA</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">KAPIH&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( sun ) is one of the 1008 names of Vishnu in Vishnu Sahasranamah</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KAPI MEANS BROWN.<br />IN MALAYALAM WE CALL IT COFFEE COLOUR.<br />KAPI DOES NOT MEAN MONKEY IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT</span></b><br />\n<br />\n###################3<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO TELL ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHCHILD NEVER EXPECTED A BLOGGER CAPTAIN IN TOWN !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.22 %</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_60B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;
