INSERTED AT THE SE CORNER OF KAABA 5 FEET ABOVE THE GROUND..<br />\n<br />\nALLAH WHICH CANNOT BE PICKED UP BY THE 5 HUMAN SENSES IS BRAHMAN , THE FIELD , THE ADVAITA VEDANTA GOD...<br />\n<br />\nALL AND AH ARE BEEJ MANTRAS OF SAHASRARA CHAKRA....<br />\n<br />\n786 PRINTED ON THE COVER OF KORAN IS OM , THE HINDU KING MANTRA... WRITE OM SYMBOL AND SHOW IT INTO A MIRROR AND THEN READ FROM RIGHT TO LEFT.. YOU CAN SEE 786...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nSEND ABOVE COMMENT TO---<br />\nSHAH RUKH KHAN<br />\nGAURI KHAN<br />\nSALMAN KHAN</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_108TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_107B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2861885162054538212\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_107M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/ten-avatars-of-vishnu-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1542152387585#c2861885162054538212\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 14, 2018 at 5:09 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_107MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT<br />IMPORTANT<br />IMPORTANT<br /><br />ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN HAS PUT THE ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IN FOG BY PUTTING THE SPIN OF THE WORD \u201cSHARANAM \u201c WHICH IS COMMON IN THE SABARIMALA CHANT AND BUDDHIST CHANT ..<br /><br />PEOPLE OF KERALA LISTEN UP.. THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT MESSAGE YOU WILL EVER READ IN YOUR LIVES.. KNOW WHO YOU ARE ..<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION OF KERALA PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />THIS TRUE HISTORY HAS BEEN SUNK BY THE WHITE MAN WHO DID NOT WANT THE GLORY OF EGYPTIAN CIVILIZATION TO BE OWNED BY KERALA..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br /><br />WE SEE THE FAMILIAR KATHAKALI DUO OF A MAN IN ELABORATE HEADGEAR AND A WOMAN IN A CAPE.. WHO ARE THEY ?<br /><br />THEY ARE DANAVA KING HIRANYAKASHIPU AND HIS SISTER HOLIKA WEARING THE MAGICAL FIRE PROTECTION CAPE..<br /><br />HOLIKA WAS KILLED , THIS IS WHY KERALA DOES NOT CELEBRATE HOLI..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VISHNUs FOURTH AVATAR NARASIMHA</span></b>&nbsp;CAME TO KILL DANAVA KING HIRANYAKASHIPU ....<br /><br />KERALA KING MAHABALIs FATHER EMPEROR VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE PLANET..<br /><br />DANAVA KING MAHABALIs GREAT GRANDFATHER WAS HIRANYAKASHIPU ( VIJAYA , VISHNUs BELOVED GATE KEEPER ) .. .<br /><br />SAGE SHUKRACHARYA THE MENTOR OF KING MAHABALI ASKED HIM TO DO THE ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA ..<br /><br />THIS IS NOT A BLOODY HORSE SACRIFICE BUT A \u201cVOTE OF CONFIDENCE\u201d WHICH MAKE A KING AN EMPEROR.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</span><br /><br />KING MAHABALI CONDUCTED THE ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA AND DECLARED HIMSELF EMPEROR ANGERING THE DEVAS WHO THEN REQUESTED VISHNU TO COME AS FIFTH AVATAR VAMANA ( BLUE FACED BRAHMIN MIDGET ) AND BANISH EMPEROR MAHABALI TO PATALA ( PERU )..<br /><br />THE DEVAS WERE UNNERVED BY THE \u201c&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">SHARANAM&nbsp;</span></b>\u201c ( PROTECTION ) PROVIDED BY EMPEROR MAHABALI TO VASSAL KINGS WHO SHIFTED ALLEGIANCE TO THE POWERFUL AND PROSPEROUS DANAVA CAMP..<br /><br />FESTIVALS CONTINUE AS A BLOODLINE DON\u2019T LIE.. KERALA DOES NOT CELEBRATE DIWALI.. WE WERE AT THE RECEIVING END , THAT IS WHY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</span><br /><br />THE MAYAN / AZTEC/ INCA CIVILIZATION IS DANAVA..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br /><br />THE EGYPTIAN CIVILIZATION IS DANAVA..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYYAPPA WAS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU..<br /><br />HE DISAPPEARED FROM KERALA AS A SMALL CHILD AND RESURFACED IN EGYPT AS IMHOTEP, THE GOD FROM THE EAST , WHO WAS MORE POWERFUL THAN THE PHARAOH..&nbsp;</span></b><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br /><br />WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE BUDDHIST LEFT IN INDIA.. BUDDHISM DID NOT APPEAL TO INDIANS AS BUDDHA ATE PIG AND DID NOT BELIEVE IN THE SOUL..<br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD REMOVED AYYAPPA AS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU AND INSERTED BUDDHA TO REVIVE BUDDHISM AND \u201cDIVIDE AND RULE \u201c..</span></b><br /><br />ASHOKA WHO CONVERTED FROM BAAAAAD HINDUSIM TO GOOOOOD BUDDHISM NEVER EXISTED.. CHANAKYA WAS A KERALA NAMBOODIRI PROFESSOR.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br /><br />JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AYYAPPA TEMPLES IN KARNATAKA/ TAMIL NADU/ ANDHRA AND TELENGANA .. BUT HEY, THE HUMAN DNA MEMORY MADE SURE THAT TODAY MORE PEOPLE FROM THESE STATES COME FOR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE THAN MALAYALIS..<br /><br />THE FAKE UDIPI MUTT WAS AN AYYAPPA TEMPLE.. THE AYYAPPA IDOL WHICH WAS REMOVED AND REPLACED BY FAKE MADHAVACHARYAs KRISHNA IDOL IS IN THE ADJACENT SHIVA TEMPLE AT UDIPI , AT ONE CORNER OF THE PRADIKSHANAM..<br /><br />MY WIFE PRAYED TO THIS APAYYA IDOL ALMOST EVERY WEEK FOR THREE YEARS WHEN MY YOUNGER SON WAS AT MANIPAL UNIVESRITY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html</span><br /><br />THE FAKE KANCHI MUTT WAS A AYYAPPA TEMPLE..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Three days ago,\nKedarnath temple and the Nandi Bull at its entrance was the sole survivor of\nlandslides and flash floods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thousand of devotees\nare feared dead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 2012 season 5.5\nlakh pilgrims visited Kedarnath . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2000 BC, Adi\nShankaracharya came to Kedarnath with 4 of his disciples. &nbsp;However he preferred to go the final 14 kilometers alone to Kedarnath\ntemple from Gauri Kund hot springs , which he created for his shivering disciples\n.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EFtnSYQALZ4/UcRa_zakbHI/AAAAAAAAjWg/SKYR-7J8s74/s1600/images+(2).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EFtnSYQALZ4/UcRa_zakbHI/AAAAAAAAjWg/SKYR-7J8s74/s640/images+(2).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He shed his mortal coil at Kedarnath temple and attained moksha at the age of 32. &nbsp;Moksha is\nfreedom for the endless cycle of re-births.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The relatives of the pilgrims\nwho died must seek consolation from this belief that at Kedanath you get Mokshsa\n, if you die ( not if you commit suicide ). &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0be9uIIxDM8/UcWwOODeeoI/AAAAAAAAjcY/Yesrhd_543k/s1600/1016678_10151666088913826_361991130_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya who\nwas born in Kerala at Kaladi , was kicked forward in time by the white\nChristian invader and their Tamilian Iyer Brahmin stooges by 2800 years . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In return for fudging ancient Indian history,\nthey granted the death of Adi Shankaracharya at Kanchipuram \u2013 which is a white\nlie.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kanchi Mutt\nChronicles , claim that Adi Sankaracharya had spent the last days of his life\nin Kanchipuram where he attained samadhi, and not in the Himalayas . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They cooked upa Samadhi at the Kamakshi temple\npremises and named it `Shankaracharya samadhi'. &nbsp;This is in addition to fudging the records for\nthe line of Shankaracharyas in 800 AD instead of 2000 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But what these Christian\ninvader historians could NOT understand is that you can never have a samadhi\ninside a Devi temple. &nbsp;So now this mandapam\nis renamed &nbsp;as `Shankaracharya sannidhi',\na sanctum, &nbsp;not a dargah or tomb.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kedarnath temple Shiva\nlingam is pyramid shaped and hence is unique among Shiva temples. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z6TMeS9eELU/UcRwUSLwTwI/AAAAAAAAjXI/Bf40nKhTImM/s1600/Kedarnath.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z6TMeS9eELU/UcRwUSLwTwI/AAAAAAAAjXI/Bf40nKhTImM/s640/Kedarnath.jpg\" width=\"377\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Mahabharat war\nof 4000 BC, &nbsp;the finest flower of\nchivalry and heroism perished in the flames of war in a matter of eighteen\ndays. &nbsp;&nbsp;Pandavas were guilty of over drive, of course\naided by Lord Krishna. They had no honour left and were having nightmares\nduring sleep. &nbsp;It was Lord Krishna himself\nwho advised them to seek the blessing of Lord Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To find out what\nhappened in the Mahabharata war, punch into Google search-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">MAHABHARATA AND\nBHAGAWAT GITA 4000 BC VADAKAYIL</span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Hpb4W4vzD3Y/UcReUEh52KI/AAAAAAAAjWw/LqJbNkz35sw/s1600/download.jpgkjguv.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Hpb4W4vzD3Y/UcReUEh52KI/AAAAAAAAjWw/LqJbNkz35sw/s400/download.jpgkjguv.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Above: &nbsp;Arjuna can be seen restraining Krishna from attacking grand sire Bheeshma against the rules of the war. &nbsp;Bheeshma was killed by Arjuna by firing his arrows over the shoulders of Shikandi . &nbsp;Bheeshma did NOT protect himself as he recognised Shikandi as Amba in re-birth. &nbsp;Amba had jumped into the fire as Bheeshma refused to marry her ( in her previous life ), &nbsp;when insisted by Parashurama..</b></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gCS5lW4FD1Y/UcSrib5AkJI/AAAAAAAAjYI/bSvn7oF7Z6Q/s1600/tumblr_lzgo0866Xe1rnm60yo1_1280.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gCS5lW4FD1Y/UcSrib5AkJI/AAAAAAAAjYI/bSvn7oF7Z6Q/s1600/tumblr_lzgo0866Xe1rnm60yo1_1280.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon the onset of the\nKali yuga and the departure of Lord Krishna, Yudhisthira and his four brothers\nretired, leaving the throne to their only descendant to survive the war of\nKurukshetra, Arjuna's grandson Parikshit.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Below: King Parikshit putting a poisonous snake on Shamika rishi while in deep meditation.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QNF79MZtDc8/Uclwfa0fh6I/AAAAAAAAjgo/9pIRn0UX09M/s1600/parikshit.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QNF79MZtDc8/Uclwfa0fh6I/AAAAAAAAjgo/9pIRn0UX09M/s400/parikshit.jpg\" width=\"312\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Parikshit who was\nkilled by snake bite , was father of Emperor Jayameyjayan who built Kedarnath\nTemple in a grand manner .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j8P15bZFLVQ/UcTE2MeAvOI/AAAAAAAAjZs/4vO3g61ed-g/s1600/thumbimg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"395\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-j8P15bZFLVQ/UcTE2MeAvOI/AAAAAAAAjZs/4vO3g61ed-g/s640/thumbimg.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving up all their belongings and ties, the\nPandavas and Draupadi , accompanied by a dog, made their final journey of\npilgrimage to the Himalayas in search of Lord Shiva .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile at Kedarnath\na very healthy and good looking bull joined them.&nbsp; Shiva has taken the form of the bull, as he\nwas NOT happy with the Pandavas for their deceit during the war, and hence\nloathe to give them darshan. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G9lbQ71qSvM/UcWu1EkwL4I/AAAAAAAAjcE/-Sny1_BpM8g/s1600/image_thumb%5B12%5D.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"308\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G9lbQ71qSvM/UcWu1EkwL4I/AAAAAAAAjcE/-Sny1_BpM8g/s400/image_thumb%5B12%5D.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pandavas sort of\nhad the gut feeling that the bull was Shiva in disguise. &nbsp;Bhima as usual jumped the gun and tried to\ncatch the bull by its tail. &nbsp;Lord Shiva\njust disappeared into the ground, leaving the hump above the ground as a Lingam, &nbsp;and a blazing fiery column of light sprouted.\nThis is why only the Kedarnath Shiva Lingam is a sort of a &nbsp;hump.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digression:&nbsp; While climbing the peaks, Draupadi and four\nof the Pandavas fell to their deaths, dragged down by the weight of their guilt\nfor their enormous sins.&nbsp; Yudhisthira was\nthe only one to reach the mountain peak, because he was unblemished by sin or\nuntruth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wnCXtF8M3YU/UcSqNKRrAfI/AAAAAAAAjXo/uMO-q-xVcJg/s1600/heaven.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wnCXtF8M3YU/UcSqNKRrAfI/AAAAAAAAjXo/uMO-q-xVcJg/s400/heaven.jpg\" width=\"201\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact remains that\nhe did deceive to kill his Guru Dronacharya, by using a loophole . He said\nAshwatthama is dead alluding to an elephant , which was also the name of\nDronacharya\u2019s son. Dronacharya got down from his chariot in grief , sat down in\nmeditative pose and he was beheaded from behind..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QQqsMnw2gMs/UcSqYyQ7pLI/AAAAAAAAjXw/EEyoZ8zsqGQ/s1600/trjytj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QQqsMnw2gMs/UcSqYyQ7pLI/AAAAAAAAjXw/EEyoZ8zsqGQ/s320/trjytj.jpg\" width=\"215\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On reaching the top,\nIndra asked him to abandon the dog before entering the Heaven, at Chorabari &nbsp;Sarovar. But Yudhisthira\nrefused to do so, citing the dog's unflinching loyalty as a reason. &nbsp;Once again it turned out that the dog was his\nfather, Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5636L4QtMf4/UcSyFkSuQII/AAAAAAAAjYY/CyqUobPrfms/s1600/2652987991_0597264270_z.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5636L4QtMf4/UcSyFkSuQII/AAAAAAAAjYY/CyqUobPrfms/s640/2652987991_0597264270_z.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chorabari lake, 3900 metres above sea level is also known as Gandhi sarovar, as his ashes were immersed here. You can see the Chorabari Bamak glacier in the picture above-- 3 kms from Kedarnath.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7CXIeJWEibI/UcSqFy0icQI/AAAAAAAAjXg/66LboCBslnM/s1600/images+(4).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"309\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7CXIeJWEibI/UcSqFy0icQI/AAAAAAAAjXg/66LboCBslnM/s400/images+(4).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The origin of the\nrevered temple can be found in the great epic Mahabharat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why was King Pariskhit ,\nthe father of Emperor Jayemeyjayan killed by snake bite?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who are\ninterested in knowing this punch into Google search \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>KING COBRA AND SNAKE\nTEMPLES OF KERALA VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Outside the Kedarnath\ntemple there is a stone statue of Nandi bull.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0x-P1cCBMRk/UcSqoUTTDMI/AAAAAAAAjX4/6Vqp48zPAUA/s1600/images+(2).jpgtrshj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0x-P1cCBMRk/UcSqoUTTDMI/AAAAAAAAjX4/6Vqp48zPAUA/s1600/images+(2).jpgtrshj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who is Nandi?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nandi, the sacred bull\nthat Shiva rides, is another commonly recognizable symbol of Shiva worship. &nbsp;Almost all Shiva temples have the Nandi humped\nbull reclining on a raised platform and facing the entrance door of the shrine gazing\nat the Lord in his symbolic Shiva Lingam form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Samudra Manthan\nthe whole sea polymerized due to a deadly poison catalyzed by Snake Vasuki\u2019s\nvenom. &nbsp;The planet was now in imminent danger\n. &nbsp;Lord Shiva came forward as only he\ncould salvage the grave situation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xXxEdcxfj78/UcTEqfMjt0I/AAAAAAAAjZk/bZCNwPEJfUw/s1600/images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"481\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xXxEdcxfj78/UcTEqfMjt0I/AAAAAAAAjZk/bZCNwPEJfUw/s640/images.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva scooped up the poison\ninto his hand and drank it. Fearing that her husband would die, Parvati constricted\nhis neck and the descent of the poison was in turn stopped at his throat. The poison\nstarted spilling out of his mouth and Nandi jumped forward and lapped it up. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The devas and asuras\nwatching were shocked and wondered aloud what would happen to Nandi. &nbsp;Lord Siva calmed their fears saying,\n\"Nandi &nbsp;has surrendered into me so\ncompletely that he has all my powers and my protection\". &nbsp;Nandi is lso considered as &nbsp;one of Shiva\u2019s two door-keepers, the other\nbeing Mahakala.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5qkaJacC2Qs/UciYGEjvwNI/AAAAAAAAjfU/nARV86hy2Ko/s1600/kedarnath-temple_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5qkaJacC2Qs/UciYGEjvwNI/AAAAAAAAjfU/nARV86hy2Ko/s640/kedarnath-temple_1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Above : View from Kedarnath temple.</b></span></i><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi&nbsp; Sankaracharya&nbsp;\nrenovated the Kedarnath shrine in 2000 BC. &nbsp;At the back, there is the Samadhi of Shankaracharya\nwhich is visited by all who visit the Kedarnath temple. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bepUBlz9z-M/UcwIdNtwK-I/AAAAAAAAjk0/RiEGXC9QU8I/s1600/148d0ca028d2858a0e5a566a4660bd2a_1371888025.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bepUBlz9z-M/UcwIdNtwK-I/AAAAAAAAjk0/RiEGXC9QU8I/s400/148d0ca028d2858a0e5a566a4660bd2a_1371888025.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above: The Adi Shankaracharya\nsamadhi at Kedarnath houses a spathika shivalingam.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spatika shivalingam is basically\na trigonal srystal , one part silicon and two parts oxygen. It has </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">mysterious healing properties and removes all\ncurses and negative karma . Nobody ever leaves Kedarnath without praying to\nthis Shiva lingam.</span></b></span></i></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He established four mutts in four directions\nof the country in 2000 BC \u2013 Jyotir mutt in North, &nbsp;Govardhan\nMutt at Puri in east, &nbsp;Shringeri &nbsp;Mutt in Karnataka in south and Dwarika mutt in\nGujarat in west .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7PJ9ccgMR4k/UcTEBjVe_xI/AAAAAAAAjZU/FYTA80Zeq5s/s1600/773(601)posKedarnathTemple1882.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"528\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7PJ9ccgMR4k/UcTEBjVe_xI/AAAAAAAAjZU/FYTA80Zeq5s/s640/773(601)posKedarnathTemple1882.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above : Photograph of Kedarnath temple 130 years ago.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kanchi Mutt which Tamil\nIyers stooges of the British keep shouting from tree tops about, &nbsp;did NOT exist in Adi Shankaracharya\u2019s scheme\nof affairs. &nbsp;Kanchi Mutt is the one who kicked Adi Shankaracharya 2800 years forward in time &nbsp;Fake Kanchi mutt records were created in collusion with desh drohi Tamil Iyers..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TCn7fB4fQmw/UcTEPZgKW5I/AAAAAAAAjZc/BbWluoE5VbM/s1600/images+(2).jpgcm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TCn7fB4fQmw/UcTEPZgKW5I/AAAAAAAAjZc/BbWluoE5VbM/s640/images+(2).jpgcm.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Above : Photograph of Kedarnath temple in July 2013--after the floods.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British would have recorded Adi Shankaracharya's conversations with imaginary Christians and Muslims outside Kanchi Mutt -- the same way they made Lord Ayyappa of Sabarimala do, &nbsp;to make him a very recent phenomenon after the birth of Christianity and Islam..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Lz2MehblFHw/UcTDj-6rgfI/AAAAAAAAjZM/iU9qsN53KW0/s1600/774+Peaks&amp;templeKedernathGriesbach1883.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"481\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Lz2MehblFHw/UcTDj-6rgfI/AAAAAAAAjZM/iU9qsN53KW0/s640/774+Peaks&amp;templeKedernathGriesbach1883.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><b>Above: Photograph of Kedarnath temple 130 years ago.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism, Char Dham\nYatra in Himalayas comprises of pilgrimage to Badrinath Temple, Kedarnath\nTemple, Gangotri and Yamunotri in Uttarakhand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kedarnath temple in\nUttarakhand state is nestled in the snow-clad Himalayas is only by foot, and open\nonly for six months a year. &nbsp;From\nGaurikund hot water springs it is a 14 kms journey by foot or by horses. The\npilgrim gets to witness wild unparalleled scenic beauty, &nbsp;panoramic views of innumerable snow - clad\npeaks, &nbsp;mind blowing rhododendron forests\nand enchanting alpine meadows. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zgcWm_rpDuI/UcTDbFkbTdI/AAAAAAAAjZE/HmqURDReU6Q/s1600/rho3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"419\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zgcWm_rpDuI/UcTDbFkbTdI/AAAAAAAAjZE/HmqURDReU6Q/s640/rho3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very close to the indo- Chinese border,\nwhere the Mandakini River originates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The head priest (Rawal)\nof the Kedarnath temple belongs to the Veerashaiva community from Karnataka..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Originally Kerala Namboodiris were the priests,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">as ordained by Adi Shankaracharya.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O1mnJ6MaMlY/UcTFSNOTd8I/AAAAAAAAjZ8/a3MkQJgL7-c/s1600/Kedarnath-6512_9.jpg.pagespeed.ce.t4BN42Lmkg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O1mnJ6MaMlY/UcTFSNOTd8I/AAAAAAAAjZ8/a3MkQJgL7-c/s320/Kedarnath-6512_9.jpg.pagespeed.ce.t4BN42Lmkg.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rawal moves along with the deity to\nUkhimath during the winter season when the temple is totally rimed by hard ice\nand path is blocked by snow. Near Kedarnath is the source of the river\nMandakini that joins Alakananda at Rudraprayag.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mT21-Fi5How/UcTFa3oaSjI/AAAAAAAAjaE/MbxssNDLCAw/s1600/download.jpgji8on.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mT21-Fi5How/UcTFa3oaSjI/AAAAAAAAjaE/MbxssNDLCAw/s400/download.jpgji8on.jpg\" width=\"294\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ascending the large\ngray steps leading to the holy sanctum of Kedarnath you can find inscriptions\nin Pali.. The main shrine is known as Garbha Griha, where the devotees pay\ntheir offerings and worship Lord Shiva. &nbsp;The\nmandap, houses the images of Pandavas , Draupadi , Lord Krishna and &nbsp;Kunti (mother of Pandavas). &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 12\nJyothirlinga temples in India, where Lord Shiva appeared as a blazing column of\nlight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Luke says, \u201cAnd the Holy Spirit came down in a bodily shape, like a dove on Him.\u201d Because the Holy Spirit is just that\u2014spirit\u2014He is not visible to us. On this occasion, however, the Spirit took on a visible appearance and was doubtless seen by the people. The dove is an emblem of purity and harmlessness (Matthew 10:16), and the form of the dove at Jesus\u2019 baptism signified that the Spirit with which Jesus was endowed was one of holiness and innocence\u2026BLAH BLAH \u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">SAME WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD COOKED UP THE BIRD NONSENSE FOR AMARTNATH CAVE..IN THIS CASE PIGEON EGG .. font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535723056266#c8836530626581760483\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">August 31, 2018 at 7:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA,&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KUTTANAD</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;WAS CALLED&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CHUTTANADU.</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />CHUTTA MEANS BURNT..NADU MEANS LAND</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">KHANDAVA FOREST WAS SITUATED HERE.. THIS FOREST WAS BURNT DOWN 6000 YEARS AGO BY LORD KRISHNA TO ARM TWIST MAYA DANAVA ( BEST ARCHITEST ON THE PLANET ) INTO BUILDING THE INDRAPRASTA PALACE WITH ITS HALL OF ILLUSIONS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya ( Danava ) is mentioned 23 times in the Ramayana, and 61 times in the Mahabharata. A unique reason for glory and legacy indeed. He was the acharya of all the Mayavis ( sorcerers).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kasyapa\u2018s 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was in the Khandava forest, to build for Takshaka the Naga king.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">This was the opportunity Arjuna in collusion with Lord Krishna looked for. They set fire to the mighty forest which was reputed to hold every specimen of flora and fauna.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In this gruesome deliberate fire everything died except Takshaka's Aswasena son and 4 sarnagaka birds. Maya Danava was conveniently saved by Lord Krishna.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Out of sheer gratitude Asura Maya Danava asked , how he can ever repay Arjuna. Immediately Lord Krishna trapped him. \"Let a palatial Sabha (meeting hall) as thou choosest, be built by thee, if thou, O son of Diti, who art the foremost of all artists, desirest to do good to Yudhishthira the just (Mahabharata.2.1)\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Krishna told Arjuna \"Your city has been constructed by Vishwakarma and is truly beautiful. However, the Indraprastha palace is much too plain for such a wonderful city. Let a palatial meeting hall be constructed for Yudhishtra the just. Maya Danava is the best person to construct it, being the architect of the Asuras.\"</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KRISHNA WAS ALREADY SETTING UP THE INCIDENT OF KING DURYODHANA FALLING INTO A POOL OF WATER , QUEEN DRAUPADI LAUGHING LOUND IN SARCASM\u2014WHICH WAS THE TRIGGER FOR THE MAHABHARATA WAR.</span></b></div>\n<br />Maya measured out a plot of land five thousand cubits square and began the construction. Soon the peerless palace of great beauty encrusted with diamonds was completed. The columns of this palace were made of gold.<br /><br />Maya appointed 8000 asuras called Kinkaras to guard this palace. Inside the palace, there were many amazing devices. It took the Maya just fourteen months to complete this building. Everything was made as per the principles of Vaastu.<br /><br />In Indian history, Mayan appears several times, most significantly as the author of Mayamatam, \"Concept of Mayan\" which is a Vastu Shastra, a text on art, architecture and town planning. He created the Mayan calendar.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MAYA DANAVA AND KERALA KING MAHABALI WENT TO PERU ( PATALA ) BY VIMANA</span></b><br /><br />Aswasena later tried to take revenge for his mother, and hid in the quiver of Karna who was fighting Arjuna still like an arrow, but Arjuna's charioter Lord Krishna prevented this dart from hitting Arjuna by causing the horses to bend down thus sinking the chariot wheels. .</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n60 years after the Mahabharata war, Takshaka ( son of Ashwasena ) had his revenge by killing Parikshit, Arjuna's grandson.<br />\n<br />\nParikshit was forewarned and so he build a tower in the midle of a lake, with every hole and crevice plugged. But Takshaka coverted itself into a worm and bore into a mango, which was to be taken in a basket as food.<br />\n<br />\nParikshit was engulfed in flames due to the potency of the venom--as a poetic justice , as Takshaka's wife was killed in the Khandava forest fire.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">King Parikshit who was killed by snake bite , was father of Emperor&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Jayameyjayan&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">who built Kedarnath Temple in a grand manner .</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/6000-year-old-kedarnath-temple-highest.html</span><br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">59.21%</span></b><br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>BELOW: THE FACE OF KING JAYAMEYJAYAN IS AT CENTRE TOP (UNDER THE LIGHT BULB )</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; LIKE HOW GHANSHAM PANDE AND SHIRDI SAIBABA ARE \"HINDU GODS..<br /><br />LINGAYATHS WHO BURY THEIR DEAD ARE NOT HINDUS. .<br /><br />CREMATION OR ANTAYESTI IS THE ONLY COMPULSORY SAMSKARA ( 16TH RITE OF PASSAGE ) FOR BEING A HINDU..<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD CREATED AND BACKDATED BASAVA PURANA..<br /><br />THE FOLLOWING STATEMENT IS ATTRIBUTED TO BASAVA \" LOADED WITH THE BURDEN OF VEDAS, THE BRAHMIN IS A VERITABLE DONKEY\"..<br /><br />LINGAYATH ARE NOT SUPPOSED TO GO TO TEMPLES .. FOR BASAVA ( WHO NEVER EXISTED LIKE JESUS CHRIST ) SAID \"GODS HERE , GODS THERE---NO SPACE FOR OUR FEET\"..<br /><br />SHIVA IS TO BASAVA WHAT KRISHNA IS TO MEERA..( MEERA OF BHAKTI MOVEMENT NEVER EXISTED ) .. MEERA IS ONE OF THE 16 SANTS OF SIKHISM..<br /><br />MEERA IS INCARNATION OF RADHA-- RADHA NEVER EXISTED..<br /><br />EMPEROR ASHOKA RUSHED TO VISIT MEERA AT BRINDAVAN..ASHOKA NEVER EXISTED..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br /><br />WHEN YOU BURY YOUR DEAD, THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER--LONELY AND MISERABLE..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span><br /><br />ROTHSCHILD TRIED HIS BEST TO GET SIKHS TO BURY THE DEAD--SIKHS WERE SMART--THEY TOLD THEIR CRYPTO JEW LEADERS TO GO TO HELL.<br /><br />INDIA WILL GO BACK TO SLAVERY , AS OUR POLITICIANS PROP UP FAKE GODS CREATED FOR US BY THE WHITE MAN.. ENOUGH TRAIT0RS ARE THERE IN OUR MIDST--MOST FROM THE BENAMI MEDIA..<br /><br />IN LITERARY FESTS THEY RUN DOWN EVERYTHING RELATED TO SANATANA DHARMA-- BUT THEY PRAISE BASAVA, SHIRDI SAI BABA, GHANSHAM PANDE, YOGI VEMANA ETC<br /><br />CP BROWN WHO MADE INDIANS SLAVES IN FOREIGN LANDS IS NOW A WHITE \"GOD\" FOR TELUGUS.. IF YOU SAY A WORD AGAINST CP BROWN, THERE ARE POLITICIANS WHO WILL PUT YOU IN JAIL..<br /><br />FOR TELUGU VOTES NOW MODI MIGHT SAY CP BROWN IS GOD..<br /><br />YOGI VEMANAS POEMS WERE FIRST WRITTEN IN FRENCH BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. THEN ROTHSCHILDs AGENT CP BROWN \"DISCOVERED \" IT AND TRANSLATED IT INTO TELUGU..<br /><br />LINGAYATHS WHO BURY THEIR DEAD ARE NOW 19% OF THE KARNATAKA POPULATION..THESE HINDU HATING PEOPLE GAVE THEIR VOTE TO BJP.. DO YOU REALLY THINK MODI AND AMIT SHAH ARE HINDUS ?<br /><br />GAURI LANKESH AND MM KALBURGI WHO HATED HINDUS WAS A LINGAYATH.. UR ANANTAMURTHY PISSES ON A VISHNU IDOL ( LINGAYATHS CARE FOR SHIVA --THEY HATE VISHNU )<br /><br />CHANNA BASAVA PURANA WAS COOKED UP AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7597872277839208260-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7597872277839208260-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5045427528510703691\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Basava took this seed home, and his sister without Basava\u2019s knowledge swallowed it, and became pregnant. The child was called Channabasava, or the beautiful Basava, and assisted his uncle in spreading the new doctrines.<br /><br />IMMACULATE CONCEPTION HAI BHAIYYA-- LIKE JESUS !<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD DROVE AWAY KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFFS FROM BADRINATH MUTT AND TOOK IN CRYPTO JEW LINGAYATHS ..
