Electrical\ndischarge is also referred to as corona discharge. These unstable oxygen atoms\ncombine with other oxygen molecules. This combination forms ozone).</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aN0vmR1_mc4/UcCb6Z6atWI/AAAAAAAAjUI/YsQFRuyYv40/s1600/download.jpgjhgytyui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"218\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aN0vmR1_mc4/UcCb6Z6atWI/AAAAAAAAjUI/YsQFRuyYv40/s400/download.jpgjhgytyui.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These radicals can combine with oxygen\nmolecules to form ozone. &nbsp;To control and\nmaintain the electrical discharge, a di-electric is present, carried out in\nceramic or glass. &nbsp;The excessive heat of\nthe electrodes is often cooled by cooling water, or by air.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ozonizer creates\nozone by charging the air with a burst of high negative voltage.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/GlCSwjq8CmY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GlCSwjq8CmY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/GlCSwjq8CmY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Germany, ozone generators\nare standard pieces of equipment in ambulances, which has resulted in a lower\noccurrence of severe or permanent paralysis in stroke patients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone stimulates &nbsp;oxygen metabolism . It causes an increase of\nmetabolism inside the endogenous red blood cells, which, in turn, releases more\noxygen to tissues inside the body. &nbsp;As\nthe body becomes more oxygenated, &nbsp;it is\nmore proficient at fighting disease. &nbsp;Ozone\nis said to also up the production of enzymes in the body, which act as free\nradical scavengers and healthy cell protectors. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As ozone gas enters the\nbody, it is broken down in peroxides. &nbsp;Peroxides\nare said to be attracted to diseased or weakened cells. &nbsp;If a cell is healthy, it presumably has\nenzymes that will resist penetration by the peroxides, but a weak cell that has\nbeen infected with viruses, bacteria, or cancerous growth is essentially\ndefenseless against the treatment. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence ozone is a\npotential treatment for a multitude of debilitating diseases, including cancer,\nchronic fatigue syndrome, and AIDS. &nbsp;Some\nof these diseases are thought to require multiple treatments with ozone therapy\nbecause the associated disease pathogen is more susceptible at different stages\nof its development.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best hospitals\naround the world use large ozone generators to decontaminate operating rooms\nbetween surgeries. The rooms are cleaned and then sealed airtight before being\nfilled with ozone which effectively kills or neutralizes all remaining bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone cannot be stored\nand transported like other industrial gases (because it quickly decays into\ndiatomic oxygen) and must therefore be produced on site.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It must be said that\nozone is highly toxic to humans and most other forms of life and has to be used\nin an intelligent manner.. Like how a life saving a matchstick is dangerous in\nthe hands of a monkey. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even very low\nconcentrations of ozone can be harmful to the upper respiratory tract and the\nlungs. The severity of injury depends on both by the concentration of ozone and\nthe duration of exposure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is just an activated oxygen molecule &nbsp;consisting of three oxygen\natoms. The oxygen we breathe&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">contains two atoms .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4jk2sKLU8eY/UcCcDBFkPLI/AAAAAAAAjUQ/tfRuBdKWtOQ/s1600/download.jpgjkgrik.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4jk2sKLU8eY/UcCcDBFkPLI/AAAAAAAAjUQ/tfRuBdKWtOQ/s400/download.jpgjkgrik.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrolytic ozone\ngeneration (EOG) splits water molecules into H2, O2, and O3. In most EOG\nmethods, the hydrogen gas will be removed to leave oxygen and ozone as the only\nreaction products.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, an immunity to\nozone would cause the bacteria to die of asphyxiation or mutate to in a\nanaerobic environment . Ozone works each time and every time with the same\nefficacy.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">China used ozonizers\nduring the recent SARS outbreak . Twelve states in USA use ozonisers though it\nis prohibited by the FDA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozonated water is used\nto launder clothes and to sanitize food, drinking water, and surfaces in the\nhome. &nbsp;Nowadays on TV you can see Hema\nMalini and her two daughters advocating ozonized water to remove pesticide\nresidues from fruits and vegetables.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E0Nd2eZgZ9w/UcA_itlKKCI/AAAAAAAAjSg/gJtu9SFETEM/s1600/vegetable_purifiers_showcase.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-E0Nd2eZgZ9w/UcA_itlKKCI/AAAAAAAAjSg/gJtu9SFETEM/s320/vegetable_purifiers_showcase.gif\" width=\"232\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is one of the\nbest sanitizers/sterilizers in the world . Almost all swimming pools in the\nbest hotels of the world have Ozone plants instead of injecting Chlorine. &nbsp;Here ozone is infused into water . &nbsp;Bacteria are &nbsp;single-cell creatures sealed by a relatively\nsolid-cell membrane. Ozone breaks through the cell membrane, and this leads to\nthe destruction of the bacteria. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viruses unlike\nbacteria, they multiply only within the host cell. &nbsp;They transform protein of the host cell into\nproteins of their own. &nbsp;Ozone destroys\nviruses by diffusing through the protein coat into the nucleic acid core,\nresulting in damage of the viral RNA.&nbsp; At\nhigher concentrations, ozone destroys the exterior protein shell by\noxidation so DNA or RNA structures\nof the virus are affected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone always reverts\nback to oxygen over time. Hence &nbsp;ozone\ncannot be delivered in tanks. &nbsp;Instead,\nozone is typically produced on-site by an ozone generator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In very clean and cold\nwater ozone can last for several hours. Conversely dirty and warm water will\nlast lesser time. Ozone is 13 times more soluble in water than oxygen. Reactions\nwith bacteria etc., consumes ozone by oxidation reactions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone breaks down\nthermally too. &nbsp;Higher temperatures\ndestroy ozone quicker than lower temperatures. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ozone that remains is referred to as residual\nozone. \"Residual\" ozone created will return to oxygen usually within\n30 minutes, in amounts equal to half its level. What this means is that after\neach subsequent 30 minute period there would be half as much residual ozone\nleft at the end of the period as was present at the beginning of the period.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone does its job and then without much ado disappears back into safe oxygen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone occurs readily in\nnature, as a result of lightning strikes that occur during thunderstorms. The typical\n\u201cfresh spring rain\" smell that we notice after a storm most often results\nfrom nature's creation of ozone. In total, ozone makes up only 0.6 ppm of the\natmosphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In standard conditions,\nozone is a pale blue gas that condenses at progressively cryogenic temperatures\nto a dark blue liquid and finally a violet-black solid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are familiar with the\n\"ozone layer\" that circles the planet above the earth's atmosphere. &nbsp;Here the ozone is created by the sun's\nultra-violet rays. This layer serves to protect us from the sun\u2019s sunburn-producing\nUVB (280\u2013315 nm) ultra-violet radiation. . &nbsp;The band of UV closest to visible light, UVA\n(315\u2013400 nm), is hardly affected by ozone, and most of it reaches the ground, and\nis responsible for the production of vitamin D in humans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone can also be\npresent in indoor air pollution, partly as a result of electronic equipment\nsuch as photocopiers. Electric motors using brushes can generate ozone from\nrepeated sparking inside the unit. Large motors that use brushes, such as those\nused by elevators or hydraulic pumps, will generate more ozone than smaller\nmotors.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_9C8N8l8lD8/UcCcJDqjVII/AAAAAAAAjUY/7CIO5MXFDz4/s1600/Caravan-Graphics-Side-1.jpg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"197\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_9C8N8l8lD8/UcCcJDqjVII/AAAAAAAAjUY/7CIO5MXFDz4/s400/Caravan-Graphics-Side-1.jpg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is also widely\nused in treatment of water in aquariums and fish ponds. Its use can minimize\nbacterial growth, control parasites, eliminate transmission of some diseases,\nand reduce or eliminate \"yellowing\" of the water. Ozone must not come\nin contact with fish's gill structures. Ozone is also added to recirculating\nsystems to reduce nitrite levels through conversion into nitrate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USDA and FDA have\napproved ozone for use with food meant for human consumption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is used for\nde-odourizing. The third oxygen atom of ozone makes it extremely reactive. This\natom readily attaches itself to other odor molecules. When contaminants such as\nodors, bacteria or viruses make contact with ozone, their chemical structure is\nchanged to less odorous compounds. As more ozone attacks the remaining\ncompounds, the odor is eventually destroyed. Ozone will not mask odors - It\ndestroys them!.This process is called oxidation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone essentially\nreverts back to oxygen after it is used. This makes it a very environmentally\nfriendly oxidant. . When ozone comes in contact with organic compounds or\nbacteria, the extra atom of oxygen destroys the contaminant by oxidation. Ozone\ndecomposes to oxygen after being used so no harmful by products result.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Basically ozone reacts\nwith a foreign odor to change is composition so it is no longer the same odor.\nA new molecule is formed but this new molecule is typically less odorous that\nthe original one. &nbsp;Ozone is slightly\nheavier than air and will only stratify in very calm environments . Odors typically\ninclude urine, fecal, musty, pet etc. &nbsp;It\ndoes NOT mask the odour, it destroys. &nbsp;After this ozone decomposes back into oxygen\nand there is nothing to clean up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone will neutralize\nvirtually all organic odors, specifically those that contain carbon as their\nbase element. This will include all the bacteria and fungus groups as well as\nsmoke, decay, and cooking odors. . Odors associated with dead bodies, and other\nforms of decay, like freezer failure have long resisted normal chemical\ndeodorizing attempts. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to its oxidizing\nnature, ozone attacks and degrades natural latex rubber, thus a laminate like\nsilica should be applied to car and freezer door moldings. Ozone also breaks\ndown and thus oxidizes faster in the presence of moisture. Even high relative\nhumidity can increase its action. Ozone can remove odors related to soot,\nsmoke, mold, and mildew in a cost-effective, time-saving way.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZpcgGmVE-Pg/UcCcQkNDE9I/AAAAAAAAjUg/P_2cWYqytkw/s1600/images.jpgluyfi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZpcgGmVE-Pg/UcCcQkNDE9I/AAAAAAAAjUg/P_2cWYqytkw/s1600/images.jpgluyfi.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is not as\neffective on \u201cinorganic\u201d odors like ammonia, phosphates, nitrates, sulfates,\nchlorides, etc. &nbsp;Inorganic means C (\ncarbon ) will be in its chemical formula. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With ozone, \u201cmore the\nmerrier \u201c concept does NOT apply. It is not necessary that ozone be detected by\nhumans for it to be effective. Ozone can work even when humans are not able to\nsmell it. Several regulatory agencies, including the Occupational Safety and\nHealth Administration (OSHA), have stipulated that the safe allowable level of\nresidual is 0.1 ppm (parts per million). Note that this permissible level is\nfor continuous exposure throughout an entire 8 hour day. &nbsp;The odor of ozone is detectable by most people\nat a level of 0.003 - 0.015 ppm .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CeghMTO59WQ/UcCbe7xwrUI/AAAAAAAAjT4/MOpiMrpiO9Y/s1600/images.jpghjgvs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CeghMTO59WQ/UcCbe7xwrUI/AAAAAAAAjT4/MOpiMrpiO9Y/s1600/images.jpghjgvs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is NOT explosive.\nCalcium Hypochlorite usually catch fire while in storage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is the strongest\noxidant and disinfectant available for the treatment of aqueous solutions and\ngaseous mixtures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although ozone is only\npartially soluble in water, it is sufficiently soluble and stable such that its\noxidation or disinfectant properties can be fully utilized. It can kill\npathogens in seconds while other oxidants take several minutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone enhances the\nflocculation and coagulation of organic material thereby improving filtration. &nbsp;There is less &nbsp;maintenance due to lower scaling and\nbiological growth. &nbsp;No need for &nbsp;chemical storage or transportation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is 3,125 times\nmore germicidal than chlorine, how do you like this in a swimming pool crowded\nby unknown people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I once sailed with a\njunior engineer who nearly died due to Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus\naureus (MRSA) infection, which he contacted from a smelly boxing glove in the\ngym ashore. Ozone gas can disinfect such a glove in seconds. Even if Ozone is\nused in water , less rinse water used reduces the overall discharged water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big 5 and 7 star hotels\nuse ozone to lower costs and save money. &nbsp;&nbsp;Nursing homes use ozone to reduce cross\ncontamination of illness and infections. Wont you feel more comfortable if your\nchild is born in a hospital with an ozone generator?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CR9e0fgwaV8/UcBoUSzfMxI/AAAAAAAAjSw/tNh591iIIj0/s1600/ghjryj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CR9e0fgwaV8/UcBoUSzfMxI/AAAAAAAAjSw/tNh591iIIj0/s400/ghjryj.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In good hotels and\nhospitals ozone is directly injected into the wash water as it enters the\nwashing machine or utensil rinser or water fountains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is done by bubble diffusers\nand venturi Injectors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bubble diffuser is\nessentially a porous device used for breaking the gas into small bubbles at the\nbottom of a water column to allow the bubbles to slowly rise to the top of the\ncolumn and dissolve into water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A venturi injector\nrequires a pressure differential across the device to create a vacuum to pull\nozone gas into the device. Then, using mixing vanes the gas is thoroughly mixed\nwith the water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When ozone gas is\ninjected into water at higher pressures more force will be placed on the wall\nof that gas bubble. This force will allow ozone to dissolve into water more\nefficiently.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone at higher\nconcentrations will dissolve into water more efficiently than ozone at lower\nconcentrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, there are about\n300 major water treatment plants in the United States that incorporate the use\nof ozone in their processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1982, ozone was\ngiven GRAS approval ( generally recognized as safe ) &nbsp;for use in bottled water. &nbsp;Today, the majority of bottled water companies\nuse ozone to ensure pure water that is pathogen free for consumers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of ozone for\nwastewater disinfection has been growing in popularity due to strict\nregulations on fecal coliform and other pathogens.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x-JxaPu7K1s/UcCbaU1jDvI/AAAAAAAAjTw/CFI0VsrMhUM/s1600/images.jpgtrikm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x-JxaPu7K1s/UcCbaU1jDvI/AAAAAAAAjTw/CFI0VsrMhUM/s1600/images.jpgtrikm.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As chemical costs rise,\nozone becomes a more cost effective solution for wastewater disinfection. Ozone\ncan be produced on site using oxygen from the ambient air. Only electrical\npower is required for operation. Ozone is a green solution to wastewater\ndisinfection. No by-products or waste products are formed in the creation of\nozone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone is used as a\nsanitizer in Clean-In-Place (CIP) Systems. . The use of ozone eliminates the\nneed of &nbsp;hot water cycles, reducing the\namount of water used, and the energy costs associated with hot water. These\ncosts savings in conjunction with chemical savings have made ozone a cost\nsaving measure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2001, ozone was give\nGRAS approval for direct contact with all fish, meat and poultry products.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the major\nconcerns for cross-contamination on food processing equipment is bio-film\nbuildup. Bio-films are layers of microorganisms bonded tightly to a surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microbes can attach themselves to a surface and continue to grow layer upon\nlayer of new microbes. The new layer of microbes can provide nutrients and\nprotection against sanitizers to the existing layers of microbes. These layers\nof microbes can continue to grow, and become more resistant to sanitizers over\ntime making sanitation more difficult if proper sanitation is not achieved on a\nregular basis.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-liEcinKzPZM/UcCdhyl2ewI/AAAAAAAAjU4/dRmsgUuhNkc/s1600/images.jpgiuoby.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-liEcinKzPZM/UcCdhyl2ewI/AAAAAAAAjU4/dRmsgUuhNkc/s400/images.jpgiuoby.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These resistant bio-films are most common in cracks, crevices,\nand corners of food processing equipment that are only sanitized periodically.\nIn fact if you go to your own kitchen you can see such black biofilm build up\nin cracks near the wash basin and tiling grooves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microorganisms such as E.coli\ncan build resistance to chlorine over time. A major drawback of chlorine and\nother chemicals is the harsh effect they have on equipment made of metals and\nwood. Equipment, walls, floors, drains, tanks, tubs, racks, knives, and tables\ncan all be sprayed with aqueous ozone, destroying all bacteria, viruses, fungi,\nand spores.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qEKzA2N98Cs/UcCbUsrflWI/AAAAAAAAjTo/Q4tR-A2yWY8/s1600/download.jpghtredi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qEKzA2N98Cs/UcCbUsrflWI/AAAAAAAAjTo/Q4tR-A2yWY8/s320/download.jpghtredi.jpg\" width=\"238\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No other sanitation step after the use of ozone is necessary. In\nfact no rinse step is necessary after ozone as the ozone will leave no residual\non the surface. This lowers cleaning time and water usage costs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many applications do\nnot allow for water to penetrate locations where bacteria may reside and cause\nfuture cross-contamination. Gaseous ozone can be used with everything in place.\nOzone alarms are installed for the safety of personnel. In this case there are\ntwo set-points. The first is an intermittent alarm, which is triggered at 0.25\nppm. The second alarm activates a ventilation fan at 0.5 ppm. Ozone levels are\ndisplayed on the sensor readout.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bs9cshCflzI/UcCd4nYk68I/AAAAAAAAjVI/A7lmoRjny4I/s1600/igoibgh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"363\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bs9cshCflzI/UcCd4nYk68I/AAAAAAAAjVI/A7lmoRjny4I/s400/igoibgh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozonated ice can be\nused in the storage of fish to prolong shelf-life and maintain a fresher,\nbetter looking product to the end user. The other way is to buy fish doused in\nformalin and then have kidney dialysis and transplant later on in life. &nbsp;In US and European fishing vessels , to\nmaintain high quality fish products for market, ozonated ice is used on these\nvessels for the fish that are harvested early in the voyage and stored. Ozone\ncan also be dissolved into water and used to wash seafood and fish fillet's to\nreduce bacteria and extend shelf-life in fresh fish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organic foods are\ntypically foods that are grown without pesticides, herbicides, chemicals, or\ngrowth hormones. This means the food you are eating is more natural and free of\nsynthetic products. There is a catch. 100% Organic \u2014 Products made entirely\nwith certified organic ingredients and methods. Organic means products with at\nleast 95% organic ingredients. Like our own ghee and asli ghee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most undesirable\nmicro-organisms are anaerobic, which means that they thrive in the absence of\noxygen; in fact, they are destroyed by the presence of oxygen. The viruses that\ncontain lipids are more sensitive to deactivation by ozone \u2013 Herpes, Mumps,\nMeasles, Influenza, Rabies, HIV etc .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone causes increased metabolism inside\nthe red blood cells&nbsp; which releases more\noxygen to the tissues. Ozone also stimulates the production of enzymes, which\nact as cell wall protectors and scavengers of free radicals. It enhances energy\nproduction in the cells by complex biochemical reactions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5PWGaRDEqVk/UcCbHd3OyDI/AAAAAAAAjTY/ArBpkMM9CLk/s1600/images.jpglkkjopy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"308\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5PWGaRDEqVk/UcCbHd3OyDI/AAAAAAAAjTY/ArBpkMM9CLk/s400/images.jpglkkjopy.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In circulatory\ndisease, a clumping of red blood cells hinders blood flow through the small\ncapillaries and decreases oxygen uptake by the red blood cells due to reduced\nsurface area. Ozone reduces or eliminates clumping, and restores flexibility\nthereby increasing oxygen carrying capacity. Improved viscosity of the blood\nalso leads to better oxygenation of the tissues.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone oxidises the plaque in\narteries, which unclogs and frees up the circulation. A vasodilator,\nProstacycline, is also produced by ozone, which dilates the arteries. Ozone\ninhibits cancer cell metabolism. In addition, ozone oxidises the outer lipid\nlayer of cancer cells, thus destroying them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone improves brain function and\nmemory. &nbsp;It oxidises toxins, allowing\ntheir excretion and chelates heavy metals. It prevents and reverses\ndegenerative disease. Ozone prevents and treats Autoimmune diseases and treats\ncommunicable diseases.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today , the truth is\nout. Canola oil is the worst and Coconut oil is the best.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google search-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">COCONUT OIL IS GOOD FOR\nCOOKING , IGNORE THE VESTED PROPAGANDA VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consumption of canola\noil has been shown to cause fibrotic lesions of the heart, CNS degenerative\ndisorders, prostate cancer, anemia, lung cancer, constipation, irritation of\nthe mucous membranes and many toxic effects.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxygen comprises 62% to\n71% of the body, and is the body\u2019s most abundant and essential element. Ninety\n(90%) percent of all our biological energy comes from oxygen. &nbsp;When you consider that disease-causing\nmicroorganisms, viruses, bacteria and pathogens cannot survive in oxygen-rich\nenvironments, you begin to see why oxygen therapy is the most powerful weapon\nfor fighting disease. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why\nancient Maharishis propagated Pranayama.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A highly oxygenated body is not only\nimmune to disease, but it also destroys disease that already exists in the\nbody. &nbsp;Simply inhaling oxygen is not\nenough. Only 15% of the oxygen you inhale is absorbed into the bloodstream.\nOxygen must enter the blood, and the blood, in turn, needs to deliver it to the\ncells and tissues of the body. This, then would raise tissue oxygen levels,\nkill bacteria, viruses and defective tissue cells, enable healthy cells to\nsurvive and multiply more rapidly - and ultimately create a stronger immune\nsystem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. Otto Warburg who won the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine &nbsp;stated that the prime cause of cancer is\ninsufficient oxygen at the cellular level, and that cancer cells cannot survive\nin a high oxygen environment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The microbe is nothing. The terrain is everything.\n&nbsp;HIV is nothing, its environment is\neverything. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bacteria, viruses and\npathogens do not cause disease, but rather seek out environments where they can\nthrive best - and that is in oxygen-deprived and poor nutritious food consumer bodies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozonated water, which is simply water that has been infused with ozone via an\nozonator, is an efficient way of oxygenating the body and accelerating the\nhealing process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drinking 6 to 8 glasses of ozonated water daily establishes a\nhigh level of oxygenation in the body, facilitates detoxification and\naccelerates the healing process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone\nis a toxic gas with no known useful medical application in specific,\nadjunctive, or preventive therapy. In order for ozone to be effective as a\ngermicide, it must be present in a concentration far greater than that which\ncan be safely tolerated by man and animals.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Environmental\nProtection Agency (EPA),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ozone\nis an air pollutant that is harmful to breathe and it damages crops, trees and\nother vegetation. margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_16.html?showComment=1526561833678#c3581056505277055274\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 17, 2018 at 6:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.newyorker.com/news/dispatch/how-indias-welfare-revolution-is-starving-citizens<br />\n<br />\nBENAMI MEDIA AND FAKE NEWS..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS A FOOD SURPLUS NATION.. 40% OF PRODUCED FOOD GOES WASTE...<br />\n<br />\nWE CAN REDUCE THE WASTE TO 3% IF WE ADOPT OZONE..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE NO HUNGER DEATHS IN INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE MODI GOVT-- WE MUST STOP FAKE NEWS AND FINE THE DESH DROHI MEDIA BARONS ...<br />\n<br />\nSHUT DOWN DESH DROHI FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">GREEN REVOLUTION HAS HARMED FOOD PRODUCTION... OUR HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL WAS REPLACED BY CHEMICAL LADEN WATER THIRSTY SOIL .. SOIL AEREATING EARTH WORMS HAVE DISAPPEARED ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nLegend has it that 6000 years ago , Lord Parashurama CREATED snake groves in Kerala to increase Humus acid in Keralas\u2019s top soil. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe gardeners job is to increase the amount of humus in soil. \u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Think of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. \u2026This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus ..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">\n<div>\nWE CAN STOP FARMER SUICIDES..</div>\n</span><br />\nHUMUS IN TOP SOIL GAVE INDIA PRICELESS FLORA FOLLOWING THE GOLDEN MEAN..<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition\u2026\u2026. 200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. \u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nSnakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus \u2026\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one\u2026\u2026.. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen\u2026\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc\u2026\u2026. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. \u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe humic substance contains various functional groups of carboxylic, carbonyl, phenolic, alcoholic with higher molecular weight of 40,000 to 70,000 and higher cation exchange capacity (100-130 meq/100 gm). Lignite contains more of humic acid\u2026..---<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants\u2026.. This remaining material is called humus. \u2026\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further\u2026\u2026\u2026. Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few\u2026\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away. \u2026.. When a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. \u2026\u2026\u2026The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. \u2026\u2026 Aggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil\u2026.. Better soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHumus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. \u2026.While these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546626547974#c6915640007838349405\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 4, 2019 at 11:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nQUOTE: The Leningrad Codex, in extraordinarily pristine condition after a millennium defying the laws of oxidation : UNQUOTE<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html<br /><br />SOMEBODY ASKED TO EXPOUND ON THIS OXIDATION PART.<br /><br />NOWADATS EDIBLE FOOD IN PACKAGES ARE PRESERVED BY DANGEROUS , TOXIC AND CARCINOGENIC CHEMICALS<br /><br />FOOD GETS SPOILT BY OXIDATION\u2014THAT IS WHY THERE IS A EXPIRY DATE<br /><br />Oxidative rancidity is a major cause of food quality deterioration, leading to the formation of undesirable off-flavours as well as unhealthful compounds.<br /><br />Virgin coconut oil gets racid very fast.. To prevent that reduce the contact of oil with atmospheric air, by storing full in narrow neck bottles , with sufficient room for expansion while freezing.<br /><br />On Chemical tankers we carry vegetable oils like olive / corn oil which get spoilt fast by oxidation .. We pad the stainless steel tank with nitrogen..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/06/nitrogen-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/nitrogen-padding-from-ashore-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />WHEN WE CARRY RED AND WHITE WINE N CHEMICAL TANKERS WE OVERFILL THE TANK WITHOUT THE MANDATORY 2% FOR EXPANSION..<br /><br />If fats oxidize, they produce \u201coff\u201d odors and flavors (stale, rancid odors). Often, if fats oxidize, vitamins also oxidize and lose their activity. If pigments oxidize, they can change color completely. For example, red meat turns gray when the myoglobin pigment oxidizes..<br />Vacuum sealing provides food an air-tight environment, preventing the crystals that cause freezer burn from forming on your food. Vacuum sealing keeps the moisture in your food for an extended period of time, allowing you to enjoy food that tastes fresh months after you have stored it..<br /><br />Vacuum sealers preserve food by preventing the growth of mold or bacteria. Vacuum sealing deprives your food of oxygen. Mold and bacteria cannot grow without oxygen.<br /><br />The shelf life of your food is greatly extended when you vacuum seal it. Vacuum sealing food preserves it 5 times longer than food stored in plastic containers or bags. Vacuum sealing holds in the moisture, juices, and flavor of the food. You\u2019ll notice the difference in taste.<br /><br />Vacuum-packing is commonly used for storing nuts to reduce the loss of flavor from oxidation.<br /><br />I always but vacuum sealed peanuts and cashew nuts.<br /><br />I HAVE SENT THE OZONE BLOGPOST BELOW TO PMO AND JP NADDA AT LEAST 30 TIMES..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html<br /><br />WHO CARES.<br /><br />MODIs MINISTERS EXIST TO GIVE HIM EGO MASSAGE<br /><br />MODI EXISTS TO ENSURE HE WILL GET RE-ELECTED IN 2019 , AND HE CONCENTRATES ON NURTURING HIS VOTE BANK.<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; She says she could beat you easily.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Boris Melnikov laughed\naloud. \"Nobody beats me--- easily or not.\" \"She's willing to bet\nyou ten thousand dollars that she can play you and Pietr Negulesco at the same\ntime and get a draw with at least one of you.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Boris Melnikov choked on\nhis drink.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"What!
